story:
Intro

The Native Americans had a term that would confuse us moderns- "good medicine." When most of us think of medicine we think of something that helps us recover from being ill but that is not what they meant by it. To them good medicine included any gift or practice that granted them a greater depth of life. But that medicine was about more than health, it was also personal. Finding your medicine was an obligation to find your unique path but there was a community you could rely upon to help you uncover the strength you needed to walk it; a community you served with that strength once you obtained it.

We have lost those traditions of wisdom that had been passed down one generation to another and with it we have lost a part of ourselves. Many of us modern Americans drift through our days without purpose and just not feeling as well as we think we should. Our hearts tell us that there is more vitality and strength to be had; more life than we currently experience. We try hard following all the standard advice on diet and exercise but just never seem able to get there. I am here to tell you that your heart is not wrong. Just because we have lost the path does not mean the path does not exist. There is a still a home to return to even if we have forgotten it.

There is more health, strength, and life available to you than you know. You are capable of things beyond what you can even imagine, of things that now seem the sole realm of legends. There is freedom to be had that will enable us to dream big again. Because honestly, accomplishing feats that most believe impossible is actually pretty simple once you remember the path to-

Become legendary.

The Story

Two weeks before I left for college I got sick. I lost 20 pounds almost overnight and that was the beginning of almost 7 years of hardship. Looking back now it is almost hard to believe that I spent entire months in bed barely able to function. Those years molded me, they were a gift really. The journey of getting my life back is what set me on the path to becoming who I am today.

I was forced to search and learn the paths of life, not because I wanted to but because if I didn't then I would die. What I discovered still surprises me even though it has been years- there are ancient secrets, that didn't used to be secrets at all, that we have forgotten. As moderns we have pursued our comfort above all else and consequentially we have laid aside these ancient life-ways because they did not serve that goal. Our ancestors remember what we have forgotten- 

There is strength and freedom to be found in things that make us uncomfortable. They regularly submitted themselves to training practices which enabled them to accomplish physical feats that seem extraordinary to us today, things we write off as myths. Science is slowly, oh so slowly, realizing the power some of these old traditions had and starting to see that the limits of human potential may not be what we have thought they are. I did not create any of these methods I use, but I may be the first to see the convergence and put them all together.

My discovery and use of these ways is what gave me my life back. Now I use them to train myself for the incredible and help you to do the same.

The Project

I have been working on developing these simple methods into protocols then experimenting with them on myself and a handful of my personal training clients. The results I have seen border on the unbelievable and they can sometimes happen fast too. What I will do is take what I have learned and create programs that combine these ancient life-ways with modern exercise and diet systems. Once I have the pieces condensed into easy to follow guides, I can share these reclaimed traditions and how best to use them with everyone. These secrets never should have become secrets and I want to unleash them in the world again! While I didn’t create the components being combined, I may be the first to experience their combined synergy and make them publicly available. It is the synergy of these different pieces that make this system incredible.

The guides to each method will be made available for free on my blog. I will also take the information in the guides and assemble it into pre-packaged programs serving different goals. These I will sell.

What's The Money For?

I have all the content needed to create the programs. The funding will be used to:  

  1. finish creating the programs and guides
  2. design, debug and launch the online platform

I have done a comprehensive analysis of this project and believe it will work given the requested funding.

Think This Is Hogwash?

Support me and find out! A short time ago I would have thought this was hogwash too. When I launch the website I am going to go on a publicized adventure to prove it. I haven't chosen the adventure yet; I may even have a backer or social media choose it for me, but it will be something incredible enough to make you believe in the training methods. They really are all quite simple in and of themselves, things you may even have heard of. What I have done is assemble them in a way that creates incredible synergy. I will even give you a hint since the magic is in the execution, not in the knowledge. The main methods that make up my protocols are-

Nutrition protocols grounded in history and science that are pretty opposite of what you have likely been taught, exercise methods that require a lot less time to get a lot bigger results than we have come to expect, intermittent and block fasting schedules, detox cycles, breathing exercises, cold water and sauna therapies, circadian rhythm hacks, and modern supplements that help facilitate the ancient ways.

People have gotten incredible results implementing any one of these techniques, what I am promising is simple ways to put them all together. It’s the level of synergy of this system that makes the word legendary credible. But I am dying to give you something so here is a fore-taste-

  • Did you know that cold exposure can cause fat loss not just through the calorie burn of staying warm but also its impact on leptin sensitivity, and that this can even mitigate the cycles of weight regain?
  • Did you know that breathing exercises can be used to manage food cravings through their affect on blood PH?
  • Did you know that your amount of heat producing brown adipose tissue that your body maintains is strongly affected by hypoxia and can be hacked by breathing exercises thus causing you to stay warm all the time?
  • Did you know that through the Bohr Effect the amount of oxygen your cells can absorb out of your blood stream is actually dependent upon how much carbon dioxide is in your blood, thus training your body to tolerate a higher level of carbon dioxide can cause you to have more endurance through more efficient use of oxygen without having to exercise at all?
  • Did you know that fasting causes a greater rise in growth hormone in response to training as well as increasing the amount catecholamines that your body releases thus fueling an intenser workout?
  • Did you know that fasting can cause you to be more tan irregardless of sun exposure and also increase your body’s creation of heat producing brown adipose tissue, thus making you more tolerant of all outdoor extremes?
  • Did you know that fasting trains your body to burn fat more effectively as a fuel and to preserve its glycogen stores thus helping you to both stay lean and to function at a high level level for extended periods of time without food?
  • Did you know that fasting helps your body heal through autophagy and that the lower levels of blood sugar decreases inflammation thus helping to speed up recovery from physical stress of every kind?

These are only some of the smaller and simpler pieces that will be included in my guides and programs. If you think some of that information is huge imagine what happens when you put it all together! We spend so much time in modern health and fitness fighting against how our bodies were designed to work. It is amazing what can happen when we return to collaborating with their normal function instead.

Risks and Challenges

The main risks and challenges that I can foresee and my respective strategies are- 

1 Building the online platform. 

There are always unexpected problems in building platforms but technically the platform is not complex and can function with generic audio visual and commerce features. Outsourcing will be used for any technical issues outside my experience. Fortunately I’ve been able to heavily leverage my uncle who is the founder of Morgan James Publishing, who’s an expert in online marketing and social media. His help has been, and will continue to be, massively important for the success of this project.

2 Publicizing the message.

The marketing effort to pull traffic into the web platform is likely the biggest risk. I have done a comprehensive forecast of what advertising will cost for sharing the initial launch on social media in order to hit critical mass and it all fits within my budget. This predicament is what originally brought me to crowdfunding as it allows me to generate buzz and interest in the message while I am preparing for it to launch.

3 Communicating the message.

All new and revolutionary ideas are always accompanied by a difficulty in explaining them. Fresh ideas by their very nature come from fresh perspectives and it always takes some effort to get people to look at a common problem from a different point of view. I am anticipating the sharing of the message being a fun challenge during this venture. The programs and guides are very simple to look at but the repercussions of the value they create are massive and really hard to put to words. You almost have to feel it to understand and believe it. My solution to this is leveraging creative story telling as a means to convey the heart of the message and the value of it. Then to go out and live it to create excitement over what is possible. The more people who try it and thrive, the better we all will get at sharing it together with the world.

Why is the funding set on flexible?

I have funding set to flexible because this project is going to be funded, even if it is out of my own pocket. Any money raised on Indiegogo will help offset my expenses, so you are assured of your rewards regardless of the amount raised! I truly feel like I have been given a gift and am incredibly grateful for it. I’m 100% committed to making this gift available to you too!

story:
The Offer

If you're interested in our patented, specially-formulated Cannabidiol (CBD) bath bombs that open your pores and allow for maximum absorption, pick a perk and wait for the relaxation to arrive. If we get funded, you will receive the perk you selected. If we do not, your money will go directly to our non-profit, MomBomb.org, which helps families in need. 

Why Buy In?

The bath bombs we sell allow you to care for yourself while supporting others. Though self-care is often seen as a luxury that best benefits you, in this case, you are truly helping others with $5 from each box going directly to families in need. MomBomb.org, our sister giving organization, helps moms and their families by providing those going through a tough time with a choice of one of four services: meal delivery, housekeeping, laundry, or childcare. Families can be nominated for assistance at MomBomb.org/apply-for-help.

The first product that Mom Bomb created was "Mom Bombs" - 100% vegan, organic, cruelty-free bath bombs made in the United States with premium ingredients. They were made by and for a woman suffering from chronic pain and, for that reason, we're taking relaxation to the next level with our newest product: Calm Bombs, CBD bath bombs made with all natural ingredients.

Calm Bombs, made with high-quality CBD and proprietary ingredients that allow the pores to open for maximum CBD absorption, are sure to move Mom Bomb closer to its goal of helping as many people (with the product itself) and as many families (with the automatic donation to MomBomb.org) as possible. CBD is completely legal in all 50 states, and, though helpful in reducing symptoms of pain and anxiety, does not have any psychoactive effects.

Ingredients: Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil, Magnesium Sulfate, *CBD Blend, Lavender Essential Oil, Eucalyptus Essential Oil, Polysorbate 80, Mica

*patent pending

What's the Story?

Our founder, Heather Roberts, a mother herself, was struck down with an illness out of the blue, and found herself suddenly unable to care for her businesses, her children, or herself. She faced many uncertainties during this time because of her inability to do the things that she usually did for her family, but found relief in making bath bombs with soothing essential oils.

Heather wanted to bring the same sense of healing that she found in the bath bombs to others who were also suffering. So, she began making bath bombs, packaged them in a beautiful box, and connected the bath bomb business to a non-profit organization that she also started, MomBomb.org. The non-profit is entirely funded by sales of the bath bombs ($5 of every purchase), so as the business grows, so does its impact on society. Every box sold helps a family in need! 

And if I'm Not a Mom...?

Our bath bombs are for EVERYONE, not just moms. The name came from wanting to support mothers, since Heather struggled through a tough time as a mother, but the product itself is for anyone and everyone. They make a great gift for anyone who needs self-care, or relaxation.

story:
World Chase Tag - a brief history

World Chase Tag was formed by brothers Christian and Damien Devaux after a game of tag with Christian's son, Orlando, in their garden. Four years (and two events) later, their footage has received more than 120 million views online and been aired on TV channels around the world (including ESPN, Fox, BBC, Fuji TV, TMZ, CBS and many more). Their tournaments have been contested by some of the biggest names in Parkour (including Storror, Sebastien Foucan and Danny Ilabaca) and they have built an online following of more than 120,000 suscribers. 

 

Basically, we went from this, to this.

 

Our third event is fast approaching, and we are at a crucial turning point. If we can make WCT3 as spectacular as we believe it could be, it will demonstrate to sponsors, networks and investors that our exciting new take on one of the oldest games has huge potential for growth. This will bring us one step closer to realising our long-term goal of creating a global, professional sport, with Chase Tag facilities around the world. 

 

Our Indiegogo Campaign

The production costs for hosting WCT3 will be around $80,000. This will include venue hire, court transportation, insurance, crew wages, lighting, providing a live-feed and a host of other expenses. We will pay for this through sponsorship, and any shortfall will be covered by private backers. However, to create the best action, we want to invite the best athletes from around the world - with teams from Europe, America, Asia and Africa. And this is where we need your support. 

 

Our Goal

We would like to raise $40,000 to help cover prize money and athlete transport and accommodation. 100% of the money raised (minus 35% costs for material, packaging post etc.) will go to the athletes and World Chase Tag will receive none of it. $10,000 will be allocated to prize money and the remaining $30,000 will help with athlete transport and accommodation.

There will be eight teams in total at WCT3 and each team has up to five athletes. The teams that travel further will be given a larger budget. We will finalise the team selection in mid August and it is at this point we will decide how much each team will receive (i.e. depending on where they have to travel from). 

If we are able to surpass this $40,000 goal, the additional funds raised will go towards creating a superior live-feed, which would include the use of  additional cameras, live action replays and so on. 

 

The Perks

In return for your support, we will be offering a number of perks that are available exclusively through our Indiegogo campaign. These include a selection of T-shirts, the WCT winner’s medal and pieces of the actual WCT3 match court. Regardless of how much you are able to invest, you’ll still be able to watch the event for free on our Twitch live feed. 

 

The Future

Our plan for 2019 is to host a four event world series. We will have three qualifying events, in Europe, Asia and America, and the winning teams from each event will go through to the World Final (location TBC). The success of WCT3 will play a big part in making this happen, so your support is very much appreciated!! 

 

If you want to find out more about World Chase Tag or see more of our content, subscribe to our social media channels: 

https://www.instagram.com/worldchasetag/

https://www.youtube.com/worldchasetag

https://www.facebook.com/worldchasetag/

https://twitter.com/worldchasetag

 

We'll be hosting regular live-feed Q&As throughout the campaign so keep an eye on the updates section of this page for more details. 

 

If you have any questions about the event, the perks, how we are going to allocate the funds, or anything else WCT related, please leave a comment in the comments section and we’ll answer them as best we can!

 

Thank you!!!!

story:
In 2017, I saw a commercial about a veteran returning from Afghanistan with spinal injuries.  He couldn’t stand on his own or walk unaided.  I felt that he had given his all for me, and now it was my turn to do for him.  I discovered that there are over 1,000,000 paraplegics in the U.S. due to traffic accidents, spinal injuries, multiple sclerosis, cerebral palsy, and returning veterans. I spent the last year and a half designing and developing the PARA-LIFT in hopes of giving these individuals back their freedom and dignity. 

Can you imagine not being able to stand and hug a loved one, or accomplish something as simple as getting a glass of water from the sink, or washing your own dishes, or the loss of dignity one feels from not being able to use the toilet without help? Imagine being in a social or business setting where people are standing and conversing, and instead of being at the seated level, you could stand also and engage at eye level. At the grocery store you could rise up and reach your own items off the shelf instead of having to ask another customer or employee to reach it for you.  Or how about being able to rise to participate in a standing ovation at a concert, or to be able to stand for the National Anthem? These are simple, everyday things that most of us take for granted.

My fiance and I, and our family, have invested everything we have into this project (over $67,000), and now we are asking for help to finish our dream of making it a reality for those that need it most.

The PARA-LIFT is a motorized ambulatory lift designed primarily for paraplegics, however, those with spinal injuries or other mobility disorders can also use it.  It can be driven like a motorized wheelchair, or from a standing position, and is capable of lifting a 300-pound user. 

Our goal is to provide a durable and stable ambulatory lift to help users to regain their independence and dignity. 

Competitive products that perform similar functions are priced at over $30,000 and are heavier and wider than the PARA-LIFT and are less maneuverable.  The lift capacity of the PARA-LIFT is unsurpassed in the industry and yet the weight of the PARA-LIFT is just 68 pounds. 

We have purchased most of the machining equipment we need to start production however we still need several key pieces of equipment. Contributions will be used to acquire a CNC milling machine, tooling, product materials, shipping containers and labor to manufacture, assemble, and deliver our product to those who need them. 

While contributions of any amount toward this effort are greatly appreciated, all contributions of $100 will go into a fund to provide PARA-LIFT units for our disabled American Veterans.

Help us reach our goal to provide those in need with the benefits that the PARA-LIFT will provide.

Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools to help us reach out to others.
story_txt:
In 2017, I saw a commercial about a veteran returning from Afghanistan with spinal injuries.  He couldn’t stand on his own or walk unaided.  I felt that he had given his all for me, and now it was my turn to do for him.  I discovered that there are over 1,000,000 paraplegics in the U.S. due to traffic accidents, spinal injuries, multiple sclerosis, cerebral palsy, and returning veterans. I spent the last year and a half designing and developing the PARA-LIFT in hopes of giving these individuals back their freedom and dignity. 
Can you imagine not being able to stand and hug a loved one, or accomplish something as simple as getting a glass of water from the sink, or washing your own dishes, or the loss of dignity one feels from not being able to use the toilet without help? Imagine being in a social or business setting where people are standing and conversing, and instead of being at the seated level, you could stand also and engage at eye level. story:
They increase resistance, build strength and power,
allowing you to swim a lot faster, just like a frog or otter!

They are made from high quality silicone with extra elasticity
and a special hydrodynamic shape that increases your swimming performance
by creating a water pockets between your fingers.

 

Today our team consists of passionate swimmers, surfers and freedivers. Our main goal is to change the perception about water and water based sports as we bring more people to learn basic swimming which is such an important skill to obtain from young age. Exciting and fun at the same time, HydraHand is the ultimate way to bring interest to water exercises.

 

 

HydraHand was first intended to be used only by surfers and swimmers to improve their paddling technique, but as HydraHand grew more popular it attracted general interest especially from kids because of superhuman looks.

As a result of prolonged training with HydraHand shows significant increase in ones paddling efficiency no matter the style. It is completely safe to use for children and wearing them are simply a lot of fun, you will feel and look like a aquaman or mermaid. HydraHand strengthens joints and muscles as well improves swimming technique.

 

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

story:
Overview

The Fitbound platform is the first inclusive exercise platform in the world. The videos were produced with the representation of individuals with and without disabilities exercising together.

  • Stream inclusive exercise videos to any device
  • Our goal is to create 150 new videos that would have representation from these five disability communities (Youth, physical, intellectual, veterans, seniors)
  • These videos will revolutionize inclusive exercise as there are no platforms that focus on engaging content with high production value. 

Imagine not having to worry about whether a gym, facility, hotel, home, the city is accessible or inclusive for you or your loved one to exercise?

What We Need

  • We are looking to raise $50,000 to produce 150 new videos with high production value.
  • Videos will be ready in 8 months (late August timeframe) 
  • For those that help us reach our goal, we will be giving months of the premium version to you for free in the perks section. 


Early Adoption

We have launched a beta version and have over 1,000 users signed up. We are creating five additional buckets of content: a veteran's disability channel, a seniors channel, individuals with intellectual disabilities, and a physical disabilities channel. Our platform is the first to combine quality content with equal representation on screen.

You want to test-run our beta videos for FREE:
https://fitbound.com/subscription-plan/


Challenges

How many times has someone been told: "Do what you can". It's the most ridiculous statement anyone can make. What that statement implies, is, we have nothing for you, so just hang out until it's over.

 There needs to be a platform that is focused on all communities and represents all communities. 

The conversation below should never take place in any situation but unfortunately, it's a reality for too many people in the disability community.


Amazing Possibilities

Entertainment. Exercise should be fun. Enough with the push-ups and situps.

Convenience. It's not always easy to just go to a gym. This gives you flexibility wherever you are in the world.

Bad Weather. You don't have to move. Just click and stream!

Use. Stream them anywhere. Office, home, school, senior centers, hotels, rehabilitation centers.  The list goes on!


Inclusive vs Commercial Production

Like we said we want to bring high production and inclusive exercise together. Here are examples of inclusive production value, commercial production value, and our beta videos.

We know the budgets are different, and that's where you come in! The more we raise, the closer we get to closing the gap!

Inclusive


Commercial


Fitbound's Beta Videos

 

The Impact of Exercise

 

Testimonials

Martyn Sibley, Co-founder of Accomable, Founder of Disability Horizons
"As an active advisor, presenter, and speaker on inclusion and disability, I believe Fitbound's platform will open up exercise to a community that is often forgotten. The inclusive and accessible nature of the platform shows the world that exercise, health, and wellness can be done together and not in separate silos."

Jillian Copeland, Founder of Diener Scool, Founder of Main Street Connect
"The idea behind Main Street is to meet the urgent need for disability housing and programming with affordable, community-centered spaces and opportunities that promote inclusion, independence, and quality of life. Fitbound's inclusive exercise platform creates a pathway for all our residents to reach their potential. Creating opportunities for our community is vital to health and wellness. Fitbound not only helps individuals exercise but fosters the social and collaborative connections that can unite all of the residents at MainStreet."


Other Ways You Can Help

SPREAD THE WORD!

  • We will be filming in eight months' time and while we design and produce the new videos, making sure that the over one billion individuals worldwide know we exist is our focus.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Mush - A social app for mushing.

There are a handful of mushing apps on the market, but none that will be able to compete with what Mush has to offer! By combining the social aspect into a route and dog stat tracking app, we're creating a platform not only for your personal stats, but for your friends and teammates stats as well. You'll be able to view others routes/speeds/times, dog line up and individual dog stats, as well as their overall stats such as total mileage and top speeds and times! 

Where we're at.

Right now Mush is still in the concept phase, and while most of the details and features are finalized, we're still looking for input from you the user. If you have an idea for a feature, or a suggestion to expand on a current feature, we'd love to hear from you. Currently the plan is to release an Android version, and shortly after the Android version is launched, we'll work on releasing a version for iOS.

Along with the Android release, a web version will be available that will have the same features as the mobile app minus the GPS tracking. It will allow you to setup your dogs, add and view friends posts and routes/dogs, share your or your dog's profile pages to various social media sites, and more. We're also implementing both a rank and badge system to help you meet your personal or team goals, and to allow users to view the top ranking users/teams on the site ( you can opt out of having your stats publicly displayed).

Every donation goes toward the development of the app and costs associated with hosting and distribution fees on the app stores, and expanding the list of features post launch.

Other than donations, how can you help?

If you're interested in Mush, and want to contribute in other ways, the most helpful way is to share the campaign!

story: N/A

Short Summary

Hi Future Contributor! We are asking for a little help from our friends!

We were hesitant about crowd-raising capital at first, but then we realized how cool this concept actually is. This approach levels the playing field for small businesses, and allows a community to come together to create positive change.

A little background: Fusion was founded in 2017 by an Registered Nurse who wanted to create a healthy alternative to the normal Fast Food Options while still being able to impact the health and wellness of the community. The concepts focus was to be different from other Smoothie and Juice Bars. No Ice, No Sugar, No Purees! Fresh and Frozen Fruit and Vegetables. Natural sweeteners Honey and Agave ONLY!

After being open for now 2 years we now have a desire to do MORE! We have slowly started to incorporate herbs and would like to take it up a notch. We truly believe in using natures own goodness to heal and strengthen ourselves. The goal is to be able to provide a larger array of natural products both directly from the store and online!

The plan is to offer all things that facilitate whole health; Balance of the Mind, Body, and Spirit. We will be able to provide an atmosphere for our customers to escape the hustle and bustle and relax in an space deigned to rejuvenate your whole body's health and wellness.

Contributions received will go towards: 

  • Relocating to a larger building
  • Renovations to new space
  • Purchasing new equipment, fixtures, furniture
  • Purchasing Packaging/Supplies for new products
  • Trademarks for New Herbal Line
  • Website redesign for e-Commerce 
  • Business Legal Re-structuring 
  • Initial Inventory for new products and,
  • Education/Training of staff

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $200K

Relocating to a larger building: We are currently located in Summerville, SC. Currently Summerville is booming with new business and neighborhoods. There are only a few locations left in the area that would be available for lease and/or purchase. We plan to move quickly on a location as soon as we get enough financial contributions! 

Renovations to new space: Renovations will include designating a main area for our Smoothie Juice and Herb Bar. Allocation of merchandising areas for direct sales of herbs and herbal blends, a spiritual wellness area, a natural hair/skin/body merchandise area, Consultation room for meetings and education forums, separate meditation area. We plan to incorporate other small businesses brand items as well throughout the new space!

Purchasing new equipment, fixtures, furniture: Merchandiser refrigerators, Cold Press Juicer, Scales, Herbal shelving/Display Wall, Seating for various uses.  

Purchasing Packaging/Supplies for distribution: Boxes, Bottles, Labels, Containers, etc.

Trademarks: New Herbal and Product Line

Website redesign: for e-Commerce: hire web designer 

Business Legal Re-structuring: additional CPA services to ensure new business model/filings are suited best and make needed changes 

Initial Inventory for new products: large supply of herbs, spices, produce, etc for proprietary product blends. 

Education/Training: designate educational time to provide staff hands on training for new distribution plan and setup to ensure efficiency in processing orders. 

The Impact

Why are we expanding? Whats the impact?

The Herbal and Supplement Industry in 2018 was said to be a 30.7 Billion dollar market. 2019 is projected to increase to 32 billion. 

With consumers interest in health and wellness growing so is the market for supplements that support this lifestyle. Most consumers will tell you the reason why they consume dietary supplements is for overall health and wellness benefits! 

Rising health concerns along with changing lifestyles and diets has surged the product demand. With the continued growing consumer awareness the market growth has a favorable outlook. 

Since we opened in 2017, Fusion has definitely been a hub for new healthy alternatives in the area. We have been listed in online publications, as well we were voted Summerville's BEST Smoothie in 2018.  We have such a great loyal customer base that grows daily and challenges us to do more. We are constantly being asked are we going to opening another location, can we extend our hours, when are we going to add a new product etc. But all these things take resources, and in particular financial resources. We invest everything back into the day to day business needs. We were able to invest in a truck this year, to be able to reach more areas!

However, expanding our brand and products will allow us to provide even more health and wellness options to the community and abroad. One advantage we have is our customers love knowing us personally and knowing that our products are handcrafted right in the shop. 

Being able to provide a more broad selection of whole, fresh natural ingredients and adding to that a new herbal line of products we would be helping more people take better control and responsibility for their own health. We will be able to give more people an opportunity approach whole health by focusing on strengthening the mind body and spirit! 

What Are The Risk? 

What most things there are ALWAYS Risk?

If we don't reach out full goal, we will still move forward with Trademarking first. We must secure our intellectual ideas before we can roll out anything new! Expanding within our financial abilities would be our next top priority. We still plan to locate a better suited building that would allow us to be able to process more orders. We will also use all contributions to purchase supplies, inventory and products needed to roll out a our new lines. 

So the risk here would only be a time delay in obtaining the overall goal. We will continue to move forward with all listed plans according to priorities and financial ability. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help 

We understand not everyone is in a position to help and contribute despite the desire to:

  • So you can still help by helping us get the word out and make some noise about what Fusion is trying to do!
  • Share our Indiegogo campaign with everyone you know!
  • Follow us on our social media pages Facebook: www.facebook.com/fusionlifesc Instagram: www.instagram.com/fusion_s_j

Update: We have started selling our Elderberry Tinctures and transitioned to a dry herbal formula for our 2 Day Cleanse. The response has been great. We are still trying to expand to be able to produce and sell on a larger scale. Thanks for all the support and well wishes!

story:
The Story

Hello. My name is Laurane McGlynn. I would like to invite you to participate in making a dream come true. I work as a clinical psychologist who specializes in working with people with chronic illness, chronic pain and cancer. I am also a breast cancer survivor. I remember how challenging it was to try and find resources for holistic healing to supplement the treatment I was receiving with traditional medicine.

My body, mind and spirit were all impacted by the experience of being diagnosed and treated for cancer. I remember how critical is was for my survival to find healers I could trust and feel safe and supported by. I was very fortunate to find a massage therapist, a naturopathic doctor, therapist and many others who significantly contributed to my ability to survive this disease.

For the past 8 years, I have felt a strong calling to open an integrated healing center where I can offer low cost, affordable holistic services to people with physical and mental illness regardless of their diagnosis. I have experienced in a very personal way, how fragile life is. For me, the most important thing is to continue to live my life in a meaningful and purposeful way. Guiding and supporting others toward health and healing is what I feel I am called to do.

While I have been committed to that goal, there has been a lack of financial support. I have learned to live a very simple lifestyle, so money is not something I have a lot of. I do have motivation and determination and know that I can make this center a reality but I do need some financial support to put a down payment on a property. The property will be located in Bucks County, PA and has multiple treatment rooms along with space for workshops and weekend programs.

Once I have secured the property, I have a team of practitioners who can offer a variety of services including naturopathic medicine, psychotherapy, nutritional consultations, Reiki, breathwork, yoga, massage therapy, art therapy and dance and movement therapies.

Please consider supporting the opening of A Place for Hope and Healing - An Integrated Treatment Center. I deeply appreciate any help you can offer. You can make a difference in the lives of those who are living with cancer and other medical and psychological issues. Thank you.

I remember how critical is was for my survival to find healers I could trust and feel safe and supported by.  I was very fortunate to find a massage therapist,  a naturopathic doctor, therapist and many others who significantly contributed to my ability to survive this disease. 
For the past 8 years, I have felt a strong calling to open an integrated healing center where I can offer low cost, affordable holistic services to people with physical and mental illness regardless of their diagnosis. I have experienced in a very personal way, how fragile life is. For me, the most important thing is to continue to live my life in a meaningful and purposeful way. Guiding and supporting others toward health and healing is what I feel I am called to do. 
While I have been committed to that goal, there has been a lack of financial support.  I have learned to live a very simple lifestyle, so money is not something I have a lot of. I do have motivation and determination and know that I can make this center a reality but I do need some financial support to put a down payment on a property. The property will be located in Bucks County, PA and has multiple treatment rooms along with space for workshops and weekend programs. 
Once I have secured the property, I have a team of practitioners who can offer a variety of services including naturopathic medicine, psychotherapy, nutritional consultations, Reiki, breathwork, yoga, massage therapy, art therapy and dance and movement therapies. 
Please consider supporting the opening of A Place for Hope and Healing - An Integrated Treatment Center. I deeply appreciate any help you can offer. You can make a difference in the lives of those who are living with cancer and other medical and psychological issues. Thank you.

story:
Our Goal

The goal of our Garden Sponsorship Program is to raise $2000 which will enable 10 families within our community the opportunity to have their very own 15X30 pesticide-free garden plots for the 2015  growing season.  This plot will enable our sponsored families the opportunity to join others in growing pesticide-free produce in our community garden. Families who are new to growing their own food will be guided by volunteer mentors to grow their own food from seed to harvest.  To date, our program has allowed us to support many local families not only gain access to fresh organically grown foods but has provided them with the knowledge and confidence to grow their own food. 

Our Outcomes

To date, our program with support from people like you, has allowed us to offer many local families a chance to not only gain access to fresh naturally  grown foods but has provided them with the knowledge and confidence to grow their own food. 2013 was the launch of our Garden Plot Sponsorship program which was made possible through generous  funding from members in our community and people across the country.  With this support, over the past 2 years we partnered with Pathways to Prosperity and other non-profit groups in Sussex County and we have welcomed 12 families and organizations to join our gardens at no cost to them. 

This year we hope to expand our Garden Sponsorship Program encouraging more families and volunteer groups to grow their own food.

"Thank you for letting  us have the plot again for free. We are very excited!
It means a lot to us. We really enjoy growing our own food and at your farm everything grows very well”- Sunset Vista Community Gardener, Plot Sponsorship Program  
 “Having  the plot is beneficial to us in many ways. Thank you for your kindness”- Sunset Vista Community Gardner, Plot Sponsorship Program

The Problem

The USDA reports that more than 1 in 5 children in the U.S. are living in a food-insecure home or a home where the members are consistently unable to access an adequate amount of nutritious food necessary for a healthy life.  A key cause of food-insecurity in the U.S. is the lack of sufficient resources to cover the cost of food in addition to meeting their basic needs.

Throughout Sussex County, New Jersey, there are families who do not have enough to eat. Often families in need consume food based on calories and not on the healthiest choice.  Many rely on local food pantries for support; however, hunger continues to be a daily part of life for these families.

A Solution  

At Sunset Vista Community Garden & Learning Center there is an additional resource for these families to obtain a daily source of nutritional healthy food.  Gardening provides access to produce and nutritionally rich foods that may otherwise be unavailable to low-income families and individuals.

Working together as a community on behalf of our neighbors in need we can give the gift of healthy food through our Garden Plot Sponsorship Program.

With as little as $5 you can help sponsor a 15 x 30  pesticide-free garden plot to help food-insecure families from Sussex County supplement their diets with healthy pesticide-free produce they grow themselves.  With the average plot producing over 225 pounds of fresh produce, these families can have a reliable source of nutritional food. In addition, families will work alongside other community gardeners to learn how to produce their own food for a life long impact.

Working in conjunction with local food pantries, families producing more than they can use will be encouraged to give back to their local food pantries in an effort to help other food-insecure families meet their nutritional dietary needs.

Thank you for Your Support!

.

story:
Pure Foods Fresh Featured in Canada's best news group

"We trust life is not just being alive, but being healthy"

Everyone likes to eat healthy foods to stay active and keep away from diseases. We are what we eat. We love cooking healthy foods for family and friends, however most of the time our busy schedule makes us to choose unhealthy food products without knowing their risks. 

Most people are eating unhealthy foods but do not know its hazards. One of the unknown risks taken by many of us daily is known as preservatives in food. Most of us learned that preservatives keep foods fresh but have you understood what those chemicals can do to our body if we consume them regularly? Not many of us know the risks behind those chemicals. 

Most of the studies show there is a possibility of getting health issues by taking chemicals such as Sulfites, Nitrates and Nitrites. So, we at Pure Foods Fresh started a revolution called Zero Preservative Campaign to create awareness to people about the causes of taking preservatives in their foods. 

As a first step to show the real taste of a sauce, we created a flavor sauce with the highest quality ingredients to keep its freshness and authenticity without compromising on taste. This is the real, raw deal.

We call it Trumato Sauce (True+Tomato) & South Western Green Pepper Sauce (SWGP) - 

Pure Foods Fresh Sauces has everything you asked for such as quality, taste, they are healthy and contain No Preservatives, No artificial colors, No MSG and they are Gluten free. 

Pure Foods Fresh Official Website:  www.purefoodsfresh.ca

TRUMATO SAUCE is a flavor sauce, it can be used as taste enhancer such as marinating Chicken, Fish, any meats and also it can be used as a Pizza Sauce, Pasta Sauce and as Dips for your evening snacks. It also comes in Mild & Hot flavor to choose according to your taste buds.

                            Trumato sauce can be used as a base for pizza
SOUTH WESTERN GREEN PEPPER SAUCE is a green sauce from Mexico, and can be used as a taste enhancer and for Baking Enchiladas, as a Dressing for Salads, Sauce for Fajitas, Burrito, Tacos and it can be used for Nachos as a Salsa.

Help us revolutionize zero preservative:

We are on a mission to help people to lead healthy lives by eating healthy foods. Now we need your support to be able to start the revolution of eating foods without any preservatives or chemicals. 

We have the product, logo and packaging, our next step is to operate from a commercial  kitchen to make available to your doorstep. The funds you are investing in will be used to purchase raw materials for manufacturing on a large scale. Your pledge will help to make pure foods fresh sauces without any preservatives & zero preservatives to a reality. Pledging for our campaign means you will be our first customer to taste our sauces which will be delivered directly to your doorsteps & best of all you help to create the revolution of zero preservative sauces.

What we've done so far & What we need:

Last year, we successfully started our trial basis production of Trumato Sauce in Calgary and asked for feedback from more than 100 people. The feedback has given us confidence to move ahead for larger scale production and given space for us to perfect the recipe, packaging and taste.

So far we've produced Pure Foods Fresh sauces in small batches. To be able to make available for a wide audience, we need to buy larger batches of ingredients and use an automatic packaging line. Reaching the campaign goal will help us produce Pure Foods Fresh sauces in larger scale without any preservatives and make available Zero Preservative sauces to the world.

Now we need your support to start producing Pure Foods Fresh Sauces for you and thousand of others and to create awareness about the chemicals in foods. In this process, we would like to educate more people through the campaign.

Ingredients:

                                  Trumato sauce made with real fresh ingredients

                                 SWGP sauce made with real fresh ingredients

We need CAD $ 6,300 to be able to produce, package and ship Pure Foods Fresh sauces on a large scale.

Once the campaign gets finished at the end of March, 2015. We start our work further as follows,

1) First, we source the highest quality natural ingredients from the best suppliers and start manufacturing in the commercial kitchen.

2) Packaging and labeling sauce bottles to deliver to the funders (approx 354ml/12Oz of sauce per bottle).

3) Logistics: Handling and shipping orders takes around 2-3 weeks after each fresh batch of Pure Foods Fresh sauces, prepared and packaged.

Taking into account the phases above, deliveries are estimated to start in May 2015 on first come, first serve basis. We are working hard to ship Pure Foods Fresh sauce to your door steps but any delays caused by supplier delivery schedule may affect us.

Pure Foods Fresh Website: www.purefoodsfresh.ca

Pure Foods Fresh Perks in Detail:

Pure Foods Fresh rewards for supporters 
For your every contribution, as a supporter for a great cause, your name will be published on our website as a supporter for the Zero Preservative Campaign.
  • Contribution from supporters with more than $10 get to taste the first batch of Preservative free sauces.
  • Limited Edition T-shirts, as a special offer and you can choose your preferred sizes as well.
  • Supporters can choose their preferred flavor sauces before delivering the products.

Risks and Challenges:

We've spent a considerable amount of effort to mitigate potential problems but some hurdles are inevitable. We will be fully transparent about any challenges that arise. These are the most obvious possibilities:

Product Changes: The taste was liked by many people and it totally depends on the personal taste of each person and it may vary for different persons.  As we improve our recipe based on feedback from fans, it is possible that we will make slight changes in the ingredients to suite for everyone. 

Supply Chain: We've spent a considerable amount of time in finding the highest quality ingredient suppliers, but increasing the scale might cause challenges to the availability of some ingredients. Furthermore, we are working with several partners to make the product great and a challenge that affects them could affect us.

Shipping Date: We've chosen the estimated shipping date conservatively to allow for potential delays. However, it's not impossible that problems that might force us to ship later than planned could arise.

Pure Foods Fresh Would Like to Thank:

In addition to YOU, our dear fans and supporters, we'd like to extend our warm thanks to Momentum Group (Frank Wolever, Jess Huffman and all other staffs),  Vishal Maharaj, Aman Maharaj, Stasys O'zelis, Russell Pearl, Dave Berry, Prasanth Remesh, Julia Harrington (Calgary Public Library), Parrthipan, Mathias, friends of momentum group and many people who helped us on our baby steps and make us to reach a new heights.

Please Share Our Message 

We hope you'll join us and we are thankful for your pledges. In addition to pledging, sharing this page in social media is very valuable and it might create awareness to your friends as well!

Pure Foods Fresh Website: www.purefoodsfresh.ca

story:
Short Summary

In October of 1948, my mother's parents wed. After having 7 children, 20 grandchildren, and 9 great grandchildren, they built a family I am proud to be a member of. After 66 years of marriage, WW2, the trials of raising 7 kids, cancer, a coma, and far more, their love for each other never faltered. In January of 2015, in the  middle of the night, my grandfather died. The only thing I can say is that it was painless, and faster than falling asleep. Our family struggled with the loss of this great man, but none so much as his wife of 66 years.

Aside from my parents and I, the whole family lives in rural Minnesota, a 1200 mile distance from suburban  Maryland, where I call home. When I flew out to be with my family, there was no funeral, no body to say goodbye to, just family; for you see, my grandparents were very givin, and are still, of all they had to share with the world. My grandparents both have it in their will to have their bodies donated to  medical research to further chances of saving lives of others down the road. Throughout their lives, this was the ideal they lived by. The greatest example was something kept a secret until after his death, you see, we found a letter my grandfather had written to the company he retired from; there were big layoffs coming, my grandfather was not going to lose his job, but a young man he was working with was. He offered to begin drawing his pension as long as they agreed to let this young man stay so he could support his family. Being so humble, he never told a soul, he was content knowing he did the right thing.


We all laughed, cried, and shared our fond memories. The day I left,I was finally able to sit in his chair and say goodbye. My mother took the image above of that goodbye. When I gave my grandmother a hug, teary-eyed to say farewell, the last thing she said was  don't forget me. How could I ever forget her? I  can't, but I  also can't let the last time I saw her be a memory of loss as well. Her health is failing, she can't feed herself, walk, or speak very well due to  Parkinson's and other issues, but she can and does love with all her heart. I  need to see her once more. 


Please  help me. 

What I Need

I'm a young man, working hard to just get by, I'm comfortable, but don't have a disposable income to speak of. There's no way I could afford to set aside the money for plane tickets, a car rental, and lodging before most of this year is gone.

Even partial funding would make a world of difference, just to see her once more. 

Impact 

I know that I have been long winded already. However, as much as it pains me to say, the last time I saw my grandfather, it wasn't easy. I married a man, and it's not something he could understand or support. While that parting was painful, and made me very sad, I know he still loved me, and I still love him. We never spoke again after that, and now I never have the chance to. Please, I have already had one painful goodbyes. I  can't let this one be tainted by sorrow too.

Any additional funds on top of what is actually needed will be donated to St. Jude's Children's Hospital in the spirit of  furthering medical research, just like my grandparents last wish

Risks & Challenges

The longer it takes to reach my funding goal, the higher air fare goes, the sooner we reach it together, the easier it will be. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have a way to get me from Maryland to Minnesota, promo codes for travel, lodging, or car rentals, anything to help in this endeavor

story:
The Ebola Home Health Kit 

When the Ebola epidemic began to spread, many of us wanted to help, but didn't know how best to do it. The epidemic is not over! 

The Ebola Home Health Kit as created and distributed by Dr. Dan Kelly and implemented by Shine On Sierra Leone is a way to help stop the spread of Ebola in Sierra Leone as well as support long term health care infrastructure in the country.  


Dr. Dan Kelly, Infectious Disease Specialist and leading authority on the Ebola response examining the contents of the first 20 Home Health Kits (HHK) to be distributed in Kono, Sierra Leone. 

We are still in the midst of the worst Ebola outbreak in history. Over the past few weeks, the situation worsened dramatically when the first case of Ebola Virus was identified in Kono District of Sierra Leone--just miles from the clinic where UCSF researchers have provided public health programs and care for patients for several years. Ebola is now in nearly every district of Sierra Leone and much of the public healthcare system is in panic after the tragic death of Sierra Leone's top Ebola physician, Dr. Sheik Umar Khan.

Your support will help us continue to implement our response plan to treat and prevent the spread of ebola among this vulnerable population. This includes:

  *  Operating a nationwide distribution network for emergency medications and supplies from our international partners

  *  Supporting the Ebola isolation and referral center at Kono's Public Hospital

  *    Implementing strict screening and control measures at our facility in Sierra Leone

  *  Coordinating emergency referrals to Ebola treatment centers in Kailahun District

  *  Collaborating with the District Health Management Team to implement effective contact tracing and sensitive community engagement.

To learn more about Ebola in Sierra Leone and our response efforts, check out our recent media appearances below:

Dr. Kelly's work with Wellbody alliance was featured on the CBS Evening News on September 16.

A recent San Francisco Chronicle article about Dr. Kelly's work in Sierra Leone.

An Al Jazeera interview with Dr. Kelly regarding the risks involved in his work in Sierra Leone.

An International Business Times article about President Obama's plan to fight Ebola.

A Huffington Post interview with Wellbody’s Executive Director, revealing the greatest needs on the ground and relates to the fearful reactions of local communities

A NBC interview (video) featuring Dr. Dan Kelly, our Co-Founder and Chief Strategic in which he discusses the fear and distrust in the community and explains why such a reaction has occurred 

An ABC profile on our Executive Director that details his personal motivations and experiences, in addition to his perspective on the Ebola outbreak"

An op-ed by Dan Kelly, MD, on the urgent need to protect West African health care workers from Ebola.

An article in Nature that features our work in Sierra Leone.

Coverage in the Washington Post regarding Dan and Shine On Sierra Leone's work so far.

Gifts will not only help us treat and prevent ebola but will also help us continue to train local villagers to serve as public health workers who can stop the spread of the virus in their own community.

If you’re interested in learning more about making a major gift to this campaign, please contact Pellagia Muliba Gambiza  pellagia.muliba@gmail.com

For more information 

Grassroots implementing organization: Shine On Sierra Leone, 

Support from IDEO on iterative design.


Please consider a donation today!



Dr. Dan Kelly examining supplies for the first 20 HHKs


What am I paying for by supporting this campaign?

WHAT'S IN THE KIT? Piloting Enhanced Kits

The below listed are some of the contents being piloted. All kits will include the basics. Dr. Dan Kelly and Community Health Workers will determine what others are necessary for Phase 2 rollout. 


HOW IS THE HHK PART OF SUSTAINABLE SUPPORT?

This sustainable response is designed to meet immediate emergency needs while simultaneously using it's donated dollars to return jobs to the region and leverage an existing reliable infrastructure. 

When you donate a kit, you are participating in the first phase of a comprehensive plan to invest in long term change through private and public partnerships that can reach populations in effective ways.  



MORE ABOUT THE IMPLEMENTING PARTNER- SHINE ON SIERRA LEONE

Shine On Sierra Leone is an innovative 501c3 organization that fosters integrative programs on sustainable health care, education, microfinance, and development in Sierra Leone. A land of defiant optimism in the face of brutal war-torn experiences, the resilient citizens of Sierra Leone believe in a bright and more abundant future. Shine On’s mission is to create that future of an interdependent country.

For the past 8 years, Shine On has been one of the most effective and forward-thinking organization in Sierra Leone, facilitating socially progressive partnerships between Sierra Leoneans and the West. Shine On encourages deep connection with the community and motivates them to be architects of their present and future. As a partnership, Shine On funded and built the first architecturally sustainable primary school in Sierra Leone. Muddy Lotus now offers a free and excellent education for over 350 students each year.

Shine On also partnered with the First Lady of Sierra Leone and Wellbody Alliance to launch a Maternal and Child Health Care Program in 2010. Since its inception, more than 30,000 women and children have received annual medical treatment. Additionally, Shine On has trained over 12,000 individuals to become computer literate, teamed up with Waves for Water to provide over 100 million gallons of clean water for 30,000 people in the next 10 years, and partnered with the Lower East Side Girls Club of New York to found the Girls Club of Sierra Leone to provide mentorship, female health and hygiene, entrepreneurial skills to young girls in Kono.

Today, Shine On is leading the Ebola response in the Kono region. At the onset of the outbreak, Shine On dispersed 800 sanitation stations to serve over 2,000 individuals along with door-to-door dialogue, discussion and health education. Now teamed up with Dr. Dan Kelly, Infectious Disease Specialist and leading authority on the Ebola response, Shine On is creating and distributing Home Health Care Kits to families in Sierra Leone. These special kits are designed to allow caregivers to nurse their loved ones back to health without contracting Ebola themselves. Each kit includes the necessary supplies for a 21-day quarantine as well as training and salary for a Community Health Worker to support the families.

With no adequate health care or hospital nearby, Shine On wants to provide the entire Kono region and beyond with Home Health Care Kits and Community Health Workers to responsibly eradicate Ebola for good.


JOIN US

You can help stop the spread of Ebola now by donating to this campaign, spreading this to your network, donating supplies or coming to an event. Everything helps!
story_txt:
The Ebola Home Health Kit 

When the Ebola epidemic began to spread, many of us wanted to help, but didn't know how best to do it. The epidemic is not over! 
The Ebola Home Health Kit as created and distributed by Dr. Dan Kelly and implemented by Shine On Sierra Leone is a way to help stop the spread of Ebola in Sierra Leone as well as support long term health care infrastructure in the country.  


Dr. Dan Kelly, Infectious Disease Specialist and leading authority on the Ebola response examining the contents of the first 20 Home Health Kits (HHK) to be distributed in Kono, Sierra Leone. 



We are still in the midst of the worst Ebola outbreak in history. Over the past few weeks, the situation worsened dramatically when the first case of Ebola Virus was identified in Kono District of Sierra Leone--just miles from the clinic where UCSF researchers have provided public health programs and care for patients for several years. Ebola is now in nearly every district of Sierra Leone and much of the public healthcare system is in panic after the tragic death of Sierra Leone's top Ebola physician, Dr. Sheik Umar Khan.
Your support will help us continue to implement our response plan to treat and prevent the spread of ebola among this vulnerable population. This includes:
  *  Operating a nationwide distribution network for emergency medications and supplies from our international partners
  *  Supporting the Ebola isolation and referral center at Kono's Public Hospital
  *    Implementing strict screening and control measures at our facility in Sierra Leone
  *  Coordinating emergency referrals to Ebola treatment centers in Kailahun District
  *  Collaborating with the District Health Management Team to implement effective contact tracing and sensitive community engagement.
To learn more about Ebola in Sierra Leone and our response efforts, check out our recent media appearances below:
Dr. Kelly's work with Wellbody alliance was featured on the CBS Evening News on September 16.
A recent San Francisco Chronicle article about Dr. Kelly's work in Sierra Leone.
An Al Jazeera interview with Dr. Kelly regarding the risks involved in his work in Sierra Leone.
An International Business Times article about President Obama's plan to fight Ebola.
A Huffington Post interview with Wellbody’s Executive Director, revealing the greatest needs on the ground and relates to the fearful reactions of local communities
A NBC interview (video) featuring Dr. Dan Kelly, our Co-Founder and Chief Strategic in which he discusses the fear and distrust in the community and explains why such a reaction has occurred 
An ABC profile on our Executive Director that details his personal motivations and experiences, in addition to his perspective on the Ebola outbreak"
An op-ed by Dan Kelly, MD, on the urgent need to protect West African health care workers from Ebola.
An article in Nature that features our work in Sierra Leone.
Coverage in the Washington Post regarding Dan and Shine On Sierra Leone's work so far.
Gifts will not only help us treat and prevent ebola but will also help us continue to train local villagers to serve as public health workers who can stop the spread of the virus in their own community.
If you’re interested in learning more about making a major gift to this campaign, please contact Pellagia Muliba Gambiza  pellagia.muliba@gmail.com
For more information 

Grassroots implementing organization: Shine On Sierra Leone, 
Support from IDEO on iterative design.
Please consider a donation today!



Dr. Dan Kelly examining supplies for the first 20 HHKs

What am I paying for by supporting this campaign?
WHAT'S IN THE KIT? Piloting Enhanced Kits
The below listed are some of the contents being piloted. All kits will include the basics. Dr. Dan Kelly and Community Health Workers will determine what others are necessary for Phase 2 rollout.

story:
Colors of Hope is dedicated to saving the lives of children with type 1 diabetes and children with asthma, in developing countries. We have partnered with a great organization, Imani Xchange, to create our own hand bag line called Southern Wings of Hope. Imani Xchange has 16 beautiful women in Kenya that work hard on creating our bags. We then will sell our bags here in the USA and around the world. The proceeds from the sell of our bags will not only provide these amazing women with jobs but also funnel back into Colors of Hope to provide the medical care for children with type 1 diabetes and asthma. 

We are so excited about what God is doing!  In order to increase our quality and our production we need adequate equipment. This expansion will provide even more women with jobs and create a dynamic hand bag line everyone is sure to love!
We thank you for your love and support!

story:
Who Are We?

Hello there! My name is Shane Shahrestani and I'm the President of Discovering Dialysis, a non-profit organization that strives to provide third world countries with sufficient dialysis care.  I work with a few of my close friends to raise money with the objective of helping communities worldwide face and conquer kidney diseases that require machines and technology that is unavailable.  Currently, El Salvador is the country that is suffering from the greatest amount of kidney diseases, with a mortality rate of 61.2 people per 100,000, and our goal is to lower this number below the 60's.  We can only do this with your help.

What's Needed?

Because we're a recently founded non-profit organization, we rely especially on donations to raise enough money to purchase dialysis machines, which run around $2000 per refurbished system.  We will put every cent of each donation towards our dialysis fund, and every donation no matter how big or how small will leave us one step closer to providing accessible medical care for underprivileged dialysis patients.  Every cent counts!

How Do We Show Our Thanks?

For all donations of $30 or more, one of us here at Discovering Dialysis will write a hand written letter to your home address expressing how thankful we are for your donation and how your money will be spent to save lives.  For all donations of $80 or more, you will receive the aforementioned letter as well as a personalized rap/poem written by yours truly expressing how thankful I am for your donation.

What's The Impact?

Our project is important for one simple reason: it saves lives.  We as an organization are investing in machines that will be around for years to come, and these machines will facilitate the lives of human beings who lack access to similar technologies because of their geographic location.  We are investing in them.  We hope that you invest in us.

What Are Our Challenges?

Us here at Discovering Dialysis are all either college or high school students.  We are not marketing connoisseurs, nor are we wealthy entrepreneurs.  However, what we are is passionate and determined.  We will stop at nothing to provide dialysis equipment to places where it is needed most.  We are united in a cause that is bigger than us, and rather than being intimidated by the challenge, we choose to challenge ourselves.  We encourage you to join the challenge too.


We dare you to discover.
