story:
Runners deserve a breakfast of champions! 



Runner's Delight is the first fortified instant porridge designed by runners for runners.

We are fundraising to kickstart production of the first batch - and porridge is not our last word! Make this breakfast of champions happen!

Runner’s Delight addresses your special needs to make you a stronger, healthier and happier runner!



Each of the 9 flavours was enriched with a specially designed combination of vitamins, minerals, natural enzymes and antioxidants  (carry on reading for more details!) serving a specific function for optimal health and performance of the runner and helping to combat the most frequent running niggles



About us

 

Emilia

Since 2014 she managed to run her first marathon and three halves, and that’s not her last word yet.  When not running, you can find her reading about her several areas of interest. Especially keen on sports nutrition, Emilia stands behind Runner’s Delight’s research and development. She also loves writing, both in her day-job as a translator and on her blog (http://runnersdelightblog.blogspot.com/), travelling and experimenting with her own recipes. She has a lot of goals and is determined to make them happen. Runner’s Delight is one of them.

Adam

Although he has worked in many branches of industry, ranging from banking to the marketing departments of big companies, he gets most satisfaction from working on his own projects. In his free time, you can find Adam reading or in his DIY-land refurbishing old bikes or creating pretty things out of scrap wood. Or working hard on the graphic design and web-development end of Runner’s Delight so that we can deliver super-porridge to your door as soon as possible. Adam also enjoys good music and can play you Comptine d'un autre été on the piano.


About the project

Why porridge?


Porridge is a perfect energy source for runners.


It’s rich in complex carbs and has a moderate glycemic index (GI = 58), which makes it a sustainable energy source, releasing energy over a longer period of time. Moreover, it’s a great source of soluble fibre 0- beta glucan - which can help prevent cardiovascular diseases and manage weight. You can eat it both savoury and sweet, and there are endless exciting options. Porridge is pure goodness :)


Humble beginnings…


The idea popped into Emilia’s head in the summer of 2014 when she was preparing for her first marathon with her runner-roomies.

For the next few months we have worked hard to identify the core needs of endurance athletes, the most frequent running niggles and which natural nutrients could help to combat them. We have developed ninedeliciousflavours,each serving a different function. The 9 supplement mixes we are going to add to our porridge will help you towards achieving your different running-health goals:

  1. optimal start weight (RED)

  2. aiding muscle recovery (GREEN)

  3. combating vitamin deficiencies (WHITE)

  4. preventing GI distress (BLACK)

  5. optimal energy (BROWN)

  6. optimal hydration (YELLOW)

  7. optimal endurance (CHERRY)

  8. boosting the immune system (PURPLE)

  9. fighting inflammation (ORANGE)

What’s the difference between Runner’s Delight and regular porridge?


Runner’s Delight’s super-ingredients!

#RED sweet chilli porridge

FAT BURNER (Fuel, Training)

L­-carnitine + capsaicin + caffeine + coconut oil

A lighter runner is a faster runner. For those of us looking to shed a few pounds to reach their perfect start weight for the big day ­ RED Runner’s Delight should find its way into our menu. Chilli is a source of natural capsaicin, which helps ratchet up metabolism. The effect is further enhanced by added caffeine and L­-carnitine, known to help the metabolism of fatty acids in mitochondria. An addition of coconut oil makes it a perfect source of Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCTs), which unlike other fats can be used as a quick energy source without increasing blood sugar level.

#WHITE plain vanilla porridge

VITAMIN SHOT (Fuel, Training)

100% DRI of all water-­soluble vitamins

Plain vanilla, no frills: a simple multivitamin covering you Daily Recommended Intake of water­-soluble vitamins. We swapped sugar for stevia to make this sweet treat even sweeter …and guilt­-free. A good start to your day.


#BLACK dark chocolate porridge

RACE DAY (Fuel, Race)

cocoa flavonoids + tannins + caffeine

We all know how important it is to watch what you eat in the run up to a big event. Simple carbs, little fibre, no spicy or heavy food ­ nothing that could upset your stomach. Many runners fear it so much they decide to run on empty…which is not a good idea. BLACK Runner’s Delight addresses the much-­feared mid-­race need to run: its reduced fibre content combined with added cocoa flavonoids and tannins known for their antidiarrhetic properties will make you feel fuelled and confident on the race day, and the added caffeine will cater for an extra energy boost.

#PURPLE Blueberry muffin porridge

IMMUNE SYSTEM (Fuel, Training /Race)

zinc + vitamin C + berberine + anthocyanins

Packed with zink​, natural vitamin C​ and anthocyanins ​from goi berries, acai berries, blueberries, barberries,​ tart cherries and dried barberry leaves (containing natural berberine),the PURPLE Runner’s Delight, thanks to its strong anti-­inflammatory and anti­oxidative effect, is a real immune system booster​. Plus, it’s the only blueberry muffin that won’t give you muffin tops.

#YELLOW banana & peanut butter porridge

HYDRATION (Fuel, Race / Training)

L­-citrulline + ions (Na, K, Ca, Mg)

L-­citrulline, a natural compound found in watermelons, has been found to improve VO2max and reduce muscle fatigue. You would have to down a whole pint of watermelon juice to absorb the recommended 10 mg of the nutrient which simply isn’t feasible before a run though. Instead, you can now enjoy banana & peanut butter flavoured Runner’s Delight with added citrulline and ions.


#CHERRY cherry tart porridge

ENDURANCE (Fuel, Race / Training)

beetroot + iron + vitamin C

Beetroots are a natural source of betaine and nitrates ((NO(3­)), ​which have acutely positive effects​ on the efficiency of the cardiovascular system. And addition of iron and vitamin C further enhance the positive effects.


#BROWN mocca porridge

ENERGY (Fuel, Race)

caffeine, maltodextrin

Caffeine is great for races, but too much coffee sloshing around your stomach can send you on a toilet run. Try BROWN Runner’s Delight with reduced fibre, added caffeine (1 00 mg per sachet) and balanced carbs with different IGs for sustained energy release. Tastes better than coffee!


#GREEN Cream cheese & herbs bagel

MUSCLE RECOVERY (Recovery, Training)

BCAA + bromelain + rutin

We have developed a special formula with added protein, branch chain amino-acids and the natural enzyme bromelain ​to foster post-­run muscle recovery and promote joint health. The RUTIN + BROMELAIN combination (natural glycosides and enzymes) has anti­-inflammatory properties and is even prescribed to treat inflammation and osteoarthritis . Several studies have found bromelain to be as effective in pain and inflammation management as Non-steroidal anti-­inflammatory drugs, without the adverse effects associated with the prolonged use of NSAIDs like ibuprofen (e.g. gastrointestinal side­-effects). It can prove effective against Iliotibial Band Syndrome (ITBS), the most common knee injury in runners according to recent studies. Now you can indulge in the delicious flavour of cream cheese bagels and boost your joint and muscle health at the same time.


#ORANGE Tikka masala porridge

ANTI­INFLAMMATION (Recovery, Training)

ginger + turmeric + B­vitamins

Another shot of anti-­inflammatory agents: natural gingerols and curcumin found in ginger and turmeric work wonders for an upset stomach lining as well as sore muscles. It’s also packed with B-­vitamins which improve energy efficiency and have mood­-enhancing effects. Who doesn’t want this runners’ high to last a bit longer? Especially if it tastes like the good indian curry you’ve been denying yourself for so long?


Fundraising Goals

Basic goal – £ 12,000 - lab development, taste-tests of the 9 supplement mixes and kick-starting the production of the first order

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The estimated cost of developing and testing one mix is about £550 . Multiplied by 9 - this gives nearly £ 5000.


Ingredients, packaging and assembly of the first order - £ 4000

Shipping & Delivery -  £ 1000

Emergency money - for all we haven’t thought of… - £ 2000

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TOTAL: min £ 12,000


STREACH GOALS:

£ 15,000 - Work on our next products - Runner’s Delight Supplements, GELLO! & Runner’s Delight Porridge Energy Bars

£ 20,000 + - More exciting products for runners in the pipeline: Runner’s Delight recovery drinks & Runner’s Delight natural nut butter spreads

...coz we love good runner’s food!

Rewards:



£1 - I will run a mile for you


£2 - I will run two miles for you!

And send you a photo from the run via email


£5 -I will run 5k for you and send you a selfie from the run ;)


 

£5 - Adam will play Comptine d'un autre été for you and send it to you via email in a chosen format



£7 - 5 sachets of Runner’s Delight porridge

You choose the flavours!



£10 - 9 sachets of Runner’s Delight porridge!

Great value! All the 9 flavours!




£15 Beat the wall! running T-Shirt  Show everyone you’ve beaten the wall by sporting one of our great technical T-Shirt designs.



£15 Beat the wall! Runner's Delight Water Bottle 

 + 

£20 Beat the wall! running T-Shirt  + 5 sachets of Runner’s Delight porridge

Oh that’s a good deal! 


£20 Beat the wall! B900 Morf™ Original + 5 sachets of Runner’s Delight porridge



£25 - A BUMPER pack of 25 sachets ...so that you don’t run out too soon (pun intended)



 + 

£30 - beatthewall running T-Shirt + 18 sachets of Runner’s Delight porridge

Oh that’s an even better deal!


 + 

£50 - Design your own flavour! (a pack of five)

YOUR - OWN - PORRIDGE- FLAVOUR. How cool is that? Tell us what you need & like and we will create your favourite flavour, call it after you (e.g. Emilia’s Porridge) and even print your face (ekhm…) on the sachet if you like! A great gift idea for an avid runner! You will get five sachets of this pure magic.



£75 - 13.1 / 26.2 Silver charm pendant / dog tag + 3 sachets of Runner’s Delight- a perfect gift for a newly minted (half) marathoner



  +  + 

£99 - Design your three favourite flavours! (three packs of three) + Customized T-Shirt!

A great gift idea for an avid runner! Beautifully packed in an elegant wooden box! You will get a set of 3 x 3 sachets of your bespoke flavour (you can call it after your friend - e.g. Adam’s Porridge) and even print their face (ekhm…) on the sachet if you like!) + a customized T-shirt with the colour and  text of your choice 


CORPORATE BACKERS:

£100 - I will run a 10 k event for you, sporting a logo of your company on my T-Shirt. (I choose the location)

£300 - I will run a half-marathon for you, sporting a logo of your company on my T-Shirt.  (I choose the location)

Risks & Challenges

The greatest challenge we are facing now is to develop the supplement mixes in such way that they don’t change our delicious flavours. That’s why we are raising money to run all the lab taste-tests and develop bespoke formulas that will be virtually flavourless.


Contingency plan: we are not going to compromise on either taste or the health benefits! If it turns out we need to opt out of adding certain supplements directly into our porridge, we will provide them in the form of capsules along with a clean, lite version of the given flavour.


What if we don’t reach the fundraising goal?

We will need to produce a ‘lite’ version of our porridge, i.e. without the added supplements for the time being.

Other Ways You Can Help

Sharing is caring! Please share the campaign link on your social media profile! 

Would you like to order some free samples before you decide to support us? 

Write: emilia@runnersdelight.eu or adam@runnersdelight.eu 

Feel free to contact us if you have any questions! 

Let's make this breakfast of champions happen!

Plain vanilla, no frills: a simple multivitamin covering you Daily Recommended Intake of water­-soluble vitamins. We swapped sugar for stevia to make this sweet treat even sweeter …and guilt­-free. A good start to your day.




#BLACK dark chocolate porridge
RACE DAY (Fuel, Race)
cocoa flavonoids + tannins + caffeine
We all know how important it is to watch what you eat in the run up to a big event. Simple carbs, little fibre, no spicy or heavy food ­ nothing that could upset your stomach. Many runners fear it so much they decide to run on empty…which is not a good idea. BLACK Runner’s Delight addresses the much-­feared mid-­race need to run: its reduced fibre content combined with added cocoa flavonoids and tannins known for their antidiarrhetic properties will make you feel fuelled and confident on the race day, and the added caffeine will cater for an extra energy boost.




#PURPLE Blueberry muffin porridge
IMMUNE SYSTEM (Fuel, Training /Race)
zinc + vitamin C + berberine + anthocyanins
Packed with zink​, natural vitamin C​ and anthocyanins ​from goi berries, acai berries, blueberries, barberries,​ tart cherries and dried barberry leaves (containing natural berberine),the PURPLE Runner’s Delight, thanks to its strong anti-­inflammatory and anti­oxidative effect, is a real immune system booster​. Plus, it’s the only blueberry muffin that won’t give you muffin tops.

#YELLOW banana & peanut butter porridge
HYDRATION (Fuel, Race / Training)
L­-citrulline + ions (Na, K, Ca, Mg)
L-­citrulline, a natural compound found in watermelons, has been found to improve VO2max and reduce muscle fatigue. You would have to down a whole pint of watermelon juice to absorb the recommended 10 mg of the nutrient which simply isn’t feasible before a run though. Instead, you can now enjoy banana & peanut butter flavoured Runner’s Delight with added citrulline and ions.

#CHERRY cherry tart porridge
ENDURANCE (Fuel, Race / Training)
beetroot + iron + vitamin C
Beetroots are a natural source of betaine and nitrates ((NO(3­)), ​which have acutely positive effects​ on the efficiency of the cardiovascular system. And addition of iron and vitamin C further enhance the positive effects.


#BROWN mocca porridge
ENERGY (Fuel, Race)
caffeine, maltodextrin
Caffeine is great for races, but too much coffee sloshing around your stomach can send you on a toilet run. Try BROWN Runner’s Delight with reduced fibre, added caffeine (1 00 mg per sachet) and balanced carbs with different IGs for sustained energy release. Tastes better than coffee!


#GREEN Cream cheese & herbs bagel
MUSCLE RECOVERY (Recovery, Training)
BCAA + bromelain + rutin
We have developed a special formula with added protein, branch chain amino-acids and the natural enzyme bromelain ​to foster post-­run muscle recovery and promote joint health. The RUTIN + BROMELAIN combination (natural glycosides and enzymes) has anti­-inflammatory properties and is even prescribed to treat inflammation and osteoarthritis . Several studies have found bromelain to be as effective in pain and inflammation management as Non-steroidal anti-­inflammatory drugs, without the adverse effects associated with the prolonged use of NSAIDs like ibuprofen (e.g. gastrointestinal side­-effects). It can prove effective against Iliotibial Band Syndrome (ITBS), the most common knee injury in runners according to recent studies. Now you can indulge in the delicious flavour of cream cheese bagels and boost your joint and muscle health at the same time.


#ORANGE Tikka masala porridge
ANTI­INFLAMMATION (Recovery, Training)
ginger + turmeric + B­vitamins
Another shot of anti-­inflammatory agents: natural gingerols and curcumin found in ginger and turmeric work wonders for an upset stomach lining as well as sore muscles. It’s also packed with B-­vitamins which improve energy efficiency and have mood­-enhancing effects. Who doesn’t want this runners’ high to last a bit longer? Especially if it tastes like the good indian curry you’ve been denying yourself for so long?


Fundraising Goals


Basic goal – £ 12,000 - lab development, taste-tests of the 9 supplement mixes and kick-starting the production of the first order

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The estimated cost of developing and testing one mix is about £550 . Multiplied by 9 - this gives nearly £ 5000. 
Ingredients, packaging and assembly of the first order - £ 4000 
Shipping & Delivery -  £ 1000
Emergency money - for all we haven’t thought of… - £ 2000
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TOTAL: min £ 12,000
STREACH GOALS: 
£ 15,000 - Work on our next products - Runner’s Delight Supplements, GELLO! & Runner’s Delight Porridge Energy Bars 
£ 20,000 + - More exciting products for runners in the pipeline: Runner’s Delight recovery drinks & Runner’s Delight natural nut butter spreads
...coz we love good runner’s food!   Rewards:



£1 - I will run a mile for you

£2 - I will run two miles for you! 
And send you a photo from the run via email

£5 -I will run 5k for you and send you a selfie from the run ;) 
  
£5 - Adam will play Comptine d'un autre été for you and send it to you via email in a chosen format 
£7 - 5 sachets of Runner’s Delight porridge 
You choose the flavours! 
£10 - 9 sachets of Runner’s Delight porridge! 
Great value! All the 9 flavours! 









£15 Beat the wall! running T-Shirt  Show everyone you’ve beaten the wall by sporting one of our great technical T-Shirt designs.




£15 Beat the wall! Runner's Delight Water Bottle  + £20 Beat the wall! running T-Shirt  + 5 sachets of Runner’s Delight porridge
Oh that’s a good deal! 




£20 Beat the wall! B900 Morf™ Original + 5 sachets of Runner’s Delight porridge

£25 - A BUMPER pack of 25 sachets ...so that you don’t run out too soon (pun intended) 
 + £30 - beatthewall running T-Shirt + 18 sachets of Runner’s Delight porridge
Oh that’s an even better deal! 
 + £50 - Design your own flavour! (a pack of five) 
YOUR - OWN - PORRIDGE- FLAVOUR. How cool is that? Tell us what you need & like and we will create your favourite flavour, call it after you (e.g. Emilia’s Porridge) and even print your face (ekhm…) on the sachet if you like! A great gift idea for an avid runner! You will get five sachets of this pure magic.
£75 - 13.1 / 26.2 Silver charm pendant / dog tag + 3 sachets of Runner’s Delight- a perfect gift for a newly minted (half) marathoner 
  +  + 


£99 - Design your three favourite flavours! (three packs of three) + Customized T-Shirt!
 A great gift idea for an avid runner! Beautifully packed in an elegant wooden box! You will get a set of 3 x 3 sachets of your bespoke flavour (you can call it after your friend - e.g. Adam’s Porridge) and even print their face (ekhm…) on the sachet if you like!) + a customized T-shirt with the colour and  text of your choice 
CORPORATE BACKERS: 
£100 - I will run a 10 k event for you, sporting a logo of your company on my T-Shirt. (I choose the location)£300 - I will run a half-marathon for you, sporting a logo of your company on my T-Shirt.  (I choose the location)

    

Risks & Challenges
The greatest challenge we are facing now is to develop the supplement mixes in such way that they don’t change our delicious flavours. That’s why we are raising money to run all the lab taste-tests and develop bespoke formulas that will be virtually flavourless. 
Contingency plan: we are not going to compromise on either taste or the health benefits! If it turns out we need to opt out of adding certain supplements directly into our porridge, we will provide them in the form of capsules along with a clean, lite version of the given flavour. 
What if we don’t reach the fundraising goal? We will need to produce a ‘lite’ version of our porridge, i.e. without the added supplements for the time being.   Other Ways You Can Help Sharing is caring! Please share the campaign link on your social media profile! 
Would you like to order some free samples before you decide to support us? 
Write: emilia@runnersdelight.eu or adam@runnersdelight.eu 
Feel free to contact us if you have any questions! 
Let's make this breakfast of champions happen!

story:
"Booster Seat"

Kentucky Sidesaddle is a newly revived affiliate club of the American Sidesaddle Association.

Our mission is to connect those interested in learning to ride aside, and to provide educational opportunities in the form of lessons and clinics with certified instructors. 

The good news: Since re-forming the club in July 2014, we've hosted 1 clinic, and have grown to 20 members. We now have requests for more clinics and private lessons, and the club has been invited to ride in a prestigious summer event.

Our Challenge: We don't have immediate access to enough safe sidesaddles to cover the demand for lessons and clinics.

Details

We are hoping to raise $2000. The fund will be used toward the purchase of at least one sidesaddle, in good repair, that will be the property of the club and housed with one of the club officers. 

Any balance left over from the original $2000 (if met) after saddle purchase will be held in a designated account for saddle repair.

Funds raised short of the goal will also go into a designated fund specifically for future saddle purchase and repair.

Funds raised in excess of the original goal will be divided for the following purposes:

  • Saddle maintenance and repair.
  • Research and Development of a safe, sound, entry-level priced sidesaddle.
  • Educational opportunities, such as clinics.

Putting "Seats in seats"

Sidesaddles are relatively rare and well-made sidesaddles are highly prized. The old English and American models are now aging beyond 60 years and do need restoration and maintenance. Collectors tend to hang on to them, and when they do decide to sell, sometimes demand $3,000+.

There are very few new sidesaddles being produced. Those that are are separated by a large divide: 

"Affordable" = Improperly made Asian imports.  

"Elite" = Custom build by Master Saddlers. 

Work by the master saddlers should never be discounted. It's just unrealistic for people just starting out, not knowing if they will enjoy the sport, to take that expense. Unfortunately, the "affordables" often aren't, as many are not built, nor balanced correctly, and sometimes hide dangerous flaws.

Our goal is to capitalize on deals found on the old-name saddles as they come up for sale in various venues. Beyond that, we'd really like to try to develop a properly produced entry-level model. 

In a nutshell, we wish to put seats in seats.

An example of an old name sidesaddle privately acquired via Craig's list ad for under $2K.

Risks & Rewards

The risk is in not raising any funds. We understand that times are tough, and that any sport is a luxury. We're trying to preserve a sport that is also an art form, and which has a practical purpose for riders with disabilities that prevent them from riding astride. 

Our membership isn't wealthy, but we are resourceful. We may have to borrow saddles for a while longer, and host a few bake sales.

  • We are a friendly, open group and we invite you to visit us online: www.kentuckysidesaddle.com. We'll put up a booster blog on the site.
  • We also invite you to join our Facebook group, www.facebook.com/groups/KYSidesaddle/, where you can be a part of the daily conversations. The current excitement surrounds Spring and Summer event invitations and related costuming preparation.

Honorary Boosters

As the Facebook saying goes, "Like and Share". We understand that not everyone can back the campaign financially. That's okay! If you believe in the cause, a simple share to get the word out is greatly appreciated. Indiegogo makes it easy.
Cheers!

story:
Sports For Impact (SD4I) is an Illinois 501c3 with operations currently in Nicaragua. 

Beginning in 2013, Sports For Impact has been executing a $100,000 grant distrubuted by the US Embassy in Managua, Nicaragua (through a US State Department initiative titled CARSI) based on youth and community development.  Our contract with the Embassy began on Sept 9th 2013, and runs until August 15th 2015. 

Our Nicaragua Boxing Program has 3 gyms at different sites throughout the county.  Each site offers training 3 times a day, Monday – Friday at no cost to the youth.  Accomplishments to date include:

·  Opened 3 Boxing Gyms in the cities of Granada and Muelle de los Bueyes

·  Received over 10,000 Visits from youth participants at our training sites  

·  Maintained 94 Consistent students, 19 of which are female (20%)

·  Held 22 Boxing Events (15 in Granada, 7 in Muelle)

·  Reached over 7,000 spectators through our events

·  Employ a direct staff of 9 Employees.

Sports For Impact is proud to announce that as of April 2015, we will offically begin operations in the Chicagoland area, by launching a 6 week Soccer program with Oak Terrace Elementary School in Highwood.  This school has 540 children, and 73% of the families are considered to be Low Income.

The free program will consist of basic training, team-work and other fun activities strucuted in order to ensure maximum impact for the youth.  We aim to use this program as a ”Pilot” in order to structure a sustainable plan that would allow high-shool athletes to work 1 on 1 with elementary school kids.

In order to execute this program, Sports For Impact is raising $2,000 in order to pay for:

  • Equipment
  • Snacks
  • Coaches Stipend (High-School Students)

We are actively seeking donations of both FUNDS and EQUIPMENT in order to help make this program a possiblility.  Any donation is a pledge towards creating positive impact in the Chicago-land area through the use of organized sports.

Please do not hesisitate to ask if you have any questions regarding our NGO.

Best Regards,

Oren Pollack

story:
Isabella's Clearly focused on a beautiful and a natural you

When Isabella (my oldest daughter) excitedly shared with me about how she'd learned to use a combination of natural pure oils and salts to take care of her hair and skin, I had no idea it would lead us to where we are today! Turns out Isabella had learned secrets about using mother nature’s beauty ingredients from her  grandmothers.  Isabella's enthusiasm spread to Angelina (her younger sister), and the two of them began making their own homemade and 100% natural beauty products! We have been so moved that we were drawn in to help out our girls. 

Here we are today, we've got a little family partnership going, some help and created Isabella's Clearly, a 100% natural products for the hair, skin and body products.  So far, the interest and feedback for our products have been overwhelming and supportive. People have told us that they love the products as much as we do, it's been very encouraging.  Our adventure so far has made us realize that, as passionate as we are, we need help growing as a business to make our products available to everyone.

We started this campaign to get some help creating more of the products that we and our customers love, and get them into your hands through help with distribution and marketing.

Your contribution helps us meet our goals and gets us closer to the dream we've set on that day Isabella opened my eyes to natural-only beauty products.  You will help us get Isabella's Clearly natural products out to share with the world.

Thank you so much for your time and help!

- Isabella, Angelina and Dad

Our current products

  • Clearly LONG – Naturally Stimulates Hair Growth 
  • Clearly FREE – Flake Free Healthy Scalp
  • Clearly LUXE – Soothing and Relaxing Bath 
  • Clearly SOFT – Smooth Healthy Skin 
  • Clearly CALM – Soft Skin Exfoliating Scrub
  • Clearly WAVE – Effortless Hair Waves 
  • Clearly TAME – Effortless No-Frizz
  • Clearly NAIL – Strong Smooth Healthy Nails
  • Clearly MOOD– Clever, Alert and Uplifted
Here is what we hear from those who use it

"The Clearly Soft is AMAZING. I personally think this should be a necessity in every woman’s life."

"TAME not only calmed my hair down, but I received a rash of compliments on how great my hair looked."

"THIS IS ONE COMPANY that more than lives up to their claims, and the product line is the best I have ever used."

"Who doesn't love some pampering products?! Especially when you can find some really amazing products that not only look and feel great, but work too!"

"I’m completely obsessed with this fabulously chic line of bath,  hair and skincare products!"

"I have been using these products and I am absolutely in love! "

"I’m completely head over heels for this luxurious natural brand of bath, body, and hair products from Isabella’s Clearly."

The Impact

The world is a better place when young people (like Isabella and Angelina) believe in what nature can provide and that everything we need like food, medicine and beauty is there, all we need is to look.

I have to admit that I felt a sense of pride when my children were the ones who started this adventure. They make a great team, but now need additional experience and help.

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate that you took the time to read our story. If you’re unable to contribute to help us reach our financial goal, here are a few other ways you can help:

  • Use the Indiegogo social share tools to post this on social media to reach others.
  • Share with your friends to help us get the word out about Isabella's Clearly and join our mailing list to stay up to date with new product development.
  • Try one of the products yourself and let us know what you think.
  • Or just send a note of encouragement – we will love it!

story:
Estimate development time

We need your assistance to develop TinyMount and start mass production. Then TinyMount will come to reality. You'll be the first to receive TinyMount at a price that is lower than the future retail price. We are confident that you will certainly like TinyMount; should you have any questions or proposals, we will be glad to answer them and provide any assistance whatsoever.

Prototypes. All components of the product (displays, cameras, etc.) are already available on the market. TinyMount is a combination of all such parts in the best manner and their fixation to various wearables (glasses, earphones, headbands, headwears) for TinyMount Basic, TinyMountand TinyMount Extreme has been already developed in the form of drawings; the only thing that remains is to implement such drawings as 3D-models. TinyMount Sport and TinyMount Pro will be developed in the same manner according to Stretch Goals. You will be able to monitor and even control all production stages and give your suggestions pertaining to the first working prototypes.

Production. We use the high-quality advanced technology that has already been tested by many other companies. All cycles of the entire production process are controlled at the highest possible level by the reputable professionals in their field.

Delivery time. We do realize the seriousness of our work; we also understand that the terms of our production and final delivery may change. Given that we are in charge of all stages of production, we will definitely inform you of the work progress and final date of delivery. We kindly request your assistance and welcome you to join us in our efforts aimed at making TinyMount a reality. Thank you!

Warranty period of TinyMount: 1 year. Should you are faced with any problems, send your TinyMount to us for repair or replacement.

Upon successful completion of the campaign, we kindly request you to follow the updates section on this page and on our website. In addition, we will contact you to clarify all issues, including delivery, model and size of TinyMount after the campaign. Thereupon, we plan to launch site: TinyMount.com; on such site, you will be able to сhoose a model to be delivered to you and introduce all parameters pertaining to such delivery.

Founders

Michael Tarazevych
Chief Executive Officer, Founder

Michael attended the National Aerospace University, where he assisted research on Specialized Computer Systems of High Reliability. After years of working as CEO in IT industry, Michael's niece wearing googles to improve her eyesight, inspired him to establish TinyMount Project.

Alexander Slyusarev
Co-Founder

Alexander attended the National University of Radioelectronics, where he worked on Hardware development of radio communication, radio and TV equipment. Alexander is certified in computer electronics and in designing security; his last working positions are IT companies' executive. As a kid he practiced swimming at professional level and after that had more than 10 years of diving experience and deep understanding of diving and swimming masks.

Andrew Gontar
Co-Founder

Andrew attended the National Technical University, where he worked on machine building technologies. After completion of his work in mobile industry, he is now working as head of software department of online education project.

With over forty years of combined hardware and software development, the TinyMount founders are deeply passionate about helping people to enhance our reality with easy-to-use additional one.

Questions and Answers

Where can I pre-order the TinyMount?

The TinyMount can be pre-ordered through Indiegogo.

Why am I preordering through Indiegogo?

Preordering through Indiegogo guarantees your TinyMount shipments in 2015.

What's your referral program?

We have launched the product loyalty program: if you successfully refer 5 friends to pre-order a TinyMount, then we will refund the price of your pre-order!

If 5 friends of yours purchased a more expensive device, then you will also be entitled (if you wish so) to receive such more expensive device, despite the fact that you have ordered a cheaper device.

Will TinyMount work when I don't have cellular service?

Yes. TinyMount will work even without cellular service.

Will TinyMount work when I don't have Internet connection?

Yes. You will have all phone working without Internet connection functions.

I live outside of the United States, can I pre-order a TinyMount?

Yes. The TinyMount will be shipped worldwide.

How long does the battery last?

The same time as your phone for micro-USB cable version and not less than 9 hours of continuous use for Bluetooth or WiFi version. But even if your battery is dead you can always connect TinyMount directly to your phone via micro-USB cable and it will continue working.

How can I recharge battery of TinyMount Bluetooth or WiFi version?

Recharging the battery is easy and can be done using any standard micro-USB cable.

Is it waterproof?

The TinyMount Extreme is highly weather resistant. The TinyMount mounts for diving/swimming masks are waterproof - electronics are sealed and protected with special coatings.

How do I contact someone on the TinyMount team?

Please visit our Contact Page on our website http://tinymount.com/.

Does TinyMount work with my phone?

TinyMount will work with iOS and Android.

Does TinyMount support phones other than iOS and Android?

TinyMount has open SDK, so it can be extended to other platforms. By default TinyMount will work with iOS and Android. We will also implement all other platforms with 100+ pre-orders.

How can I choose model, size and color of my TinyMount?

We will send out a survey after the end of campaign.


Thank you!

We would like to extend our gratitude to every supporter; we are thankful for any contribution, support and assistance that promoted implementation of our project. We kindly request you to share information regarding our project through Facebook and Twitter; we welcome your input and assistance in dissemination information about our extraordinary project!

Should you have any inquiries or additional questions, or you just want to get acquainted with the team, you may contact us at: info@tinymount.com.

For Press Inquiries contact press@tinymount.com.
story_txt:
Estimate development time
We need your assistance to develop TinyMount and start mass production. Then TinyMount will come to reality. You'll be the first to receive TinyMount at a price that is lower than the future retail price. We are confident that you will certainly like TinyMount; should you have any questions or proposals, we will be glad to answer them and provide any assistance whatsoever.

Prototypes. All components of the product (displays, cameras, etc.) are already available on the market. TinyMount is a combination of all such parts in the best manner and their fixation to various wearables (glasses, earphones, headbands, headwears) for TinyMount Basic, TinyMountand TinyMount Extreme has been already developed in the form of drawings; the only thing that remains is to implement such drawings as 3D-models. TinyMount Sport and TinyMount Pro will be developed in the same manner according to Stretch Goals. You will be able to monitor and even control all production stages and give your suggestions pertaining to the first working prototypes.

Production. We use the high-quality advanced technology that has already been tested by many other companies. All cycles of the entire production process are controlled at the highest possible level by the reputable professionals in their field.

Delivery time. We do realize the seriousness of our work; we also understand that the terms of our production and final delivery may change. Given that we are in charge of all stages of production, we will definitely inform you of the work progress and final date of delivery. We kindly request your assistance and welcome you to join us in our efforts aimed at making TinyMount a reality. Thank you!
Warranty period of TinyMount: 1 year. Should you are faced with any problems, send your TinyMount to us for repair or replacement.

Upon successful completion of the campaign, we kindly request you to follow the updates section on this page and on our website. In addition, we will contact you to clarify all issues, including delivery, model and size of TinyMount after the campaign. Thereupon, we plan to launch site: TinyMount.com; on such site, you will be able to сhoose a model to be delivered to you and introduce all parameters pertaining to such delivery.





Founders
Michael Tarazevych
Chief Executive Officer, Founder
Michael attended the National Aerospace University, where he assisted research on Specialized Computer Systems of High Reliability. After years of working as CEO in IT industry, Michael's niece wearing googles to improve her eyesight, inspired him to establish TinyMount Project.
Alexander Slyusarev
Co-Founder
Alexander attended the National University of Radioelectronics, where he worked on Hardware development of radio communication, radio and TV equipment. Alexander is certified in computer electronics and in designing security; his last working positions are IT companies' executive. As a kid he practiced swimming at professional level and after that had more than 10 years of diving experience and deep understanding of diving and swimming masks.
Andrew Gontar
Co-Founder
Andrew attended the National Technical University, where he worked on machine building technologies. After completion of his work in mobile industry, he is now working as head of software department of online education project.
With over forty years of combined hardware and software development, the TinyMount founders are deeply passionate about helping people to enhance our reality with easy-to-use additional one.





Questions and Answers
Where can I pre-order the TinyMount?
The TinyMount can be pre-ordered through Indiegogo.
Why am I preordering through Indiegogo?
Preordering through Indiegogo guarantees your TinyMount shipments in 2015.
What's your referral program?
We have launched the product loyalty program: if you successfully refer 5 friends to pre-order a TinyMount, then we will refund the price of your pre-order!
If 5 friends of yours purchased a more expensive device, then you will also be entitled (if you wish so) to receive such more expensive device, despite the fact that you have ordered a cheaper device.
Will TinyMount work when I don't have cellular service?
Yes. TinyMount will work even without cellular service.
Will TinyMount work when I don't have Internet connection?
Yes. You will have all phone working without Internet connection functions.
I live outside of the United States, can I pre-order a TinyMount?
Yes. The TinyMount will be shipped worldwide.
How long does the battery last?
The same time as your phone for micro-USB cable version and not less than 9 hours of continuous use for Bluetooth or WiFi version. But even if your battery is dead you can always connect TinyMount directly to your phone via micro-USB cable and it will continue working.
How can I recharge battery of TinyMount Bluetooth or WiFi version?
Recharging the battery is easy and can be done using any standard micro-USB cable.
Is it waterproof?
The TinyMount Extreme is highly weather resistant. The TinyMount mounts for diving/swimming masks are waterproof - electronics are sealed and protected with special coatings.
How do I contact someone on the TinyMount team?
Please visit our Contact Page on our website http://tinymount.com/.
Does TinyMount work with my phone?
TinyMount will work with iOS and Android.
Does TinyMount support phones other than iOS and Android?
TinyMount has open SDK, so it can be extended to other platforms. By default TinyMount will work with iOS and Android. We will also implement all other platforms with 100+ pre-orders.
How can I choose model, size and color of my TinyMount?
We will send out a survey after the end of campaign.





Thank you!
We would like to extend our gratitude to every supporter; we are thankful for any contribution, support and assistance that promoted implementation of our project. We kindly request you to share information regarding our project through Facebook and Twitter; we welcome your input and assistance in dissemination information about our extraordinary project!
Should you have any inquiries or additional questions, or you just want to get acquainted with the team, you may contact us at: info@tinymount.com.
For Press Inquiries contact press@tinymount.com.

story:
About the challenge:

“Motu” a 27 feet Albin Vega built in 1977, is in the port of Veere

(Holland) today, but me and my wife and our two daughters live in Hungary at

the Lake Balaton. Now the challenge is to get the boat in the middle of

Europe. The obvious solution would be to rent a truck and drive about

1500 km in maximum 2 days. But I have chosen the second option which is

to get on the boat and cruise 1986 km across Europe to her new “home”.

My answer for those who wonder why I prefer to face all the difficulties

waiting for me during the 30 days is:

“Not because they are easy, but because they are hard” (-JFK)

During the trip I will face lots of difficulties. I foresee some of them, but there will be surprises for sure.  I have started my Indiegogo campaign to make sure the challenge doesn’t fail because of the money. My aim is not to get rich, but to succeed. I believe this trip will inspire other boating fans to dream and achieve unusual results. All supports will be compensated and moreover all tips and advices are highly appreciated.

You can follow our logbook on facebook, if you are interested in the daily events of Motu.



Please help me to finance the challenge in memoriam of my grandfather.

As I was searching the origins of my family I had to realise that most of my anchestors were great sailors. I was lucky enough to spend many years together with my grandfater and through his stories and passion I have also learned to love the water.

During WW2 my grandfather and his brother were taken by the nazi army to Germany. They were only children that time. My grandfather had managed to escape and later he returned to the camp to to save his brother aswell. The two of them with a stolen punt paddled back on the river Danube to their hometown in Hungary. This trip was his first big experience on water. He had started his long career in 1947 as cabin boy and ended it in 2001 as captain on his own pleasure boat, where he had a heart attack while docking the boat. He eventually died on his boat as a real captain.

One of the most remarkable events in my grandfather’s more than 50 years career what he spent on Europe’s lakes and rivers was the request of Jacques Cousteau. The worldwide known captain, explorer, scientist and film producer has approached my grandfather to guide his expedition along the river Danube from Regensburg to the Black Sea.

My grandfather                         My grandfather with Mr Cousteau  


Why Albin Vega?

Albin Vega is more than a boat, it is a legend. The first Albin Vega was  designed by Per Brohäll in Sweden and was introduced to the public in  1965 at the boat fairs in Paris, and in Hamburg. The design is based on the idea to create a tour-boat which is perfect for competition purposes  as well; which can equally cope with seas and lakes. The Vega became a  very popular class in the 60’s. 3450 boats have been made in the Swedish  Albin Marine factory. There are at least 5 boats what successfully got  around the World and in 2000 an Albin Vega has even reached Antarctica.
 

My boat “Motu” was made in 1977, with serial number 2611. I have no  records about her early years, all I know is that the previous owner was  a German carpenter. He bought Motu 20 years ago and started to refurbish  the boat on his own. Year by year he had fixed, changed parts on Motu.  He could not enjoy the most important feature of the boat, sailing. He had only 2-3 weeks holiday every year, and he spent all of it on the  refurbishments. The boat has got ready in 2012, but unfortunately the  owner died in 2013, so he could not reap the fruits of his hard work.  His widow has decided to sell Motu.


Risks & Challenges

The whole challenge looked only a trip for the first sight. Getting home  from the North Sea on the rivers of Europe, through the mountains of the Alps, with an outboard motor, finally anchoring at Balaton.

For the second sight it looked a bit more complex. It needs at least a month of holiday, loads of money, and we have to tide over the strong backwash of river Rhine.

Finally the “trip” became a huge challenge. Starting at the North Sea going through Waal, Rhine, Main, and Danube, with 75 sluices eventuates 1986 kilometers (1241 miles)  of difficult journey.



Challenge #1:

Motu does not have the original 10hp internal engine, because the previous owner removed it, due it was too loud, and smelly. We have only a small outboard motor.

Challenge #2:

The backwash of river Rhine in it’s middle section is very strong. In some places it goes upto 8-10 km/h (5-7 mph) which means we might not make it through this section. We need a new outboard motor which could help us.

Challenge #3:

I have maximum 30 days to make the whole trip. If  I get stuck somwhere or any technical problem occures, I have to cheat and put Motu on a trailer on some sections.

Challenge #4:

The crew. My chilhood friend, Attila will join me in the beginnig. We have spent lots of time together on lakes, and on rivers. He is a real good friend but there might be some difficulties or disagreements between us in solving severe issues on such a long journey. Moreover he is able to snore with 90 dB. On the last section, my brother Gábor, and a friend Tom will join me.

Challenge #5:

The equipments of the boat. During the preparation we tried to think about everything. Our list of devices takes more than 500 items. The boat has to be prepared carefully before departure, such as fixing the mast, maintenance of engine, safety gears, mandatory equipments,  food, comfort gears, etc.

Challenge #6:

The family. Last, but not least the biggest challenge will be that I have to miss my two little daughters and my wife for 30 days.

The timeline of bigger milestones where I can send the postcards:
Veere (09.April), -Holland
Duisburg (13. April), -Germany
Köln (14. April), -Germany
Frankfurt am Main (18. April), -Germany
Würzburg (21. April my birthday :-) ),  -Germany
Nürnberg (26. April), -Germany
Regensburg (29.April), -Germany
Passau (30. April), -Germany
Linz (01. May), - Austria
Wien (03. May),  - Austria
Budapest (05. May), - Hungary
Balatonkenese (09.May) - Hungary

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Find, like, share us on Facebook, and get the word out, make some noise about my campaign!

 You can follow our logbook on facebook, if you are interested in the daily events of Motu.

Thank you-Tamás (Tom) Jaksa

story:
Our Revolutionary Story

Revolution GymSports is a successful Gymnastics Club that caters for all ages and abilities.  It is important to us that all the gymnasts in our club feel like winners and that they are a unique person with fantastic abilities even if they aren't the one on the podium winning medals.

We have been bumped around from building to building paying incredibly high rents or setting up every day out of shipping containers making things challenging for our hard working staff and its members.  We need a purpose built venue so our pride and joy, the gymnasts of the club can achieve their best.  They deserve it!

We are so passionate about our sport and its club members, that long after your gymnast has left us to move on they still feel like a part of the family that is our club.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need earthworks and a slab approx $80,000
  • .We need an amenities block approx $50,000
  • We need a competition standard shed, with viewing areas and office space, training pits, room for more equipment and ceiling height for our acrobats and trampolinists costing more than $600,000
  • We currently have over 200 members train in our venue each week, that is capacity for the size of the building.  We need a larger venue to continue to grow and be a positive influence in the community.  We currently have large waiting lists for most of our classes.
  • You will have the satisfaction of knowing that you have helped the thousands of gymnasts that will pass through our doors in the upcoming years to have an amazing gymnastics experience.

The Impact

The constant moving of venues has made it challenging for gymnasts to stick with us. We have had to move towns to continue to survive as a club.  Many gymnasts and their families have continued to support us and now travel to a different town 20 minutes away to train, such is their commitment to our club and coaching staff.

We have had to rebuild the club 3 times basically from scratch, and postpone the disabilities program that we ran. The positive impact of a purpose built building will be stability for the club and its members, a safer training venue and the ability to reinstate our disability program.

Risks & Challenges

Our current challenges are not insurmountable, however they could be problematic.  We have a lease on a block of land provided by our local council, if we do not build in the next 12 months we lose the lease and will have to apply for another one, something that has taken us over 12 months in the past.  This can put us behind on our building project by up to 2 years, something the club cannot afford to do if it is to maintain its continued growth.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can donate, but please share our message to as many people as you can, every little step is a step in the right direction.

story:
*sigh* This is where I tell my story... Bare with me guys, I will try to be short.

The majority of you reading this have watched my journey from day one. Some of you have been around long enough to see me lose the weight, gain it back, lose it again, then gain 100+ pounds, and now here I am with losing over 100 and have kept it off for a year now.... But the strain I put on the elasticity in my skin was to the max. I unfortunately am carrying around at least 20 lbs of skin that has to be surgically removed. 

Well, the time has arrived, and on May 13th, 2015 I am scheduled for my most severe skin removal procedure. Some of you remember that on June 4th, 2014 I had excess skin removed from my arms. Just last week on March 18th, 2015 I had to go in for round two of my arm lift survey. I am bruised and bandaged up while I type this. As you can see Im serious about this. 

My reason for created this donation page is because I am not too proud to ask for your help. I will miss a minimum of two weeks of work after paying thousands of dollars for surgery. I am self employed therefore I don't have the luxury of paid time off and sick days. When I return to work that first week will only be able to take a few clients. The 4th week of recovery I will still be in some pain and swollen, but I will be ok. Its the first 3 weeks that worry me most. Those two weeks will hit me hard financially as they would just about anyone. 

If you cannot give, IT IS OK. Please do not feel obligated to. You don't owe me any appologies either. I understand.

A lot of unexpected expeses come along with cosmetic surgery. A whole lot. Especially the type I have to get. Regular lymphatic drainage massages and expensive compression body suits just to name a few.

Please don't think I'm looking for handouts or I would have sent this out months ago. Those of you who know me know I have never even asked you for a ride. Lol. I do everything on my own. I am not the type to ask for favors. I am usually the one doing the helping. Well there is a first time for everything, now I am asking you for a favor.

. This is not easy for me, not the fact that I'm asking for help, but to admit the humiliation of loose skin. I hear constantly "Wow you look great!" But I know what I'm hiding. I lost so much weight last year that my excess skin got so bad that I put on weight to fill it in. :-( Only those of you who have lost an excessive amount of weight understand. Loose skin from baring children can get very unsightly due to a few months of stretching, but that doesn't compare to years at 275-340 pounds for years. So this will give you an idea what I'm dealing with. No gym, no diet, no wrap, no nothing can correct this sad reality but surgery. What makes it most painful for me is the fact Iost that I weight naturally. I took my time, I studied myself into the ground how to do this right. I swear I could be a nutritionist, dietitian, and personal trainer lol. I did this the recommended way. The "healthy" way... And I still have the loose skin. I was assured this only happened to those who have barriatric procedures.. Lies.. I by no means am not downing bariatric surgery at all, now I wish I had went that route.  I later learned through my "studies" that basically stretch marks equal loose skin. Everywhere I have a lot of stretch marks needs work.  

I am healthy now by the way *yaaay* I had blood pressure so high that my doctor told me to admit myself in the hospital because I was at risk for a stroke at any moment and needed to be monitored. Last week the doctor told me my blood pressure was better than his. *smiles* I was also pre diabetic and was told I needed to be on medication. I finally have a clean bill of health.

I am now at the final stages of this emotional roller coaster that I've been riding for years. IT'S TIME TO GET OFF! 

Any amount you can contribute will be GREATLY appreciated. Thank you all.

(If you can't give, I ask for your prayers!)

I lost so much weight last year that my excess skin got so bad that I put on weight to fill it in. :-( Only those of you who have lost an excessive amount of weight understand. Loose skin from baring children can get very unsightly due to a few months of stretching, but that doesn't compare to years at 275-340 pounds for years. So this will give you an idea what I'm dealing with. No gym, no diet, no wrap, no nothing can correct this sad reality but surgery. What makes it most painful for me is the fact Iost that I weight naturally. I took my time, I studied myself into the ground how to do this right. I swear I could be a nutritionist, dietitian, and personal trainer lol. I did this the recommended way. The "healthy" way... And I still have the loose skin. I was assured this only happened to those who have barriatric procedures.. Lies.. I by no means am not downing bariatric surgery at all, now I wish I had went that route.  I later learned through my "studies" that basically stretch marks equal loose skin. Everywhere I have a lot of stretch marks needs work.  I am healthy now by the way *yaaay* I had blood pressure so high that my doctor told me to admit myself in the hospital because I was at risk for a stroke at any moment and needed to be monitored. Last week the doctor told me my blood pressure was better than his. *smiles* I was also pre diabetic and was told I needed to be on medication. I finally have a clean bill of health.I am now at the final stages of this emotional roller coaster that I've been riding for years. IT'S TIME TO GET OFF! Any amount you can contribute will be GREATLY appreciated. Thank you all. (If you can't give, I ask for your prayers!)

story:
We attempt to re-imagine the way we generate, manage and consume energy. Verd2GO is designed to displace a system that made sense a century ago. 

You now have the ability to take renewable energy from and to your home, to power your car, charge all your devices at once and much more WITHOUT the necessity of Grid power


Verd2GO   

You know, at some point we are actually going to have to do something about the climate change issue. We can’t escape the warnings of global climate change and the future shortages of global energy – not a day goes by that we are not reminded of it. 

But what can we do? Driving EVs and going green at home is expensive, and at times even not feasible. Also, how much of what we do individually even counts in our global struggle for a clean future? Well say no more, Verd2GO, with its patent-pending new product and platform is here to put an end to these concerns.

With Verd2GO, you can now:

What is it, and how do we do it?

If we do these above things, and do them well, we can expedite our path to low-cost yet clean energy without major changes. Energy Independence is big! Not just from foreign oil, but from current bottlenecks and limitations. 

Historically, it has been hard to hold onto energy and moving it around, storing it and then delivering it efficiently where and how we need it. That’s why carbon-based dirty energy sources, like petro-chemicals are still around. They’re transportable.

The pace of technology today, however, is rapid, and we are aiming to displace a system that made sense a century ago. With Verd2GO, you now have the ability to take renewable energy from and to your home, to power your car while you are on your way to a picnic, where you can charge all your devices at once, without the necessity of dirty grid power. 

How it works


Verd2GO isn't some clunky metal box, or conduit with wires and plugs - we designed it with user-focus in mind.


Features



Full-Control

If you are not around your home or car, and cannot interact with it, don't worry, our iOS and android app will allow you to control Verd2GO remotely.

Besides that, we are creating a brand new market to develop all sorts of related energy gathering technological devices, apps and services – which is why we will open up our APIs and provide SDKs to developers to create new and exciting opportunities for all. 


This single mobile app revolutionize your energy use, at home, on the road and anywhere in between. 

Don't let one of the most important aspect of modern life be a set of background events that you can't control (grid rates, gas price increases or emissions), take "charge" of your life, and save money with cleaner energy, everywhere.  






We can no longer accept that in this day and age, we still struggle to refuel electric cars, and spend hours in charging. 

If a gas vehicle took 4-6 hours to refuel at the gas station, we would all honestly still be riding horses.

The image on the left was in 1924, notice, how a gasoline fuel driven vehicle was propped on a platform to refuel. Kind of like the other battery swapping platforms for electric vehicles of today (right). In stark contrast, take a look at an electric vehicle from 1917 in the middle; it uses swapping system much simpler to operate.

Today, the order is out of whack - we fuel our cars with harmful and extremely inefficient chemicals dug from its thousand year old underground home, deep inside a faraway country to be shipped thousands of miles and converted inefficiently. 

Still that is made easy, while recharging an electric vehicle is hard - we have this fear of getting stranded in an electric vehicle because it takes hours to charge even though efficient and homegrown electricity seems to be everywhere. Which is precisely why we plan to set this right again. 

In a year and a half (2017), a hundred years since the electric vehicle photograph above was taken, we will have set things right. 

With your help, we bring about the future the way it should be...

The future of energy isn’t just about to come. It’s already here. We are bringing the future closer, today – dreaming and inventing the energy technologies that will define generations to come.

Verd2GO removes the barriers to entry for average folks to actively participate in the business of harnessing, distributing and selling clean power. Once there is a convenient, simple and intuitive way to sell energy into the grid, we can address our important energy issues and clean power plans. 

A lot of energy is all around us. Instead of wasting it, why not harness it and put it to use? Verd2GO is the standardized currency that allows this seamlessly - an easy and shareable way to store clean, renewable energy for when it’s needed.

We don’t expect anyone to completely change your energy behavior, just do what you do, the Verd2GO way!  

We have completely changed our interaction with energy. The P2P (peer-to-peer) energy network in the sharing economy!


You can’t kill an idea whose time has come!

Verd2GO adds a new dimension of flexibility to energy. Imagine smart phones or handheld devices and the old rotary dial landlines. Why be connected to the wall while you talk and be stuck in a given location, when you can take your conversations on-the-go with greater functionality. 

Beyond convenience, it allows clean energy to be modular and ubiquitous! 

The Impact

If energy was discovered and planned out today, this is what the world would look like! We have dreamed up a real way to easily and cost-effectively integrate it to our existing system.

Folks now can actually enjoy going off-grid, electric vehicle owners and drivers get mental satisfaction knowing they will not run out of charge. A solar home will not be without power on a cloudy day or at night, and off-peak grid energy will no longer be wasted.


Even cooler, the wasted off-peak energy can actually be used to power gasoline vehicles, increasing gas mileage and saving money in the process (not to mention emissions).


This also significantly reduces oil imports in addition to the need for new, dirty-coal fired plants, saving millions of further emissions and dollars for everyone, effectively extending the life of the planet and providing one way of saving the future of our world! 

Were you aware that current US consumption of gasoline is around 121,000,000,000 gallons a year? 

or that American cars and trucks expel around 3,000,000,000,000 tonnes of carbon into the air annually? 

...and did you know that the US government also sends more than $1 billion a day overseas to acquire oil resources for the future?

That is scary. Something needs to be done. 
And we show you the what and the how...


      

So if you are worried about the environment and you don’t have an electric vehicle or roof full of solar, don’t worry! 

Even if you have a gas car, or non-solar home, you can help out an EV driver, or lower your gas intake, while using rented solar power you just picked up at the store to partially (or fully) power your needs at home during demand times. 

Buildings


We are rethinking supply-side and demand side energy and turning conventional energy delivery on its head. 

Of the 120 million or so households in the United States, less than 16 million are in a position to install solar panels at home. Solar has primarily benefited the minority homeowners with good credit and a south-facing roof with no shading. 

Verd2GO changes that - now the remaining 100 million households could enjoy solar.

Still think you need to own a home, or have cash for installing solar panels on your roof? Think again!

Be solar powered, even when you don’t have a single solar panel on your roof (or even a roof)! 

Verd2GO - The Solar vending machine. 


Transportation


Get paid for turning in energy from your cars. Or gain an instant mpg boost thanks to Verd2GO.

Uber is not the only way to make money using your vehicle!


Critics argue that electric cars won’t go mainstream until they have the same range as conventional gasoline vehicles. Well critics, meet Verd2GO. You never wanted an electric vehicle till you met us. 

Although electric vehicles are more efficient, a dirty, coal-powered plant is likely the one powering it. With Verd2GO you can rapidly charge up with all clean power.



EVs are here to stay, and this time, for good.

A simple add-on to your car can make all the difference between range anxiety and unlimited range!

Tired of waiting hours to refuel your electric car? Scared to take a trip? All charging plugs taken? Just zip into a Verd2GO station and recharge in no time!



President Obama said at the State of the Union in 2011, that by this year (2015) 1 million electric vehicles will be on the roads in America. Sadly, we are barely a third of the way there. The main barriers being price, range and charging times/availability.

We solved all those. And then some.

The future looks vastly different

                                Paradigm. Shifted.



We have been developing and testing our technology, and are currently on our third prototype for battery modules, and on our first kiosk prototype. 



GET YOUR PERKS!


That is cool and all, but what am I getting?


For your help, we want to recognize you. Indefinitely. Publicly. Materially even.

Enough with plugs and wires, were you ever delayed because your phone was still plugged in to the wall at less-than-half-charge? Are you scared to play music or keep the GPS on when on the road and power is low? 

Are you one of those poor souls at the airport laying on the floor next to the restrooms, or huddle up uncomfortably too close to strangers by the outlet, attempting to charge your phone which is at 3%, five minutes before your next flight starts boarding?

Well don't! Get yourself a portable power pack (or a couple of them) of your choosing from the right side, or any of the goodies there, to tell the world how you played the critical part in saving it. It helps us in our shared quest for a safe, equitable and clean future of energy!

                                              Go get your friends. Come join us. 

                                                 Experience Verd2GO!



Risks and Challenges

Every time a new product is brought to market, there are both risks and challenges. A lot can be beyond the control of the visionaries or company. We can de-risk all stages of production, testing and delivery, and that is what we have done. 

We have partnered with  an energy storage company who are pioneers of lithium-based batteries for electric vehicles and leaders in grid storage. 

With deployed battery-based energy storage units in operations, our partners have manufacturing facilities and expertise in North America, Europe and Asia. If you had a project like Verd2GO to bring to the world, you could not choose a better combo of a team than this. 

Additionally, we also have advisers in national research institutions, and former executives of large secondary and tertiary market interests to guide us through different phases.

We want to enter full production run by middle of next year, and get testing done as well. If we are for some reason unable to raise the full amount, we will just be doing the testing, and manufacturing will be delayed, taking the world closer to more inefficiencies and dirty power. 

We plan to build more test units and certification prototypes, then begin production tooling with our established supply chain and distribution channels in meeting minimum order quantity requirements of our manufacturers. We then plan to commence volume production and delivery. 

In order to do this, we want the beginning to be bottom-up; recognize the people and groups who have helped us in putting this plan into action. To implement our model, and to start manufacturing and production, we want your help! 


Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't want to back the campaign financially right now, you can help us turn the collective vision of the future we all share into a reality by sharing this campaign with your friends, family, coworkers and others. 

Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons below or the left, to let the world know about our vision, the awesome products and how you champion the cause through support for Verd2GO!

This is one of the rare instances where you CAN change the world from behind your keyboards/computers!



We are pumped up and Ready2GO!


Questions & Answers


Q. What is with the name "Verd2GO"?

A: Verd2GO, is pronounced like Vertigo, consisting of Verd/Verde, a romanic/neo-latin word for green to signify green energy, and the word to-go (2GO) to relay the ability to take it with you wherever you go. 

Today, technology has made us mobile, always on-the-go, we share more - things we felt needed to happen with energy as well. No longer should we be okay with plugged to an inefficient grid through miles of unsightly wiring, or plugged in to it using our vehicles for a long, long time and miss the world go by.

Q. But average drive-time is only 40 miles, and it falls within most EV range.

A: Bill Gates famously had supposedly said "No one will need more than 637 kb of memory for a personal computer". Most of the images you see in this page are more than that. 

Our point is, that for some thing to truly go mainstream, we need to remove any limits or ceilings on what it can do,  or how far it can go. Although EVs are good as a transport option, consumers have a great fear of range anxiety when the vehicles are down for a few hours. Then they are useless, and even dangerous with the possibility of getting stranded for hours in a place where you don't want to be stuck. 

In the winter, or going up a hill, range suffers (trust us, we drive EVs and it gets pretty cold here) - with Verd2GO you can overcome these inevitable happenings. 

Q. How is model different than Tesla or Better Place swapping?

A: Tesla and Better Place share a common vision of what tomorrow can be. We share that same vision, and want to do our part towards that goal. Verd2GO batteries are not proprietary to a singular make or model of cars, which is what Tesla swap stations and Better Place catered to. If I am running on 2% battery on a Nissan Leaf and have to be somewhere, I cannot/could not just go to those swapping stations to switch out my batteries. Also, I'm not particularly keen on trading out my brand new battery pack for some (possibly) older or damaged one. We do not want to re-segment the market any further, we want more folks to be exited to have an EV. 

We don’t want the main pack to be standardized as it has different OEM design specs, just the swappable reserve Verd2GO batteries. Think of us as an industry USB for car's energy. Or batteries for your flashlight. If each flashlight had a different type of battery for each instead of standard AA batteries, we would perhaps be more okay with the darkness. And that is not okay with us.  

Q. Why now?

A: We cannot keep waiting decades for a single bullet or breakthrough battery that will save the world, if there is not much of the world left to save by the end of those decades. 

A lot of innovative energy technologies are coming up, but there is no universal metric to understand or interpret them, no one-stop-shop to understand and manage them. Even Solar Roadways would need storage if they are to convert the nation's roads with solar cells*. 


We are part of the solution now, and you can be too. Join us! 

*Reference does not imply endorsement or feasibility

Q: What is the future of Verd2GO?

A: We are not completely sure. But it probably looks something like this:

Remember how cell phones were giant and now are slim, and so are processors, cameras in your phones and nearly everything else in the tech realm? Well, one day we plan to scale the batteries down to even smaller and more manageable and you can power all your needs with one Verd2GO cell!

We have demonstrated how solar, electric vehicles, smart appliances, energy monitoring and price signals could empower consumer choice and significantly (and conveniently) reduce our bills and save the planet. Our demand response, big data and smart grid peers can actually power devices from our wasted energy, than just merely providing analytics to diagnose inefficiencies or shut off smart-home appliances during peak times. Combining the ability to detect faulty backlogs to increase efficiency, and providing a reliable way to integrate clean energy, we are on our way to a clean energy future in no time.

On-the-go portable power packs, were just made more ubiquitous and cleaner, allowing you to grab it on the fly for on demand needs with the ability to take solar power in a bag with you wherever you choose to go. 

Q. Won't such a plan going national cost a lot?

A: We start with you, your car and your home. Then your neighborhood, city and outward. Our sole focus is convenience and saving you money!

As far as building out the kiosk network, and putting up more solar and wind, would you rather spend trillions over the next decades just to maintain our outmoded, unscalable, aged, dirty, unhealthy system, plus another trillion in lost productivity due to delays and gridlock, only to wind up out of fossil fuel? 

Or would you rather spend less than that, to upgrade our existing infrastructure, transition to clean transportation, creating high-tech jobs in both manufacturing and IT, make the power grid distributed and efficient with renewables, solving the carbon problem in the process and have free fuel forever? The choice is clear, we are ready - all we have to do is set this in motion. 

Which is why we sure are glad we found you! :)
