A: Tesla and Better Place share a common vision of what tomorrow can be. We share that same vision, and want to do our part towards that goal. Verd2GO batteries are not proprietary to a singular make or model of cars, which is what Tesla swap stations and Better Place catered to. If I am running on 2% battery on a Nissan Leaf and have to be somewhere, I cannot/could not just go to those swapping stations to switch out my batteries. Also, I'm not particularly keen on
trading out my brand new battery pack for some (possibly) older or damaged one. We do not want to re-segment the market any further, we want more folks to be exited to have an EV. 
We don’t want the main
pack to be standardized as it has different OEM design specs, just the swappable reserve Verd2GO batteries. Think of us as an industry
USB for car's energy. Or batteries for your flashlight. If each flashlight had a different type of battery for each instead of standard AA batteries, we would perhaps be more okay with the darkness. And that is not okay with us.  
Q. Why now?
A: We cannot keep waiting
decades for a single bullet or breakthrough battery that will save the world,
if there is not much of the world left to save by the end of those decades. 
A lot of innovative energy technologies are coming up, but there is no universal metric to understand or interpret them, no one-stop-shop to understand and manage them. Even Solar Roadways would need storage if they are to convert the nation's roads with solar cells*. 


We
are part of the solution now, and you can be too. Join us! 
*Reference does not imply endorsement or feasibility
Q: What is the future of Verd2GO?
A: We are not completely sure. But it probably looks something like this:
Remember how cell phones were giant and now are slim, and so are
processors, cameras in your phones and nearly everything else in the tech realm?
Well, one day we plan to scale the batteries down to even smaller and more
manageable and you can power all your needs with one Verd2GO cell!

We have demonstrated how solar, electric vehicles, smart
appliances, energy monitoring and price signals could empower consumer choice
and significantly (and conveniently) reduce our bills and save the planet. Our demand response, big data and smart grid peers can actually power devices from our wasted energy, than just merely providing analytics to diagnose inefficiencies or shut off smart-home appliances during peak times. Combining the ability to detect faulty backlogs to increase efficiency, and providing a reliable way to integrate clean energy, we are on our way to a clean energy future in no time.
On-the-go portable power packs, were just made more ubiquitous and cleaner, allowing you
to grab it on the fly for on demand needs with the ability to take solar power
in a bag with you wherever you choose to go. 
Q. Won't such a plan going national cost a lot?
A: We start with you, your car and your home. Then your neighborhood, city and outward. Our sole focus is convenience and saving you money!
As far as building out the kiosk network, and putting up more solar and wind, would you rather spend trillions over the next decades just to maintain our outmoded,
unscalable, aged, dirty, unhealthy system, plus another trillion in lost
productivity due to delays and gridlock, only to wind up out of fossil fuel? 
Or would
you rather spend less than that, to upgrade our existing infrastructure, transition to clean transportation, creating high-tech jobs in both manufacturing and IT, make the power grid distributed and efficient with renewables, solving the carbon problem in the process and have free fuel forever? The choice is clear, we are ready - all we have to do is set this in motion. 
Which is why we sure are glad we found you! :)

story:
Building a Community of Healing

A place to call our own, a place for mind, body, & soul healing for the 'whole' family.


The Man Behind the Vision

                           

"Buddhas got my back!"

Jeff Emerson, the founder of True Freedom Recovery Yoga, is a member of long-term recovery with 22 years clean. Jeff has taught meditation in halfway houses, prisons, homeless shelters, and juvenile detention centers. Jeff is a Reiki Master with an E-RYT500 and is studying to be a Zen Priest. Jeff is the founder of one of the world's first 200-hour teaching programs for people in 12-Step Recovery. Jeff is the founder of the first known non-profit yoga studio, A Policy for Caring, dedicated to yoga, meditation, and the recovery process. Jeff has been practicing yoga and meditation for nearly 20 years and has been imparting his wisdom and sharing his gift with people from all walks of life for the past seven years. 

The Woman Behind the Vision


Sondra Emerson, a member of long-term recovery with 26 years clean, is an integral part of the True Freedom Recovery Yoga vision. While Jeff's intent is to secure a building of his own to provide a place to call 'home' for people in recovery to heal mind, body, & soul, Sondra felt strongly about including the children of the persons in recovery to provide them with an outlet to acquire skills in healing through internal and external assets, in tandem with their families.
Sondra has planned this campaign as well as various other fundraisers to secure resources and support to see their combined visions come to fruition.


    What is our intent?

    This capital campaign is intended to fund the purchase of our very own building. True Freedom Recovery Yoga is currently operating out of a leased space in Cincinnati, Ohio. The owners of the building have plans for this space at some point in the future. Our time here while temporary, has allowed us to build a foundation of support and a strong network of individuals who are committed and dedicated to healing.

    Many powerful transformations have happened inside of these walls; Jeff holds yoga, meditation, and recovery sessions here seven days a week ranging from restoration to empowerment, which include 50 minutes of yoga, 10 minutes of meditation, and 30 minutes of a recovery meeting. Lives are changing, people are nurturing their spirits, and families are becoming closer and more connected.


     

    Jeff wishes to expand True Freedom's mission to include programming and healing for the children of the families who have found the benefits of yoga and meditation to enhance and enrich their recovery. Not all who attend are a part of a 12-step fellowship; the healing, growth, and deep bonds everyone finds within one another is involuntarily infectious.

    Meet Gia...



    And a few of our young yoga enthusiasts...

         

         



    All funds raised during this campaign will go to our non-profit,
     A Policy for Caring Inc. to help with capital and capacity building.  If we don't reach our goal, we are building this village anyway--it is just a matter of time! We have a good thing started. We aspire to become more effective and more efficient in time.
    We hope you will consider a gift of any amount to
    True Freedom Recovery Yoga.
    EVERY LITTLE BIT HELPS!
    Namaste.


    Go Ahead, Ask Us About the Perks!

    We have some one-of-a-kind gifts, PERKS, attached to each of the contribution amounts from our supporters (LIKE YOU) as a way to say THANK YOU for helping us to reach our goal.

    We have HUGS, T-SHIRTS (you can never have enough t-shirts),
    and BUMPER STICKERS.

    A very good friend of True Freedom Yoga will be hand-making three different Reiki-Infused Malas with various stones, ranging from Unakite to Tigers Eye, and from Amethyst to Labradorite. See the PERKS listed on the sidebar for further details as to how these unique gifts will be created.

    We are also offering Distance Reiki Healing that you can have for yourself or gift to a loved one. Recipients of Distance Reiki Healing can be in Ohio or in another state-your choice!

    Thai Yoga Massage is another one of our healing PERKS! A one and half-hour session with Jeff--he describes this as having yoga done to you. Thai Yoga Massage is a comprehensive full body treatment that relieves muscle tension, improves circulation, boosts the immune system, and balances the chakras. This one and a half-hour session can also be gifted to a loved one, but they must live in Ohio or be willing to travel to Cincinnati to receive the service.

    And finally, Jeff will be offering a 200-hour Teacher Training for up to 12 participants. The details of this training can be read in full here: Teacher Training. All training classes are held in Cincinnati, Ohio, and will begin in July 2015. If you want to forward this gift or make a contribution to sponsor someone to attend, please discuss your wishes with Jeff Emerson. He is happy to make alternate arrangements!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help.

    Anyone can help by sharing this campaign with friends, family, and

    loved ones near and wide.


    From ALL of us at True Freedom Recovery Yoga,

    WE wish you Deep Peace and Much Love

story:
Background

There is lack of transparency in where funding is allocated and spent, with reports of millions allocated contrasting with destitute and desperate victims still in tents months after the disaster. To research and expose this gap between Federal Government budget allocations and what is happening on the ground we plan to do a social audit on the Federal Government spending for flood recovery that has been allocated. The flood funds will be broken down in details based on where the funds channelled to and resources that have been spent on. Once the allocations of this funds are published publicly by using Open Spending web application, citizens will monitor the Federal Government based on the mentioned details and then will comment further if the action has been taken. 

Objective

There have been recorded histories from 1971 to 2014 shown floods in Malaysia are regular natural disasters that happens every year and most commonly during monsoon season. On December 2014, East Coast Malaysia Peninsular were hit by the worst flash flood. Many speculative reports highlights the flash flood was not only caused by the monsoon, but also was caused by the excessive illegal loggings in the East Coast. Numerous news articles have been reported that the Federal Government has allocated RM 893 million under the 2015 Budget for flood mitigation projects in addition to the initial aids channeled to the affected families and business communities. However, based on this 2015 Budget that has been published publicly in the Ministry of Finance website, there are no informations related to flood relief, rebuilding and mitigation mentioned in it about the allocated money for flood mitigation projects. Moreover, in the Supply Bill 2015 and in the Economy Report 2014/2015 that are accessible from the official portal of Ministry of Finance Malaysia fails to show comprehensively of the breakdown of expenditures from the Federal Government to targeted institutions.

Following are the objectives for this project:

  1. To investigate allocated funds provided by the Federal Government and document actual figures.
  2. To provide detailed report on how the allocated funds for flood relief have been used to the affected places.
  3. To provide awareness to the citizens over the Federal Government's accountability based on the funds that have been provided to the affected places.

The Impact

In the past, there were no reported social audit implemented nor initiated officially and publicly by the Malaysian government and by Malaysian civil societies organisations on flood relief and rebuilding communities in affected places. As a stepping stone, Sinar Project will lead the first social audit focusing at micro-level which is the flood relief and rebuilding communities and your contribution will be used to kickstart this project. Social audit creates impact to government activities on social-well being of citizens, access the social costs and measure social benefits. 

Following are the benefits of social audit:

  1. Enhance accountability: Due to the strong emphasis on openness and accountability for government departments, the information disclosed needs to be fair and accurate. Social audit uses external verification to validate that it is complete and inclusive. The external verification can add credibility to the department's efforts. Information allocated from the audit can provide crucial knowledge about institutions ethical performance and how citizens perceive the services offered by the government. The social angle in the delivery of services, either real or perceived, can be a major factor adding or reducing the reputation of the department and its functionaries.
  2. Alert policymakers and stakeholders: Social audit is a useful tool help citizens understands and anticipates stakeholders concerns. It also provides essential information about the interests, perspectives and expectations of stakeholders facilitating the interdependency that exists between the government and the community.  Who are these stakeholders? Stakeholders include employees, clients, volunteers, funders, contractors, suppliers and the general public affected by the institution. Stakeholders are those persons or organisations who have interest in or who have invested resources in the institution.
Steps that will be executed for this social audit:
  1. Document videos, recorded interviews and photos of status rebuilding homes for flood victims. Photos compiled from on ground reporting will be used as posters as part of the media outreach initiative.
  2. Explore local partners to assist in the social audit survey development and reporting progress. This will be used to validate flood funds allocated in the affected areas.
  3. Document interviews with local institutions such as local councils, elected representatives and community-based organisations.

Issues That Will Be Covered

  1. Food
  2. Health
  3. Education
  4. Infrastructure development
  5. Local businesses
  6. Poverty in the community

Who Manages This Project?

This project will lead by Hazwany Jamaluddin, Sinar Project's current programme officer and resident statistician.

How Your Money Will Be Spent?

  1. Accommodation, transportation and travel to Dabong, Manik Urai, Kuala Krai and Gua Musang.
  2. Duration to collect data are 60 days if the estimated fund is met. If the estimated fund is not met, then duration will be less.
  3. Researcher's time and resources to conduct research, provides updates and detailed final report.
  4. Video production and editing.

Risks & Challenges

Data collections will be affected based on location and time. Due to limited personnel to collect data on the ground, there is a high probability that the quality of data will not be in excellent quality and it will not provide a full picture of the affected region.

Other Ways You Can Help

We welcome you to show your support by spreading the word about this campaign to your friends and family. If you'd like to donate materials please contact us at donations@sinarproject.org.

Thank you for you time and consideration!

story:
The campaign is over. You can sill support Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness by ordering your copy from Amazon through our book launch page. Details here.

Contents


Our Story
Why I Wrote Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness
WIIFY (What's in it for You)
What People are Saying
Frequently Asked Questions
Perks
Latest News New!
Dedication

Our Story

Hello! Thank you for visiting.

My name is Jerome Freedman. The little boy in the video is my son, Micah. Other than being father and son, we have a common experience. We both are cancer survivors - Micah for 39 years and me for almost 19 years – and we both used the Seven Principles of Mindfulness in Healing to thrive and succeed in our healing. Micah is  now 46 and never had a recurrence.

Now, you too, can learn to use the seven principles of mindfulness in Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness: How to Thrive and Succeed in a Complex Cancer System. If you or anyone you know has cancer the Seven Principles of Mindfulness in Healing can guide your way home through diagnosis, treatment and recovery.

We are holding this campaign for one major reason and your participation will go a long way to helping us meet our goal. Our primary objective is to touch the lives of the many thousands of people facing a cancer diagnosis each day as well as their families, caretakers and friends by sending them free copies of Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness.

We will use your donations to:

  1. Send free copies of Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness to oncology and radiology doctors, cancer research institutions, medical schools, complementary providers, hospitals and the like around the world for them to share with their patients.
  2. Produce and send copies of Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness and the other books mentioned in the perks.

Your donations may lead you to become advocates for healthcare and take charge of your healing experience. This is the first principle of Mindfulness in Healing. Dr. Kelly Turner, PhD has shown that taking control of your own healthcare is one of the nine factors for Radical Remission1.

Please donate now!

Why I Wrote
Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness

I wrote Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness in order to inspire you to be the boss of your medical treatment and to share with you how and why you should do it.

The Seven Principles of Mindfulness in Healing have been formulated over the past 39 years – ever since Micah had cancer. Up until now, they have been implicit in everything I did for my son and for myself. When I first was diagnosed with muscle invasive bladder cancer in 1997 and then again at the end 2013, I immediately applied these principles and now I am cancer free with all my body parts!

At the beginning of 2012, I began making these principles explicit so that I could share them with you in the form of a book.

Becoming and advocate for your own healthcare is your first stop on your path to well-being. Once you adopt this principle, a daily meditation practice provides you with the foundation to recognize and know what is going on in your body, your feelings, your thoughts and your mind. With just nine minutes a day, you can learn to calm your mind and make appropriate choices for your medical care.

The Seven Principles of
Mindfulness in Healing


BE YOUR OWN ADVOCATE: Take a stand and be in control of your healing experience. Don’t just roll over and let the medical establishment run over you.

INVESTIGATE ALTERNATIVES: There is a magical world of alternative therapies that will further your healing and give you a sense of well-being on your journey to wellness.

MAKE HEALTH-PROMOTING LIFESTYLE CHANGES: These will include your opting for healthy dietary choices and energizing exercises.

PRACTICE DAILY MEDITATION: Tune into yourself to discover your body sensations, thoughts, and feelings.

CREATE YOUR OWN MEDICAL TEAM: Look for experts who know both Eastern and Western methods so that you can get the widest range of medical support.

REACH OUT TO OTHERS: Ask your family and friends for support and join a support group to share your healing challenges and experiences.

GIVE BACK: When you are ready, you will find joy and meaning in helping other people and giving back to your community.

WIIFY (What's in it for You)

Your generous contributions will go a long way in helping us reach our goal no matter how big or how small. There are so many people facing their own cancer diagnosis or that of a friend or loved one that any amount will help us get this timely information to them in a cost-effective way.

For every printed version of Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness that is part of your gift for participating, at least one additional book will be given away.

Some of the benefits that you will receive from donating award you with Guided Meditations, other books, or 9 Minute Meditation. You can read about these items below.

Thank-You Gift: $10

Every generous donation $10 or over will receive an electronic copy of Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness within a week after the campaign closes. In addition you get a free subscription to Meditation Practices weekly words of wisdom.

Embraced: $25-$49

You get the Thank-You Gift plus your choice of a downloadable Guided Meditation. You will also receive electronic copies of Stop Cancer in its Tracks, Seven Secrets to Stop Interruptions in Meditation, Cosmology and Buddhist Thought, and Know Your Type.

Inspired: $50-$99

You will receive everything in Embraced along with a printed copy of Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness. In addition, you will have your choice of two downloadable Guided Meditations.

Get One - Give One: $100-$249

You get everything in Inspired plus an additional printed copy of Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness that you can share with your friend or loved one. In addition you will receive a total of six downloadable Guided Meditations and printed versions of Stop Cancer in its Tracks, and Seven Secrets to Stop Interruptions in Meditation. You will also receive a membership in 9 Minute Meditation.

Empowered: $250-$499

You will receive everything in Get One - Give One along with printed versions of Cosmology and Buddhist Thought, Know Your Type, and I Am With You, You will also receive a personal recorded Guided Meditation session in person (Bay Area only) or over Skype.

Awakened: $500-$999

You get everything in Empowered except for the guided meditation session, which is replaced by a series of seven one-half hour meditation coaching sessions over the phone or Skype. You will also get free access to the Enneagram Instrument and have the option to have a personal Enneagram coaching session in person (Bay Area only) or over Skype.

Enlightened: $1,000-$1,499

You get everything in Awakened plus eight additional copies Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness except for the coaching sessions, which are replaced by a Half Day of Mindfulness retreat for 20 people at your location. Travel expenses are not included.

Bodhisattva: >$1,500

You get everything in Enlightened plus ten (total of 20) additional copies Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness except the half day of mindfulness becomes a Full Day of Mindfulness retreat for 20 people at your location. Travel expenses are not included.

What People are Saying

"Dr. Freedman speaks from experience, both as a cancer survivor himself, and the father of a Radical Remission cancer survivor. His book, "Healing with 7 Principles of Mindfulness" gives readers a nurturing, helping hand throughout the entire cancer journey, especially with regard to developing a meditation practice."

-Kelly Turner, PhD, Author of the NYTimes Bestseller "Radical Remission: Surviving Cancer Against All Odds"

"Healing with 7 Principles of Mindfulness" is a valuable guide to navigating the complex terrain of cancer diagnosis and treatment. Blending his direct experience with cancer and a deep practice in mindfulness and guided imagery, Dr. Jerome Freedman offers a unique and valuable perspective with mindful healing approaches.

-Leslie Davenport, Author of Healing and Transformation Through Self Guided Imagery

I am a 19 year parotid gland cancer survivor, a type of cancer that can return at any time. In addition to traditional western medicine protocol, as part of my healing process, I have used many different alternative healing modalities. The approach that Jerome has documented in his book coincide with my experience of surviving cancer. His book is a great resource for anyone facing the trauma and challenges of a serious health crisis.

--Julie Bernard, Homeopath

“Jerome Freeman’s “Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness” is a user-friendly approach to make practical (very practical!) specific things that can empower each person to achieve higher levels of health.  These principles are not just logical and rational, they work…and they just feel ‘right.’  These principles will not only improve your health, they will improve your life!”

--Dana Ullman, MPH, CCH Author of 10 books, including two that contain a Foreword by the Physician to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II, “The Homeopathic Revolution,” “Discovering Homeopathy,” and “Everybody’s Guide to Homeopathic Medicines” (co-authored with Stephen Cummings, MD)


I have reviewed your Indiegoogo campaign page and book. Miracle! Truly, the story of your son will touch the hearts of millions.

Your vision of the book being available to those diagnosed with Cancer is admirable, and something that I greatly align myself with. As someone who recently started meditating, I see the healing effects of mediation, and would love to share it with the world.

--Alicia Dunams Author of Goal Digger: Lessons Learned from the Rich Men I Dated

This book is great! Dr.Freedman allows the reader to journey with him as he harnesses the power of mindfulness to heal himself from Cancer. He also brings the reader along with him as he carefully and meticulously considers the many options of both alternative and traditional healing approaches. The Seven Steps is both "practical" and "spiritual". Especially the part of having your friends and loved ones being an essential part of your healing journey. Would recommend this book to people going through health challenges, as well as r those who want to obtain a greater insight into the power of mindfulness. 

--Henry Dahut, J.D. Author of Henrys Puzzle - Awakening To Infinity.

Frequently Asked Questions

What kind of cancer did Micah have?

Micah had metastatic Wilm's tumor - a cancer of the kidney. By the time it was diagnosed, his cancer had metastasized to his lungs. Micah has been cancer free since 1977.

When I took him to see his surgeon at age eleven years, the doctor said, "You are Micah Freedman's parents? How wonderful! He made medical history. We did not think he would survive.

What kind of cancer did Jerome have?

Jerome had muscle invasive bladder cancer in 1997 and again in 2013. This type of cancer is usually treated with a radical cystectomy, a procedure that replaces the urinary bladder with a false one as well as removes the prostate and selected lymph nodes. 

What is the status of Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness?

The manuscript is finished except for forewords from Dr. Martin Rossman, MD and Dr. Gerald Jampolsky, MD, a snazzy cover (draft on the left), and quotes from many notables about the benefits you will receive when you read Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness.

What else are you going to use the funding for?

Generally speaking, the funds remaining after the campaign will be used for fulfilling the perks and other promotional purposes.

What is mindfulness?

According to Dr. Jon Kabat-Zinn, founder of the Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction at the University of Massachusetts,

“Mindfulness means
paying attention in a particular way;
on purpose,
in the present moment, and
nonjudgmentally
as if your life depended on it.”

You can learn much more about mindfulness on Meditation Practices and / or join our Mindfulness in Healing meditation group at the Pine Street Clinic in San Anselmo, California on Wednesday nights from 7:00-8:30 PM.

What is meditation?

Meditation is the practice of sitting or lying down quietly and watching how your body and mind go through various changes. In Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness, you will learn many forms meditation such as mindfulness meditation, sound meditation, mantra meditation and many others. The chapter on meditation is the longest one in the book.

What is 9 Minute Meditation?

Researchers have found that nine minutes of meditation a day may be adequate for you to receive the wonderful benefits of meditation without going to the mountains. 9 Minute Meditation2 is an online course that consists of more than twelve different meditation practices for you to discover the best one that works for you.

What is a guided meditation?

A guided meditation is a process to bring you into a calm and relaxed state by listening to a mentor or recording designed to bring about the relaxation response in you.

What is a Day of Mindfulness Mindfulness retreat?

A Day of Mindfulness is a mini-retreat that provides you with a safe space to go deep inside yourself to help you relieve pain, stress, and suffering. You will learn mindfulness meditation, walking meditation, and other practices for your benefit. You are also encouraged to just have fun!

 What is the Enneagram?

The Enneagram is a nine sided diagram that describes nine personality types with their preoccupations and mental and emotional fixations. It is used as a tool for discovering your true essence and awakening your full potential.

What is an Enneagram typing interview?

You are invited to take the Enneagram Instrument, a test to analyze your personality type and possibly determine it. The typing interview gives us a chance to discuss the results and come closer to helping you recognize your personality type. The interview can take anywhere from one to two hours, depending on your issues.

How Can I Help?

Your help is needed in many ways. Which ones of these most appeal to you?

  1. Make a donation.
  2. Share the link with friends, family, business associates, and your social media contacts on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Tumblr, LinkedIn and anywhere else you can think of.
  3. Send us the names and contact information for patients and caretakers who would benefit from receiving a free copy of Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness.
  4. Send us the names and contact information of organizations that would be interested in distributing copies, whether free or for purchase.
  5. Write a review, recommendation or comment that may be included in Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness and on this page.
  6. Anything else that you can think of to help make this campaign go viral.

Thanks for your help!

Do you have more questions?

You are invited to send in any questions you have about anything in this campaign, mindfulness, or healing. Please use the contact link at the top of this page under the video.

Latest News

Talk at The Club at Harbor Point

On Thursday, August 20, I will be giving a talk on Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness at the Club at Harbor Point in Mill Valley, California at 6:00 PM. All are welcome.

Update: This talk was a massive success! Fifty people had attended - a record for the Thursday evening talks at Harbor Point. The questions were lively and very interesting. Many people expressed how wonderful it was.

Talk at Book Passages

On Saturday, August 22, I will be presenting I Am With You: Love Letters to Cancer Patients along with Rachel Naomi Remen and other authors at Book Passages in Corte Madera, California at 4:00 PM. All are welcome.

Endorsement from Dr. Kelly Turner, PhD

On Monday, August 3, I received a wonderful endorsement from Dr. Kelly Turner, PhD, best selling author of Radical Remission. I met Dr. Turner on Wednesday, July 22 at the Commonwealth Club in San Francisco and had mailed her a printed copy of the book three weeks prior.

Cash Contributions Outside of Indiegogo

We have received contributions of more than $1750 from people who preferred not to register with Indiegogo. These contributions will go a long way to helping us meet our goal.

Dedication

This campaign is dedicated to the more than three thousand people who will receive a cancer diagnosis during the time the campaign is active.

This campaign is also dedicated to our wonderful teacher, Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh who is receiving rehabilitation treatment a the University of California San Francisco Medical Center. We pray for his complete response and have committed 15% of the proceeds to his medical expenses here in the US.

Our Story
Hello! Thank you for visiting.
My name is Jerome Freedman. The little boy in the video
is my son, Micah. Other than being father and son, we have a common experience. We both are cancer survivors - Micah for 39 years and me for almost 19
years – and we both used the Seven Principles of Mindfulness in Healing
to thrive and succeed in our healing. Micah is  now 46 and never had a recurrence.
Now, you too, can learn to use the seven principles of
mindfulness in Healing with the Seven Principles of
Mindfulness: How to Thrive and Succeed in a Complex Cancer System.
If you or anyone you know has cancer the Seven
Principles of Mindfulness in Healing can guide your way home through
diagnosis, treatment and recovery.
We are holding this campaign for one major reason and
your participation will go a long way to helping us meet our goal. Our primary objective is to touch the lives of the many thousands of people facing a cancer
diagnosis each day as well as their families, caretakers and friends by sending them free copies of Healing
with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness.We  will use your
donations to:

Send free copies of Healing
with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness to oncology and radiology doctors,
cancer research institutions, medical schools, complementary providers, hospitals and the like around the world for them to share
with their patients. 

Produce and send copies of Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness and the other books mentioned in the perks.

Your donations may lead you to become advocates for healthcare and take charge
of your healing experience. This is the first principle of Mindfulness in Healing. Dr. Kelly Turner, PhD has shown that taking
control of your own healthcare is one of
the nine factors for Radical Remission1.Please donate now!
Why I WroteHealing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness
I wrote Healing with the Seven Principles of Mindfulness in order to inspire you to be the boss of your medical treatment and to share with you how and why you should do it.The Seven Principles of Mindfulness in Healing have been formulated over the past 39 years – ever since Micah had cancer. Up until now, they have been implicit in 
everything I did for my son and for myself. When I first was diagnosed 
with muscle invasive bladder cancer in 1997 and then again at the end 2013, I immediately applied these principles and now I am cancer free with all my body parts!At the beginning of 2012, I began making these principles explicit so 
that I could share them with you in the form of a book.Becoming and advocate for your own healthcare is your first stop on your path to well-being. Once you adopt this principle, a daily meditation practice provides you 
with the foundation to recognize and know what is going on in your body, your 
feelings, your thoughts and your mind. With just nine minutes a day, you
 can learn to calm your mind and make appropriate choices for your medical
 care.The Seven Principles of Mindfulness in HealingBE YOUR OWN ADVOCATE: Take a stand and be in control
 of your healing experience. Don’t just roll over and let the medical 
establishment run over you.
INVESTIGATE ALTERNATIVES: There is a magical world 
of alternative therapies that will further your healing and give you a 
sense of well-being on your journey to wellness.
MAKE HEALTH-PROMOTING LIFESTYLE CHANGES: These will include your opting for healthy dietary choices and energizing exercises.
PRACTICE DAILY MEDITATION: Tune into yourself to discover your body sensations, thoughts, and feelings.
CREATE YOUR OWN MEDICAL TEAM: Look for experts who know both Eastern and Western methods so that you can get the widest range of medical support.
REACH OUT TO OTHERS: Ask your family and friends for support and join a support group to share your healing challenges and experiences.
GIVE BACK: When you are ready, you will find joy and meaning in helping other people and giving back to your community.

WIIFY (What's in it for You)
Your generous contributions will go a long way in helping us reach our goal no matter how big or how small. There are so many people facing their own cancer diagnosis or that of a friend or loved one that any amount will help us get this timely information to them in a cost-effective way.For every printed version of Healing with the Seven Principles of
Mindfulness that is part of your gift for participating, at least one additional book will be given away.Some of the benefits that you will receive from donating award you with Guided Meditations, other books, or 9 Minute Meditation. You can read about these items below.Thank-You Gift: $10
Every generous donation $10 or over will receive an electronic copy of Healing with the Seven Principles of
Mindfulness within a week after the campaign closes. In addition you
get a free subscription to Meditation Practices
weekly words of wisdom. 
Embraced: $25-$49
You get the Thank-You Gift plus your choice of a downloadable Guided Meditation. You will also
receive electronic copies of Stop Cancer in its Tracks, Seven
Secrets to Stop Interruptions in Meditation, Cosmology and Buddhist Thought, and Know Your Type.
Inspired: $50-$99
You will receive everything in Embraced along with a printed copy of Healing with the Seven Principles of
Mindfulness. In addition, you will have your choice of two downloadable Guided Meditations.
Get One - Give One: $100-$249You get everything in Inspired plus an additional printed copy of Healing with the Seven Principles of
Mindfulness that you can share with your friend or loved one. In addition you will receive a total of six downloadable Guided Meditations and printed versions of Stop
Cancer in its Tracks, and Seven
Secrets to Stop Interruptions in Meditation. You will also receive  a membership in 9 Minute Meditation.Empowered: $250-$499You will receive everything in Get One - Give One along with printed versions of Cosmology and Buddhist Thought, Know Your Type, and I Am With You, You will also receive a personal recorded Guided Meditation session in person (Bay Area only) or over Skype.Awakened: $500-$999You get everything in Empowered except for the guided meditation session, which is replaced by a series of seven one-half hour meditation coaching sessions over the phone or Skype. You will also get free access to the Enneagram Instrument and have the option to have a personal Enneagram coaching session in person (Bay Area only) or over Skype.Enlightened: $1,000-$1,499You get everything in Awakened plus eight additional copies Healing with the Seven Principles of
Mindfulness except for the coaching sessions, which are replaced by a Half Day of Mindfulness retreat for 20 people at your location. Travel expenses are not included.Bodhisattva: >$1,500 You get everything in Enlightened plus ten (total of 20) additional copies Healing with the Seven Principles of
Mindfulness except the half day of mindfulness becomes a Full Day of Mindfulness retreat for 20 people at your location. Travel expenses are not included.

We pray for his complete response and have committed 15% of the proceeds to his medical expenses here in the US.

1See Kelly Turner, PhD, Radical Remission: Surviving Cancer Against All Odds, HarperCollins, 2014, discussed here: http://mountainsangha.org/nine-factors-radical-remission/.
2See http://2wellbeing.org.

story:
Inspired by technology used in hospitals, our revolutionary technology helps you regain control over your appetite and craving,  so you can get on with your weight, and it will help you  reduce and regulate your appetite.

Revolutionary, Biosband offers an electro acupuncture session to help you fight the endless feelings of hunger, often difficult to manage during a diet. It is an excellent alternative to appetite suppressant supplements. In addition, this method is 100% natural. We use the same method used in hospitals, we have simply reduced the size of the unit.

The Biosband is a watch-like device worn on the ventral side of the wrist.  When activated, the device emits low-level electrical pulses across 4 small connectors on its underside, stimulating the median nerve (an acupuncture point). Biosband utilizes gentle user-controlled electrical stimulation to send messages to your brain and blocks the signals that cause bulimia, without the headaches, drowsiness and other side effects associated with medicinal remedies.


If acupuncture (electro stimulation) was initially used in hospitals, this technique will now prompt you to use the Biosband bracelet at home. Over time, you  will succeed in calming  your cravings and quickly lose extra fat.



The anterior surface of the wrist is covered by three meridians : meridian Lung (P), the meridian of the heart (C) and (MC) heart of the master meridian and CS, some points are used to treat specific disorders such as on the meridian P7 and P9 lung points on the meridian of the heart C5 points C6, C7 and the master of the heart meridian  points (MC6) (CS6) (MC7) (CS7).

Their use, together or individually, is known to give outstanding results. Pursuant to these data, the Biosband  using the technique of electro acupressure, electrical stimulation of acupuncture points, was designed to act on behavioral disorders, such as stress. With the anti-stress program (Stress & Anxiety), the Biosband stimulates with  very gentle low voltage and low intensity pulses on  specific acupuncture points.


The Biosband is a nerve stimulation connected device that helps to reduce and regulate your appetite.  It is a safe, 100 % drug free, highly effective, and clinically proven solution without the side effects associated with medications. The Biosband device generates gentle nerve impulses that travel through the body’s central nervous system to the higher emetic center in the brain.



Biosband will turn on automatically for 2 minutes, 30 and 15 minutes before each meal, in order to effectively ward off hunger pangs.The first effects will be felt after following a period 10 to 15 days, subject to 8 to 14 sessions of 2 minutes each day very regularly. 

Acupuncture is based on the development of energy circulating in the human body, conveyed through channels called meridians at the skin contacting surface of the internal organs by subchannels. These meridians include energy points " call acupuncture points",  whose stimulation by electrical impulses acts on behavioral disorders of the individual. These energy fluctuations reflect changes or Yin Yang. The Chinese concept of medicine is based on the modifications of these two energies, either excess or deficiency.

The trips range from the chest to the arms and then the arm to the head then head to feet and feet to the chest according to specific schedules and to solar time.



At a time when the cult of the body is increasingly present, thinness becomes a standard to which many people want to join. Have a lovely figure, stay in shape, hunt overweight ... are the aims Biosband helps you to reach. But the weight is not only an aesthetic criterion, it is also and especially a health vector.



*We have made clinical tests of the first V1 on 100 patients




You must continue to feel the tingling feeling for the Biosband to continue working effectively. However, you will become accustomed to the sensation over time, and hence it will become less noticeable. You may also find that the tingling sensation varies as you move your arm around.  Biosband is not water-resistant.



On "Biosband connect app" you indicate the schedules of your meals.Just slip it on your wrist, adjust the intensity to suit your individual needs. Cursor power settings enable the wearer to control the level of stimulation and because you can feel it working within minutes, you can adjust the device accordingly with indicator lights showing when it's operating and when the rechargeable  battery is low .  

 Drug free: the Biosband provides relief for craving and helps reduce the appetite without the use of medication by stimulating the median nerve located on the underside of the wrist.

It will not interfere with medications, nor cause drug-related side effects. The Biosband was specifically designed to provide a comfortable level of stimulation enabling the device to be used for long-term, continuous use.

Continuously effective: unlike the pressure bands, where the body quickly adapts to the effect of static pressure, Biosband sends cyclic electronic pulses that provide continual effectiveness for as long as the user has the device turned on.

Usage is easy—just strap it on the underside of your wrist and your smartphone will do the work.



The Biosband is a nerve stimulation connected device that helps to reduce and regulate your appetite. It is a safe, 100 % drug free, highly effective, and clinically proven solution without the side effects associated with medications. The Biosband device generates gentle nerve impulses that travel through the body’s central nervous system to the higher emetic center in the brain.




1. When will Biosband be available?

Biosband is a fantastic product and thus crowdfunding is in our DNA. With your support, we hope to make Biosband a reality in June 2016 and promote other health functions.
Help us spread the word by sharing this campaign with family and friends.

2. Material & Sizing 

Biosband is a flexible leather bracelet comprised of hypoallergenic, lightweight materials. It is made to withstand the wear and tear of daily use.
Biosband is designed to fit wrists that are 4-8 inches in circumference. Proper adjustment is important because our connectors require to be in contact with your skin. Your device will be delivred with  bracelets in 2 sizes. This will allow for adjustment of the wristband to fit your wrist.

3. Battery Life & Charging

The battery life is application dependent. We expect the battery to last up to one week (7 days), but we are still optimizing.
Biosband will be charged using a custom adapter powered via USB port. Biosband will let you know when your battery is low via an alert.

4. Can it be worn in righty or lefty mode?

Yes. Biosband can be adjusted to be worn in righty or lefty mode.
 
5. What will be included in the package?

The Indiegogo super and early bird pack  will be shipped with our User's  Manual, charger, micro USB cable, an awesome Biosband sticker and a personal thank you note to you, our earliest supporters.  Each Biosband ordered during Indiegogo will be marked as "Special Indiegogo Edition” on the underside of the unit main body. 

6. What is the Biosband's declared value?

The value and shipping information is printed on a sticker on your package when your Biosband is shipped. We will not be able to mark them as a gift or undervalue the package. This means that your incoming package may be subject to VAT or other customs fees. Duties and taxes are calculated and charged by customs officials in your country. As such, they are beyond our control. You are responsible for duties, taxes, and any other charges that your country chooses to impose for the import.

7. What if I want a refund?

As we are a small startup and this is a crowdfunding endeavor, it's difficult for us to offer refunds.  We are using this money to advance our development and to get the Biosband on the worlds wrists. Your contributions are going to be used on purpose right away.  We do, however, understand that there are sometimes extenuating circumstances . Please reach out to us via our contact page if this is the case and we will be  happy to help.  We can offer a partial credit within 15 days (minus PayPal and Indiegogo fees which are assessed immediately when your contribution is placed). We will not be able to offer refunds 15 days after your contribution. Thanks!  

8. Can I replace the bracelets?

Yes, Biosband replacement  bracelet will be available for purchase as extra in 8 different colors  during our Indiegogo campaign.

9. Are you taking orders internationally?

Due to worldwide interest we have added international shipping. International shipping will cost an additional $15. If you are in the U.S, Canada and South America, please add an additional $20 to your order. If you have already ordered and didn’t add $15/$20 for shipping, we'll confirm the amount and address with you before shippment, and we will easily make any adjustments then.

10. Can I use Biosband if I have any kind of implantable device?

We recommend that people with existing, implanted devices that utilize electrical stimulation, such as a pacemaker, defibrillator or implanted neurostimulator should not use Biosband before speaking with their physician.

11. Is the Biosband device FDA approved?

No, not yet. However, we do believe the process of getting FDA approval may be abbreviated. Here's why.The Biosband device does not provide a new treatment. The nerve stimulation treatment has been around and used with FDA approval for years. The Biosband device merely miniaturizes existing machinery into a portable and comfortable format.

We hope, although we obviously cannot guarantee, that the FDA would agree that the device is a constructive modification of an already approved treatment and is willing to approve its use on a timely basis.

Therefore we plan to explore the possibility of an abbreviated approval process known as 510(k) clearance, which would allow us to accelerate approval (months versus years). If this is not feasible, we would pursue the standard Pre-Market Approval route.

We will get there one way or the other .

Do stay in touch with us; we love hearing from you and need you every step of the way, without you none of this would be possible.

We are an ultra passionate team, based in Paris, (France) and West Palm Beach Florida, (USA).

Any questions : info@biosband.com
Press contact : press@biosband.com

story:
BikerMate is an ALL in ONE Solution for Bikers.

A lightweight indispensable companion for the urban cyclist, the overnight camping trip or your home or Office needs.
Just attach BikerMate to your bike using the multi-position flexible mount and you are ready to go.
SUPPORT US TO BRING THIS PRODUCT TO THE WORLD

It is a bike light and a torch

The super bright twin LED lights are powerful enough to use for cycling or un attach BikerMate and use it as a powerful torch or a flashing SOS alert device.

Inside is a lithium Polymer battery giving 10,000 milliamp charging capacity for all kinds of smart phones, tablets or any other USB chargeable device. It has a USB socket and also an integrated USB charging cable.

Using our universal phone mount BikerMate is perfect for charging your phone while using your power hungry GPS.

BikerMate also has a powerful 3 Watt powerful integrated Bluetooth speaker which is perfect for phone calls or GPS directions while cycling.

You can even access Siri or Cortana with one button press, to call someone or ask directions.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Have a question that isn't answered here? Email us at:  yk@promate.net

story: The monies raised will be used to continue with the remaining funds needed to develop my organic hair and skin care products. These products are essential in treating dry, dull and damaged hair or skin. The products help relieve major and minor skin and hair complaints.  Please contribute whatever you can on this campaign, no amount is too small, or by purchasing one of my products at www.homemadebyjanice.com.  Thanking you again for all your support on my first campaign.  I created these products in 2006,  funds can also be sent to Erik Champagne-Director of New Products at Davison Design "A Better Way to Invent" (412)967-0124 ext. 50146 or questions regarding the project erik@davison.com 1-800-544-3327.  They have been working with me since 2011 to develop and get this wonderful project out nationally and internationally.  Try a sample of the skin, hair or tattoo moisturizer and a free lip balm just for a $5.00 contribution.  You will be amazed how this product brings life back to your hair and skin.

story:
Do you know that your energy level is too low, despite endless cups of coffee and energy drinks? Do you hate the inevitable crash they cause? Do you want to feel healthier, stronger and well rested but don’t know how? 

  Are you interested in finding the perfect vitamin for mornings and evenings? If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading… 

Welcome to the new and improved way to have a healthier more complete life with “EnNeuro”. We developed a process to create a vitamin designed just for you in the morning to get you moving and same for the nighttime. Multivitamins you buy at the store come packed with things your body doesn’t need and misses out on essential nutrients, well not anymore. With our process we have spent 12 years researching exactly what your mind and body needs in the morning and evening, for clarity during the day and peaceful rest at night. “EnNeuro” allows a person to take advantage of a life with optimal health and performance when they are taking the right supplements. 

Hello! My name is David and I suffer from fatigue, lack of focus, motivation, chronic brain-fog, stress, depression. But I need to feel great everyday in order to be present at work, with my family and friends. Why is this so difficult? I do not want to rely on endless cups of coffee and energy drink just to get through the day… So what is a guy left to do?? 

  Invent a safer, more effective alternative to feeling your best each day. Something that can help working professionals, students, entrepreneurs, employees and employers from all walks of life! Something that can invigorate people all over the world… And then…. EnNeuro was born! 

Every single year of my life prior to my tenure at junior high, I had always been successful in school, with tons of energy to enjoy the company of my friends after school. I remember distinctively, however, the day in mid junior year, my tests started getting harder, and even more as I progressed into my first year of college; classes and assignments became more complex and deadlines increased the stress. 

To make matters worse, I had to get a full time job while pulling over 18 semester credit hours at the same time. When I started searching for solutions and polling my peers I was shocked to find out that many of their routines included: 1) Coffee 3-5/day 2) Energy Drinks 2-7/day 3) Adderall 1-2/day and energy pills 3-6/day. 


                                                          The Impact: 

 Coffee, prescription pills and energy drinks were prevalent with people at my job and school, most of these individuals barely even got 4 or 5 hours of sleep which made it even worst and even scary for me, to see that I would have to do the same just to get by and graduate. I started taking lots of different vitamins and trying to relieve stress and achieving REM sleep as quick as possible so I wouldn't have to sleep 8 hours/day but maybe 4 or 5. 


Another issue was, all the meals most people ate during my college years were fast food and microwavable meals, which even disturbed me more, because I knew that there must have been healthier options to do this to be successful in school. Vitamins started to become my daily nutrition, as well as to counter any negative effects that could deter my efforts to stay focused at work and school. 

Throughout my junior year of college to after graduation, I started playing with single natural ingredients that can help provide rich nutrients to your brain, thus increasing your productivity level without brain fog. I started noticing slight increases of myself being more alert and attentive to tasks at hand. As I climbed the corporate ladder, I noticed that I started working more than normal hours approximately 50 to 70 hours a week, doing many mundane and tedious tasks and meetings. 

I continually sought out more and more natural ingredients and tested them on myself by using multiple blends of the ingredients simultaneously, I had to use the process of elimination over the years to find the perfect blend formulation that worked synergistically without any side effects. I had many friends and peers try my dietary blend with me during this time of discovery, with trials and errors. After painstakingly searching and developing a healthier choice to be a better you, I finally found the perfect blend of nutrients. 

This happened because I was determined to seek a better and healthier alternative to change my life, and since then, it has become my primary source of nutrients to get by in life and be able to think faster, retain memories and stay coherently focused in all situations, at school or work. This has really helped me get promoted many times by being more efficient and productive. Now I want to share this with the world to help others get through the experience I had, or to achieve more than I did, in a healthy way, not sacrificing their health but to redefine normal. I learned you can do it all, simply by nourishing your brain to improve your cognitive function.  

It took me over 12 years to perfect and develop this cognitive enhancer for you to experience an increase of a healthier and balanced lifestyle without any sacrifice to what you currently do. 

                                                           

                                                           Our Mission

“We provide all-natural supplement products to create a balanced and healthy lifestyle. We also offer unparalleled opportunities for motivated individuals to take control of their future and build the life they have dreamed of.”


 Do you take supplements every morning? The numbers are growing. A new government study found that more than half of American adults take at least one dietary supplement. But despite their popularity, many experts remain skeptical of their effects. "The pill is a nice idea, but we have no reason to think this one-size-fits-all dose makes any sense for each individual," said Deen Dr. Darwin Deen, clinical professor in the department of family and social medicine at Albert Einstein College of Medicine in New York. That is why our supplement is perfect, we have specifics components to help give your body what it needs: day and night.

My product is called EnNeuro for day and night, which is a proprietary formula that works by harnessing dozens of natural and extracted nootriments to synergistically enhance your cognitive function. EnNeuro is a eurogenic that supports memory improvement and mood uplifting by acting as a psycho-stimulant without causing a jitters or a crash later end of the day.




   

    

                                                How you can help:

For me to bring my vision to life, I need your support!

If you aren't able to make a monetary donation, but would like to contribute to the campaign mission, there are plenty of other ways to help!

         Here is a breakdown for how we will spend the funds that we get through Indiegogo:


                                                    Try our Supplements

   Please try our supplements and tell your friends how great you feel!

                                                                PERKS:





                                                        

                                                                 


                                      Teach someone else about the product

At its core, this campaign is about helping people who live with chronic fatigue and poor sleep. If you're in a position to teach someone else how to better help themselves - do it! You are contributing to this campaign by passing on the awareness.

                                                      Spread the word

You can contribute your popularity by telling your friends and family about this campaign. The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number of people who view this page. If you can increase that number, you are making a tangible contribution to the mission.

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “EnNeuro” family.

We developed a process to create a vitamin designed just for you in the morning to get you moving and same for the nighttime. Multivitamins you buy at the store come packed with things your body doesn’t need and misses out on essential nutrients, well not anymore. With our process we have spent 12 years researching exactly what your mind and body needs in the morning and evening, for clarity during the day and peaceful rest at night. “EnNeuro” allows a person to take advantage of a life with optimal health and performance when they are taking the right supplements. 
Hello! My name is David and I suffer from fatigue, lack of focus, motivation, chronic brain-fog, stress, depression. But I need to feel great everyday in order to be present at work, with my family and friends. Why is this so difficult? I do not want to rely on endless cups of coffee and energy drink just to get through the day… So what is a guy left to do?? 
  Invent a safer, more effective alternative to feeling your best each day. Something that can help working professionals, students, entrepreneurs, employees and employers from all walks of life! Something that can invigorate people all over the world… And then…. EnNeuro was born! 
Every single year of my life prior to my tenure at junior high, I had always been successful in school, with tons of energy to enjoy the company of my friends after school. I remember distinctively, however, the day in mid junior year, my tests started getting harder, and even more as I progressed into my first year of college; classes and assignments became more complex and deadlines increased the stress. 
To make matters worse, I had to get a full time job while pulling over 18 semester credit hours at the same time. When I started searching for solutions and polling my peers I was shocked to find out that many of their routines included: 1) Coffee 3-5/day 2) Energy Drinks 2-7/day 3) Adderall 1-2/day and energy pills 3-6/day. 



    


                                                          The Impact: 
 Coffee, prescription pills and energy drinks were prevalent with people at my job and school, most of these individuals barely even got 4 or 5 hours of sleep which made it even worst and even scary for me, to see that I would have to do the same just to get by and graduate. I started taking lots of different vitamins and trying to relieve stress and achieving REM sleep as quick as possible so I wouldn't have to sleep 8 hours/day but maybe 4 or 5. 




Another issue was, all the meals most people ate during my college years were fast food and microwavable meals, which even disturbed me more, because I knew that there must have been healthier options to do this to be successful in school. Vitamins started to become my daily nutrition, as well as to counter any negative effects that could deter my efforts to stay focused at work and school. Throughout my junior year of college to after graduation, I started playing with single natural ingredients that can help provide rich nutrients to your brain, thus increasing your productivity level without brain fog. I started noticing slight increases of myself being more alert and attentive to tasks at hand. As I climbed the corporate ladder, I noticed that I started working more than normal hours approximately 50 to 70 hours a week, doing many mundane and tedious tasks and meetings. I continually sought out more and more natural ingredients and tested them on myself by using multiple blends of the ingredients simultaneously, I had to use the process of elimination over the years to find the perfect blend formulation that worked synergistically without any side effects. I had many friends and peers try my dietary blend with me during this time of discovery, with trials and errors. After painstakingly searching and developing a healthier choice to be a better you, I finally found the perfect blend of nutrients. This happened because I was determined to seek a better and healthier alternative to change my life, and since then, it has become my primary source of nutrients to get by in life and be able to think faster, retain memories and stay coherently focused in all situations, at school or work. This has really helped me get promoted many times by being more efficient and productive. Now I want to share this with the world to help others get through the experience I had, or to achieve more than I did, in a healthy way, not sacrificing their health but to redefine normal. I learned you can do it all, simply by nourishing your brain to improve your cognitive function.  It took me over 12 years to perfect and develop this cognitive enhancer for you to experience an increase of a healthier and balanced lifestyle without any sacrifice to what you currently do.                                                            
                                                           Our Mission
“We provide all-natural supplement products to create a balanced and healthy lifestyle. We also offer unparalleled opportunities for motivated individuals to take control of their future and build the life they have dreamed of.”




 Do you take supplements every morning? The numbers are growing. A new government study found that more than half of American adults take at least one dietary supplement. But despite their popularity, many experts remain skeptical of their effects. "The pill is a nice idea, but we have no reason to think this one-size-fits-all dose makes any sense for each individual," said Deen Dr. Darwin Deen, clinical professor in the department of family and social medicine at Albert Einstein College of Medicine in New York. That is why our supplement is perfect, we have specifics components to help give your body what it needs: day and night.
My product is called EnNeuro for day and night, which is a proprietary formula that works by harnessing dozens of natural and extracted nootriments to synergistically enhance your cognitive function. EnNeuro is a eurogenic that supports memory improvement and mood uplifting by acting as a psycho-stimulant without causing a jitters or a crash later end of the day.












        
                                                How you can help:
For me to bring my vision to life, I need your support!
If you aren't able to make a monetary donation, but would like to contribute to the campaign mission, there are plenty of other ways to help!
         Here is a breakdown for how we will spend the funds that we get through Indiegogo:


                                                    Try our Supplements
   Please try our supplements and tell your friends how great you feel!                                                                PERKS:








                                                                                                                         
                                      Teach someone else about the product
At its core, this campaign is about helping people who live with chronic fatigue and poor sleep. If you're in a position to teach someone else how to better help themselves - do it! You are contributing to this campaign by passing on the awareness.
                                                      Spread the word
You can contribute your popularity by telling your friends and family about this campaign. The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number of people who view this page. If you can increase that number, you are making a tangible contribution to the mission.
We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “EnNeuro” family.

story:
I have spent most of my life creating  and using herbal remedies - I worked in the beauty industry, owned my own spa in NYC as well as worked behind the scene on commercial and fashion shoots.

 In 1999, I began researching natural ingredients and  spent six years working with two Licensed chemists, developing a line of organic natural nail products that provided treatment with no carcinogenic chemicals.

 Growing up, I never took medicine- when sick, instead my grandmother gave me  herbal remedies that were prepared at home. Presently I eat organic food as well as keeping my mind and emotions clear.

Throughout the years, I shared many of these natural remedies with friends and clients and I have had an amazing number of testimonials and words of gratitude of some miraculous healings. Many problems could not be resolved by the medical community, but my grandmother’s solution worked!

I was encouraged by friends and clients to write a book with these recipes and share it with the public as a service to help thousands have healthier choices.

It seems that the population of the world is becoming more aware of natural organic foods and cures and are much more interested in alternative approaches.   Our environments are being further polluted with chemicals in the air, soil, and our waters.

I am now compiling the material into a lavishly illustrated 144-page hardcover book.

"Mamanjoon's Secret Potions"  - history, legend and natural recipes from  the ancient land of Persia.

You can see sample images of the book in the 'gallery' page.

What We Have Spent The Amount We Raised In 2015.

We have raised $1584.00. Thanks to all those who supported the Project, thus we were able to pay for a professional book editor, to check the work, correct errors, and keep standards high.

A deposit to the publishing company to reserve the 2015 publishing fee.

What We Need

Having written the text, taken high-quality photographs and- collected archive photos, I now need to produce the book into a final product.

Your pledge will help fund the following:

• Finishing the text, book design, and artwork.

• Licensing of additional images

• ISBN book numbering and registration.

• Colour printers proofs.

• Print the books (professionally printed on FSC paper sourced from sustainable forests.)

• Promotional materials and review copies.

What You Get

In return, your pledge will ensure you are among the first to receive a signed copy of this new and fascinating book (or whatever goods you have pledged for), with your name printed on a special contributors page as a thank you. Delivered around March of 2016, in time for Spring. Safe in the knowledge that you have helped bring an independent and worthwhile project to life.

The Impact

When viewed in a single volume, this stunning collection of natural remedies, along with their history, legend and mythology, presents an extraordinary record of the rich variety of ancient remedies worldwide. While also telling a human story. A celebration of my grandmother's legacy, through words and pictures, the book ultimately calls for their preservation. 

Risks & Challenges

• As a new  author, I was lucky to have successful authors as friends to guide me. 

• I need to achieve a printer deadline and finish the book by November.

•  I understand the production pitfalls and challenges involved in producing a book.

• I have national distribution lined up to make the book available through all the usual outlets.

This book will happen. Any additional funds raised will help increase the print run.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, please share my project via social media or e-mail, using the Indiegogo link, as spreading the news far and wide will be key for making "Mamanjoon's Secret Potions" a reality.

Find This Campaign On

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FIx70KjPvi8&feature=youtu.be

https://www.pinterest.com/firozelove/

https://www.instagram.com/firozelove/

https://www.facebook.com/MamanJoons-Secret-Poti...

story:
We have a dream to create a Wellness Center called Shanti Living

 Even though our campaign has ended we will still continue to raise the funds we need to open our doors! 

Please visit the following link for Donation and Package Perk purchases - 

https://igg.me/at/OiUEt1A2DtE

Please visit ShantiLivingWellness.com 

to pre-purchase your package! 


                  Our goal is to offer healthy lifestyle support through:                   Yoga, Ayurveda, Massage, Energy & Sound Healing

Shawn O'Reilly is a massage therapist experienced in Swedish, Deep Tissue, and Clinical Massage. He spent 24 years in the United States Navy as a hospital corpsman and fell in love with medicine. Towards the end of his career, he started seeing better results in his patients who were adopting a more holistic approach. Those who were incorporating massage, yoga, meditation and other complementary modalities were seeing greater benefits to their overall wellbeing. While he believes western medicine has a role in health care, he also embraces these other complementary practices.

                                                                 

As a Massage Therapist, he now has the ability to really invest in his clients and hear their stories. Working together, Shawn and his clients are able to discover the roots of their symptoms and create solutions to manifest true healing,

                                                                                                        

      


Kym Detwiler-O'Reilly is an experienced and certified yoga teacher, with a background in fitness as a personal trainer. Over the past 15 years, she has seen how yoga can help transform people's lives.  

    She also is an Ayurveda Wellness Counselor, guiding individuals with practical information on wellness and disease prevention with an emphasis on nutrition and lifestyle support.

 Ayurveda is the ancient Indian science of life.  Ayurveda and Yoga are sister sciences, they work together and help bring more balance and harmony to the body, mind, and spirit. Ayurveda focuses on the cause of “dis-ease” in the body. According to Ayurveda, going against Nature’s laws, and against our own inner wisdom  are the cause of all disease. The concept with Ayurveda is to get back into balance with our systems and to get back in balance with Nature.


The ancient wisdom of Yoga & Ayurveda are tools to help live a healthy life physically, mentally, emotionally & spiritually.



Offering a variety of Hatha Yoga styles to fit your needs: 

Gentle Yoga, Vinyasa, Therapeutic Yoga, Restorative Yoga,

Yoga for Cancer & Cardiac Rehabilitation,

Restorative Yoga with Crystal Singing Bowls.

                  

                
Energy Healing 

 Direct Divine Light Healing ™ is a modality which guides individuals to connect to their true nature. This spiritual healing modality works with the aura and empowers individuals to heal and accelerate in their spiritual growth.

Crystal Singing Bowls-Scientific studies show that sound can produce changes in the body.When working with the singing bowls, the effects of the sound and vibration may help to bring more balance and harmony to the body.

Fitness

Personal Training-Fitness for your Dosha/Body Constitution.


At Shanti Living Wellness we are passionate about health & wellbeing.


  


We have a true desire to help people, and to be of service, to educate and inspire people with these alternative healing modalities. 


What makes Shanti Living Wellness different?

Our unique approach with Massage, Yoga, Ayurveda and Energy Healing will be in a studio setting. Individual, semi-­private and small group yoga classes make each session more personalized. Private massage, energy and sound healing sessions will also be offered in this peaceful setting.

                                                                 

Yoga is for Every Body. Sessions are personalized to meet your needs. 

With an emphasis on disease prevention to assist you in living a healthy life!

We want to create a welcoming and peaceful space that brings community together 

Future community programs we want to create:

  • Yoga for cancer recovery classes
  • Yoga for veterans and military


We need your help in creating this center!


We are raising $15,000 to help 

Shanti Living get started. 

In return you invest in your health while supporting the community! 

If you are ready to step up and take control of your health and wellbeing,        we can help you!

In exchange for your support, we have package perks to help you get on track with feeling great!  

***Our campaign lists $5,000. Our actual goal is $15,000+ we will continue to raise money even after we reach $5,000.

   


If you don’t live in the area, not a problem! We have packages that give you the opportunity to get away for the weekend and visit us here in Poulsbo, WA! There are some great lodging options and only a 20 minute drive from the Kingston-Edmonds and Bainbridge-Seattle Island ferry terminals.


If you feel inclined and resonate with what we are doing, any donation would be greatly appreciated! Donations will be going towards start up fees, to get Shanti Living up and running, as well as assisting with our future community yoga programs. 

Even sharing our message on Facebook and other social media sites with friends would be greatly appreciated!

Our goal is to open in April!

We will be scheduling appointments soon! 

In Sanksrit, 'Shanti' means peace. We believe Shanti Living Wellness Center can help individuals live a more peaceful life, and in return create more peace in the world.

Thank you for your time.

Om Shanti

Namasté

Visit us on Facebook at Shanti Living Wellness

***Our campaign lists $5,000. Our actual goal is $15,000+ we will continue to raise money even after we reach $5,000.

   


If you don’t live in the area, not a problem! We have packages that give you the opportunity to get away for the weekend and visit us here in Poulsbo, WA! There are some great lodging options and only a 20 minute drive from the Kingston-Edmonds and Bainbridge-Seattle Island ferry terminals.






If you feel inclined and resonate with what we are doing, any donation would be greatly appreciated! Donations will be going towards start up fees, to get Shanti Living up and running, as well as assisting with our future community yoga programs. 
Even sharing our message on Facebook and other social media sites with friends would be greatly appreciated!
Our goal is to open in April!
We will be scheduling appointments soon! 
In Sanksrit, 'Shanti' means peace. We believe Shanti Living Wellness Center can help individuals live a more peaceful life, and in return create more peace in the world.
Thank you for your time.

Namasté
