story:
Machines for ecological washing of raw greasy wool

  Damir Remenar- CEO

Remenar-Company

Washing raw sheep wool is now easy, it can be done without much effort, hassle and expense for all who want it, you won't have to sell it elsewhere or worry where to store it.


Dirty sheep wool

SPV-5


Washed sheep wool

This wool has been washed on environmentally safe way, without any chemicals or detergents.

We are presenting a new invention which will enable for everyone who bred sheep, or have some other raw wool, to wash it themselves and get higher price for it.

SPV - a revolutionary invention with a new technique for washing wool, which does not use any detergent or any chemicals, and water consumption is 0-30 liters per kilogram of wool.

Depending on the size of the machine or plant that can be built in a variety of capacities ranging from 5 kilograms onwards.

          


Remenar-Company

Why is  SPV - a revolutionary invention, because until now there wasn't any machine that washes wool on ecological way without any detergents, especially not as small as this one for small sheep herders, with this machine they can now wash it themselves and place it on market for better price.

This is 3rd and biggest, so called "ugly prototype"  which was used for experiments. Experiments showed outstanding results, and the machine is easy to handle and work with.

WITH TECHNOLOGY OF THIS MACHINE, NOW WE CAN MAKE MACHINES ANY SIZE AND CAPACITY.


Remenar-company in media


This invention will enable to sheep herders, and to all others, to wash wool by themselves and have much more benefit from it, also to get better price by selling washed wool instead of selling dirty wool. This machines will considerably help sheep herders and to everyone else, in preserving out planet green.

Sheep herders - easier storing of wool, better price for washed wool, lanolin + humus and fertilizer.

Increased herding of sheep, which is good for nature and  - additional work places and  development of rural areas.

LANOLIN 


COMPOST


OR TROWING SLUDGE OF WASHED WOOL, DIRECTLY TO AGRICULTURAL AREA, BECAUSE IT IS GREAT FERTILIZER  


Remenar-Company


Why is  SPV - revolutionary invention, sheep herders will have much more benefit from all wool, even from wool that is not a first class, and usually doesn't even cover the shearing of sheep's.

Our machines will considerably benefit in preserving of the green planet.

- low energy consumption,

- no need for chemicals and detergents,

- there is no pollution 

- there is no waste watter, which are expensive and hard to refine


Depending on the amount of wool it is possible that our machines wash the wool completely alone and so easily increase profit through:

Achieving higher prices for wool

Getting lanolin

Extra fertilizer for the land throwing mud from washing the soil or sludge was mixed with waste and composted sludge, or simply pour the manure.


TECHNICAL PROBLEMS OF SHEEP WOOL


Wool shreareded from sheep is known as greasy raw wool. Wool has to be washed from dirt before it's suitable for further processing.

Washing raw greasy wool in various solutions is still the most effective way, and this is the biggest problem:

The waste water from washing is dirtiest and most polluted water in the textile industry, and most problematic for treatment because of washing in these solutions.

Consumes large amounts of water for washing, as a result there is a large amount of highly contaminated waste water,

If not treated, represent a serious pollutant of the environment.

If waste water is purified, the result is the high price of washed wool.

Such waste water, from scouring are refined on few different ways.

In some countries they simply release it into nature, in some, waste water is disposed in certain landfills and later refined.

In developed countries which have environmental laws and protection, such waster water is refine in few different ways:

Biological processes - aerobic, anaerobic or combination of both.

Chemically - adding different chemicals to purify those waste waters, methods are subsequently separated by sedimentation, centrifugation, filtration or aero-flotation

Physical separation - ultracentrifugation, reverse osmosis or microfiltrarion.

These processes depend on business and development strategy and the environmental laws of country.


With out machines there is no need for any of these methods.

Remenar-Company


Development stages




TEAM


  Damir Remenar  -  CEO of Remenar-Company


Ivan Remenar - Technical Assistant, 3D Modeling


 Andrija Remenar - Mechatronics technician, Web designer

This is 3rd and biggest, so called "ugly prototype"  which was used for experiments. Experiments showed outstanding results, and the machine is easy to handle and work with.


WITH TECHNOLOGY OF THIS MACHINE, NOW WE CAN MAKE MACHINES ANY SIZE AND CAPACITY.



Remenar-company in media


This invention will enable to sheep herders, and to all others, to wash wool by themselves and have much more benefit from it, also to get better price by selling washed wool instead of selling dirty wool. This machines will considerably help sheep herders and to everyone else, in preserving out planet green.

Sheep herders - easier storing of wool, better price for washed wool, lanolin + humus and fertilizer.

Increased herding of sheep, which is good for nature and  - additional work places and  development of rural areas.
LANOLIN 



COMPOST



OR TROWING SLUDGE OF WASHED WOOL, DIRECTLY TO AGRICULTURAL AREA, BECAUSE IT IS GREAT FERTILIZER  



Remenar-Company


Why is  SPV - revolutionary invention, sheep herders will have much more benefit from all wool, even from wool that is not a first class, and usually doesn't even cover the shearing of sheep's.
Our machines will considerably benefit in preserving of the green planet.

- low energy consumption,- no need for chemicals and detergents,
- there is no pollution 
- there is no waste watter, which are expensive and hard to refine


Depending on the
amount of wool it is possible that our machines wash the wool
completely alone and so easily increase profit through:


Achieving
higher prices for wool
Getting
lanolin
Extra
fertilizer for the land throwing mud from washing the soil or sludge
was mixed with waste and composted sludge, or simply pour the manure.

TECHNICAL PROBLEMS OF SHEEP WOOL


Wool
shreareded from sheep is known as greasy raw wool. Wool has to be
washed from dirt before it's suitable for further processing. 

Washing
raw greasy wool in various solutions is still the most effective way,
and this is the biggest problem:
The
waste water from washing is dirtiest and most polluted water in the
textile industry, and most problematic for treatment because of
washing in these solutions.
Consumes
large amounts of water for washing, as a result there is a large
amount of highly contaminated waste water,
If
not treated, represent a serious pollutant of the environment.
If
waste water is purified, the result is the high price of washed wool.
Such waste water, from scouring are refined on few different ways.
In some countries they simply release it into nature, in some, waste water is disposed in certain landfills and later refined.
In developed countries which have environmental laws and protection, such waster water is refine in few different ways:
Biological processes - aerobic, anaerobic or combination of both.
Chemically - adding different chemicals to purify those waste waters, methods are subsequently separated by sedimentation, centrifugation, filtration or aero-flotation
Physical separation - ultracentrifugation, reverse osmosis or microfiltrarion.
These processes depend on business and development strategy and the environmental laws of country.

With out machines there is no need for any of these methods.
Remenar-Company

Development stages






TEAM

  Damir Remenar  -  CEO of Remenar-Company


Ivan Remenar - Technical Assistant, 3D Modeling

 Andrija Remenar - Mechatronics technician, Web designer

story:
Our Vision

Our vision is to create a safe environment and community in which individuals feel empowered to explore, create, and gain self confidence and awareness while connecting mind, body, and spirit.


Why Fund Aerial Yoga & Aerial Arts for 

Winston-Salem and the Triad?


Aerial Yoga is an amazing and refreshing way to get exercise, gain body awareness and confidence, and reconnect with a sense of playfulness, you might not have experienced in years! 
All of this while meeting other, like-minded people in your community. 
Other NC cities - like Chapel Hill, Charlotte, and Asheville,  offer this form of yoga - and we want the same for the Triad!

By donating, you can receive perks like Beginners Class Passes, Private Aerial Yoga Sessions for you or you and your friends and other fun activities! 
There is also the opportunity of donating a full aerial hammock setup for our community space. 

Experience the physical and mental benefits of aerial yoga by investing in your health and wellness!

How Your Donations Help 

With each donation we are able to remodel and build a solid foundation for a donation based aerial yoga studio that we have both dreamed of opening in our hometown. This studio will house both aerial yoga and aerial dance options for the community to experience a new and fun fitness class for all ages.
Aerial hammocks and silks tend to get used often and begin to wear down with washing and daily use. Your donations will help keep our hammocks and silks in optimum operating condition so each participant gets the full advantage of the practice. 


What Your Donations Fund:

  • 6 - Aerial Student Hammocks (fabric only) at 9 yards each - $81 each
  • 6 - Double Point rigs, with carabiners  - $50 each
  • 1 - Aerial Teacher Hammock (fabric only) - $81 
  • 1- Single Point rig with carabiners - $35
  • Shipping for all items - $82.35
General start up costs, such as:
  •  A Contractor, Structural Engineer, & Rigging Specialist - to insure the safety of our space and students. 
  • Liability Insurance to cover our space and students - for a year, while we establish the business.
  • Creation and upkeep of our website
  • Other Miscellaneous start-up costs

Who we are:

Our community is built around authenticity and transparency to encourage individuals to be their true selves while showing compassion to others.

Jami is the owner and licensed massage and bodywork therapist at Blue Lotus Massage and Bodywork in Winston Salem, who has practiced massage therapy full time over the past eight years allowing her to reach her community from a holistic approach. She encourages a lifestyle that will supplement both fitness and wellness techniques for a healthy mind, body and spirit. She found aerial dance classes and realized she absolutely loved it! Leading her to become certified as an aerial yoga instructor from MomentOm Arts in Chapel Hill, NC, where she met Shakira. Jami is a graduate of the UNC School of the Arts, and wants to give back to her community in Winston Salem. She is an artist at heart which shows through her beautiful personality and ability to create spectacular results from everything she touches.

Shakira found holistic healing after completing her Bachelor of Arts in Psychology at UNC Chapel Hill. Coming from a fitness background, she began thinking of new options to become more self aware as well as confident in what she had to offer to the community.  Her radiant personality is sure to bring a smile to your face, while creating a comfortable environment to explore new things. As a licensed massage and bodywork therapist and yoga instructor with Train to Relax, LLC she supplemented her education to become certified as an aerial yoga instructor at MomentOm Arts in Chapel Hill. She plans to give back to the community "gifts" that were not available during her childhood and young adult life. Her technique of creating wellness plans for others is filled with both passion and compassion in creating a fun, exciting and safe environment to learn more about yourself.

Together, Winston Salem locals Jami and Shakira, bring you Winston Salem Aerial Yoga and Arts. We offer aerial yoga, vinyasa yoga and other forms of healing arts to the community to encourage mind, body and spirit connection. WSAYA is looking to grow to become a performing arts center with our base in Winston Salem. Our long term goal is to connect with the community to build a stronger arts based program. 

Please consider donating & help us bring the benefits of Aerial Yoga to the YOU and the Triad today!

story:
Short Summary

Hey world changers! 

The Emergency Medical Response Foundation is a public service organization that cares for the people of the world and aims to increase survival rates for EMS organizations all over the world. To achieve this mission, we have both short term and long term goals set based on our core values: professionalism, teamwork, commitment as well as quality, understanding and improvement.

Hong Kong has a reputation for having one of the lowest Cardiac Arrest survival rates in the world at 1%. We'd like to see that change. All hearts beat the same, so where you live shouldn't determine whether or not it can be restarted in an emergency.

What We Need & What You Get

So, we need some stuff to get us going and begin our programs. That stuff is money. Your funds will go towards:

-CPR training for citizens & schools

-School first aid teams

-First responder programs (specifically an app that pings CPR trained citizens to respond to an emergency).

-Advocacy events

-Promotions

-Heart Health Education

-Event First Aid/Consultation

PERKS! We want to give you something in return for helping us out. Check out the side bar to find out what this is.

If we don't reach our goal, that's okay. All our funds will still go into our programs.

The Impact

Our organization is needed. After doing research, we found there are no other organizations that do exactly what we do. People are dying all around the world, and we need your help to make that stop.

To date, we have used our funds to pay for society registration in Hong Kong, to advocate to the Hong Kong government, and to offer Standard First Aid/CPR/AED courses for over 20 people. We just keep on dreaming, and things keep on happening. World change sits in the palms of our hands; all we have to do is get off our butts, take a risk, and do something.

Risks & Challenges

One hurdle that EMRF faces is lack of support from the government of Hong Kong. We will continually seek support from local governments and try to influence policy makers to make a greater change. The LegCo in HK has already shown some support for EMRF by publishing one of our letters, and we hope to capitalize on this to continue to progress forward.

Of course, our organization could be a complete flop as well, and slowly die out. However, we have developed an extremely effective strategy & put together highly motivated staff members who are dedicated to the further development of this organization. We have yet to see an organization that focuses so much on this issue and its solutions, so we are sure we are here to stay.

No matter what happens, you can be sure that your funds are being used to invest in life.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand some of you can't contribute right now, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Find out how you can help here:

http://emrfoundation.weebly.com/get-involved.html

You can also use the IndieGoGo share tools to share our campaign to all your family and friends.

Thanks for partnering with us and investing in life.

Regards,

The Emergency Medical Response Foundation Team

story:
Our company, TextileScents Inc., is launching our patented invention. An aromatherapy infusion bag called the ReScenter. For the first time ever, the ReScenter allows you to re-infuse (re-scent) any textile product! It’s so easy! You can do it at home in your clothes dryer for your own aroma-therapeutic spa treatment.

The first product (more to follow) included in the ReScenter - is the most luxuriously soft and fluffy pair of socks on the planet as well as a delightful smelling bottle of all natural essential oil.

This is the first sock product that actually does something for you, your feet, your friends and your family!

Each of the four initial scents corresponds with different colored socks, each delivering too many distinctive aroma-therapeutic benefits to mention. We have focused on one main benefit each. 

  • Relax with Lavender 
  • Focus with Rosemary 
  • Energize with Peppermint 
  • Sleep with Chamomile 

These scented socks also provide the added advantage of better smelling feet!                          They even make your shoes smell great!


Just SPRAY the inside of the bag with 1-2 squirts of the oil 

                                             

Put the socks in the bag, seal and toss in your TUMBLE dryer for 5 minutes

                                      

You can even ENJOY a personal foot massage as you walk!                                           

                                             

Until now there has never been a sustainable method to maintain the benefits of scent in clothing. Methods currently on the market rapidly deteriorate through friction or wash out after a few washes. These other methods also use non-eco friendly chemical based scents. We use essential oils, made from flowers and plants that are steam distilled to capture their oils. For centuries essential oils have been used for perfumery and numerous benefits related to health and well-being. With the current trend toward healthier lifestyle choices, the ReScenter allows you to experience the aroma-therapeutic benefits of essential oils for the life of the socks.

Invented by Doctors

The Inventors - Drs. West & Annett-Hitchcock. Both originally from England, met at their current positions in the College of Textiles at North Carolina State University. Through Kate’s research in sustainable scent infused clothing Andre was inspired to come up with a solution and together they collaborated on this project. N.C. State supported their idea and helped patent the system and here we are after much testing, branding and focus groups.

Andre - Has over 20 years of design/product development, and manufacturing production experience and advises major retailers and manufacturers.

To read more about Andre go to:

http://www.tx.ncsu.edu/about/find-people/people-detail.cfm?id=741

Kate - Her research focus is helping all people improve their health, well-being and general quality of life through intelligent clothing design.

To read more about Kate go to:

http://www.tx.ncsu.edu/about/find-people/people-detail.cfm?id=560

We Did Our Research

We have spent countless hours developing the ReScenter with access to the facilities at the #1 College of Textiles in the world. It has come a long way in the last 2 years. We feel very strongly that this is a unique product with exceptional value providing all these benefits:

  • Essential Oils have been used throughout history for their aroma-therapeutic benefits delivered by way of inhalation & absorption through the skin.
  • All natural essential oils, no artificial chemicals on your body. 
  • Nice smelling toes, feet and shoes mitigating natural foot odor.
  • Moisturizing benefits of the oils while wearing the socks. Wear while you sleep if you like?
  • Comfy feet (the socks are extremely soft) wear them all day long!
  • The patented bag keeps the aroma completely inside. You won't smell the aroma until you open the bag. This allows you to keep all your ReScenter socks  in your closet or drawer and the scents won't spread to your other clothes. 
  • Colors and scents matched for easy identification and storage. (Lavender socks go in the lavender bag etc.)

What We Need & What You Get

Until now we have been producing the ReScenter in our garage. We have worked with our suppliers, had samples produced and are finally ready to take the plunge and have already placed our initial orders. No more manufacturing in the garage! Delivery is set to coincide with the end of our campaign. So…these funds will help us commit to our deliveries, allow us to place future orders and move forward developing other exciting products.

Perks:

The patented ReScenter, with a bottle of essential oil & socks of course! Contribute as much or as little as makes you happy. We are deeply grateful. Take at look at the different contribution increments and what you will receive. As an added incentive we will donate $1.00 to Kiva.org for every ReScenter we ship for this campaign and will continue to reinvest those donated funds in order to help other entrepreneurs. Also, the contributor with the most referrals will receive one ReScenter kit on us.

Risks & Challenges

Fortunately, we have managed to get this far with very little investment. As a startup within the university we have had access to many free services such as office space, the Poole College of Management at NC State to help us with packaging, branding, focus groups as well as interns. In addition we have a very talented and well-connected board of directors advising us and helping with their contacts and knowledge of marketing, distribution and more. Our industry experience helps insure we don’t make costly rookie mistakes. This is a family run business. Taking care of the day-to-day operation is Andre’s wife. Heading up sales is Andre’s son who has an MBA. Very soon we will be hiring an intern to handle all the social media as well as help with shipping. Again, we are fortunate that we have very little overhead and all money invested is going to manufacturing and developing new products such as t-shirts, scarfs, and pillowcases.

All that said our main challenges are:

1 - SALES! Getting the word out, creating an interest in our product, and driving sales to our website. We already have the ReScenter in several retail stores, which has been well received.  Now that we will have plenty of product we need to reach out across the country with a team of sales reps to sell to retail stores.

2 - Our first product is in production and we are confident you will love them. However, with any product there is an element of risk. We are dependent on our suppliers to keep to their scheduled lead times.

3 - Currently we are not in a position to order enough volume to receive deep discounts; so our costs will remain on the high end until we reach a level of sales that will allow volume ordering.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you’ve gotten this far we can only assume that you like our ReScenter - Socks and our fun video! The greatest thing you can do (besides contribute lots of cash) to help us is by using your voice. Spread the word. Tell all your friends & family about this lovely scented socks. Like and follow us on any and all social media platforms that you frequent. Use the Indiegogo share tools! Think of those hard to buy for people that need better smelling feet!

The ReScenter makes great birthday, Christmas, Hanukkah, or any occasion gifts.

Just try a pair; you’ll be amazed how nice such a simple idea can make your day!

Thank you from both your feet and us!

story:
Summary

If you have a mosquito bite...Dr. Skeeter is on the spot!

SkeeterPaste™ is a completely natural, safe alternative to the over-the-counter chemicals to relieve the annoying itch and associated pain from mosquito bites and other insect stings.

If mosquito bites drive you crazy, you will want to give SkeeterPaste™ a try! For many people it reduces the itching and swelling very quickly, keeping you from scratching and spreading the histamine associated with the sting, which causes it to swell larger and itch worse.

Label Prototypes

  • My background includes 20+ years of graphic design. I'm an avid outdoorsman and extremely allergic to mosquito bites.
  • I recognized that most people & children experience great discomfort when they are bit by a mosquito, and most readily available relief creams and ointments are made with toxic ingredients that can be very harmful.
  • We spent a few years in development of the perfect all-natural, safe remedy.
  • Contributors to this campaign will help us achieve our marketing goals of reaching every campground general store in America with a sample and an order form. We want to help stop the itching nationwide!

Mosquitos are basically everywhere. Even with conventional insect repellant sprays, nearly everyone gets bit by a mosquito more than once each year, especially while camping, fishing or enjoying any outdoor activities.


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise a minimum of $125,000 for:

1) Marketing costs and expenses associated with shipping a sample package to all 25,000+ campgrounds in America. We plan to start there. Once we have contacted all campgrounds, we will seek other sales outlets and pursue retail stores as well.

2) For initial production costs at our lab in New Jersey.

3) For administrative and management costs.

As a benefit, we are offering tubes of SkeeterPaste™ in exchange for donations, along with our organic lip balm, an embroidered Russell Outdoors™ Realtree® Pullover Hooded Sweatshirt, and an Eddie Bauer® Short Sleeve Performance Fishing Shirt for larger donations.


What It Is

SkeeterPaste™ All-Natural, Safe Proprietary Blend Includes:

Sodium Bicarbonate (Baking Soda)

- Relieves itching from insect bites and bee stings.
- Alkalinity has a cooling effect and will neutralize the acid from the sting.

Apple Cider Vinegar

- Soothing effect on mosquito bites and bee & wasp stings.
- Reduces inflammation.
- Natural insect repellent.

Aloes Ferox (powder)

- The amino acid content of Aloes ferox is almost double that of Aloe vera. Aloes ferox also contains a larger percentage of monosaccharide components in the aloe gel, higher concentrations of minerals, and approximately 20 times more aloe bitters (detoxifying and antibiotic qualities). Aloes ferox is clearly the super aloe of all plant species!
- The Aloes Ferox grows in only one stretch of land in South Africa, this is the only place in the world that the Aloes Ferox plant will grow (due to barometric sensitivity). The Aloes Ferox is grown naturally, harvesters use age old methods to collect the sap from the Aloes Ferox. The Aloes Ferox has been harvested in South Africa for centuries, the ancient Chinese, Indians, and Egyptians have all used the Aloes Ferox for its healing properties. Mahatma Ghandi also used the Aloes Ferox while living in South Africa, knowing the power of the Aloes Ferox, Ghandi would ingest the Aloes Ferox gel on a regular basis. 
- Skin healing properties.
- Soothes irritation from insect bites.
- Excellent moisturizer.
- Soothes and repairs irritated skin from excessive scratching.
- Natural source to heal skin.

Lemon Oil

Among essential oils, lemon oil is known as a strong antiseptic that prevents and clears up infections and inflammation.

Coconut Oil

Coconut oil is a safe solution for preventing dryness and flaking of skin.

Shea Butter

Shea butter is one of the best moisturizing, anti-aging regenerating and protecting natural product in the World! It protects skin from UV sunlight, harsh climate, dehydration and pollution damages.

Citronella Java

- One of the world's dominant insect repellents before the introduction of DDT.
- A safe, natural alternative...once again the choice for health-conscious consumers.
- Helps keep insects away from existing bites and causing further irritation.


Safe even for babies.


What It Is Not

WARNING! If these chemicals are in your current mosquito relief or repellent products, you and your family could be at a serious risk to your health!

Benzocaine

Moderate to serious side effects of using topical benzocaine are problems breathing or swallowing, swollen tongue or mouth, irregular heartbeat, malaise, body twitching, hypersensitivity, burning, redness, itching and rash.

Another rare but life threatening health risk is the development of methemoglobinemia (MetHb). MetHb is a blood conditions that reduces the ability of red blood cells to deliver oxygen through the body. Symptoms of MetHb are:

- pale or blue-grey skin on lips or nail beds
- shortness of breath
- fatigue
- confusion
- headache
- lightheadedness
- nausea
- change of heart rate

Symptoms may appear shortly after exposure to benzocaine or a couple of hours later. In some instances, MetHb can progress to stupor, coma and even death.

Parents and caregivers are warned to use caution when considering use of benzocaine products for their babies, infants and children.

DEA, or diethanolamine

- Carcinogenic; also interacts with nitrites to form a carcinogenic nitrosamine.
- One of an estimated 125 ingredients used in home and personal care products that have been proven to cause cancer.

Source: http://www.preventcancer.com

Propylene Glycol

A cosmetic form of mineral oil found in automatic brake and hydraulic fluid and industrial antifreeze. In the skin and hair, propylene glycol works as a humescent, which causes retention of moisture content of skin or cosmetic products by preventing the escape of moisture or water. The Material Safety Data Sheet warns users to avoid skin contact with propylene glycol as this strong skin irritant can cause liver abnormalities and kidney damage.


Don't go camping or fishing without it.


Risks & Challenges

This project has already come a long way and we believe we are past the most challenging parts. After several iterations we've finalized our designs and identified vendors. We have made prototype molds and received samples. Once funded, we will move from prototype to production molds.

We are currently working on packaging design, confirming production schedule, and lining up all our vendors to converge at our target shipping date.

If we do not reach our funding goal, we will face the challenge of reaching out to individual campgrounds which could take years. We believe we could overcome this challenge by putting together a team to pursue all avenues for sales.

What We Need to raise in this campaign:

  • We need 125k for raw materials, production costs & initial marketing.
  • As soon as we hit our goal we will start manufacturing immediately.
  • If we don't reach our goal we will still invest in bringing SkeeterPaste™ to life.

Another Way You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute at this time, we understand. Please consider sharing this campaign with your friends and family using the Indiegogo share tools.

Thank you in advance!

story:
Hello! My name is Ismail Islam and I am an Under 17 sprinter from Tower Hamlets in London with a dream to become the first British Asian sprinter.

I am on Indiegogo to seek funding support to kindly help me get to sponsors for my races this summer.

Raising £500 will help me cover the remaining cost of my travelling, equipment, kit, food and paying for my competition fees. For your help raising this money, even if all you can manage is sharing the link to this campaign, I will be truly grateful.

I am a dynamic and motivated, multi-talented sportsman and have played sport from a young age. I work well on my own and as part of a team. I am passionate about athletics and this is a sport that I excel at.

I have a strong work ethic and I am one hundred per cent committed to achieving whatever goals I set myself.

It is my intention using the skills that I have developed and continue to develop to inspire the youth of today to follow a path that will make them, fitter, healthier and well balanced young people.

My #SportStory

I make an effort to take care of my health and fitness by going to the gym, running regularly and following a balanced diet. During my session I also promote these values.

I am an extremely determined and committed athlete. I have a determination to succeed and a willingness to learn. It is my intention to pursue a career in teaching sports to young people and fulfilling any goals that I set myself with hard work and commitment.

I read to enhance my knowledge of health and fitness and make every effort to apply it to my own lifestyle. I go to the gym, run regularly and follow a balanced diet. I research on the internet and I am computer literate. I enjoy the preparation of sports presentations.

My future goals are to pursue my own sporting ambitions and to motivate and inspire young people through coaching and teaching into a lifetime of sport and healthy lifestyle.

I endeavour to be a good role model for the community. I hope to be a positive influence and encourage young people to balance sport and education.

story:
About me:
A nurse for 29 years, health educator for 18 years, watch health care evolve into sick care. I love people and love to see them healthy and happy.
My campaign is to open a clinic to the public where they will receive a wellness consultation with the goal to educate on alternative options, resources available, to make an informed decision to improve any health concerns they may have. The clinic will also offer alternative products with diagnostics.Eastern medicine is trickling into western medicine, but to slowly. I want to assist to speed that up.
Contributing to my campaign will help me start this clinic, begin immediately helping others. Once the clinic is open 1% of profits will go to Homeless Shelters and 1% to domestic violence shelters.Please help me make a difference. Contributors will receive a free consultation.

The funding needed:

Contributions will go to: Medical Director, Office space and equipment,Consulting Diagnostic tools, alternative products, salaries, marketing. This will be my second self owned business, which I conducted for 18 years as educator, helping those who needed the education and was unable to pay, building a trusted company on high moral values, in which this clinic will be conducted in the same way.
Helping others is my priority, you helping me will also be helping others!! What a great feeling.
If I do not reach my entire goal, I will put the funds contributed toward the opening of the clinic anyway.

The Impact:

Your contributions will help others you may never meet on this side of heaven, but make a huge difference in the health of their lives. The clinic will be a spiritual uplifting the minute you walk in greeted by smiling, kind, caring professional there to meet your health concerns.


Risks & Challenges

There are always risks and challenges in starting a new business, but I have faced a lot of those in starting and running my previous business. Giving up is not an option, and have the knowledge to resolve obstacles and continue to the goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

Being unable to contribute is totally understandable, but contributions other than monetary can be life changing, as sharing with others you know who may be compassionate about the clinic. Indiegogo has share tools, and all the social sites are areas to share.

story:
Occupational Therapy Centennial Float

The Occupational Therapy Centennial Float has been accepted as an official entry in the 2017 Annual Tournament of Roses® Parade that will be held on Monday, January 2, 2017, in Pasadena, California. This unprecedented initiative honors the 100th Anniversary of the occupational therapy profession, including the 350,000 occupational therapy practitioners and millions of consumers world-wide. 

For 100 years, occupational therapy practitioners have dedicated their lives to rehabilitating veterans, helping children with disabilities be able to play and to learn, modifying home environments for the aging to age in place within the context of their own homes, enabling people to better manage chronic conditions, and assisting individuals with mental illness to live life to the fullest.  You or someone you know may have experienced similar life changes through occupational therapy.  Your donation will honor the 100-year history of occupational therapy, including consumers and dedicated practitioners, and celebrate the profession's future in promoting global health and wellness among individuals of all ages.   

$250,000 needs to be raised to support the costs of float design and construction that begins in March 2016, just a few months away!  We want to achieve the short-term goal of $150,000 by January 1st, and you can help us get there!  

Global Impact for Occupational Therapy

The Tournament of Roses® Parade is one of the largest social rituals in the world - an opportunity for the profession of occupational therapy to be widely recognized and globally connected.  Highlights of media coverage:

  • 50+ million television viewers around the globe
  • 700,000+ attendees along the parade route
  • 60,000+ viewers of the float display post-parade
  • Tournament of Roses® website receives over 3.6 million views pre-parade
  • 80+ media organizations cover the Rose Parade live

Get Involved - It's 'coming up roses'

The Occupational Therapy Association of California (OTAC) is leading the charge with fund-raising on behalf of the entire profession of occupational therapy and has already raised nearly $50,000!  Please join all those who have donated including:

  • Occupational Therapy practitioners around the world
  • Occupational Therapy associations across the United States
  • Occupational Therapy & Occupational Therapy Assistant professional and post-profesisonal programs around the country
  • Occupational Therapy practitioners around the world
  • Occupational Therapy students around the world
  • Grateful consumers of occupational therapy are saying 'thank you' through their donations
  • Hospitals, pediatric practices, rehabilitation settings are honoring the great work of occupational therapy through their donations
  • Friends and supporters of Occupational Therapy around the world

Spread the Word!  

If you or someone you love has experienced life changes through occupational therapy, donate today and spread the word.  Tell your family and friends! Tweet after you donate #otfloat2017.  Thank you for your support!

story:
Note about our Perks: The Abri Honor Wall perk is optional. We fully respect your family's right to privacy. If you want your name on the Honor Wall, you can opt to provide us with your first name (last is optional) and the name of a loved one(s) who you wish to honor (First name only). The choice is up to you! Or you can opt not to do the Honor Wall or be acknowledged as 'anonymous'. We will email at the end of the campaign to find out your preference. Thank you!  

Our campaign: Help us take our prototype to production so we can achieve our mission of revolutionizing baby sleep safety! We are Sleep Environment Innovations (SEI).

  • 60% of parents will sleep with their baby in the first year, whether by accident or intention.


  • 90% of sleep-related infant deaths happen in babies <6 months, because they are at the greatest risk of harm in adult sleep environments like beds, couches, and sofas. More than 600 babies in the United States die each year of suffocation or strangulation in bed. We believe new innovations in technology can help prevent these tragedies. 


  • 1/3 of parents in our research talk about 'near-misses' where they woke to find their baby in a dangerous position and corrected the position. These experiences are scary and even traumatic for parents.

  • Just like car seats protect babies in cars from forces that can harm them in the rare event of a car accident, we have designed a product that does the same for babies in sleep environments.

  • Our team has applied the principles of aviation safety to invent a product that minimizes the most common hazards that hurt young babies. SMS Explained


  • The Abri 360 is the first nurse designed portable infant sleeper that uses sensors to alert parents to critical hazards. The Abri 360 monitors the place and space around the baby to detect critical events before the baby is hurt. This gives parents precious moments to respond to the alarm and remove the hazard.

Watch our video and visit our website to learn more about the "Design behind the Design" at www.abri360.com.

We hope you will join our community campaign to bring our prototype to production this time next year for the 2016 holiday!

Fun Fact: Did you know the device pictured below was used in the 1700's in Florence Italy by nurses to keep babies safe in bed with parents? Learn more about it here: The Arccucio

story:
Any parent who has stayed up with a feverish child can see the genius of a wearable, wireless, continuously monitoring thermometer with instant fever alerts. No more sleepless nights, not to mention the priceless peace of mind. The idea’s actually been on the market for a while, but a quick look at reviews from real families confirms what you suspected . . . that it’s real life usability that counts. The LAST thing you need is another “smart” device or app that creates more hassle than the problem you were trying to solve in the first place. We feel you . . . we’re parents too. That's why we made Temp Pal, the wearable thermometer that anticipates the real life needs of real families like yours. A real life solution--from one parent to another.

 

Meet Temp Pal

Temp Pal anticipates your real family needs.

  • Easy-to-use. Easy to connect with your smart device; app is simple and intuitive.

  • Comfortable. Flexible and thin, bends with your body; hypoallergenic.

  • Reliable. Clinically certified thermometer provides accurate measurements; quick pairing and auto rescan keeps you connected.

  • Versatile. Perfect for small children, couples trying to get pregnant, elders, post-surgery or chemotherapy patients; reassignable according to your family needs.

  • Affordable. Rechargeable and reusable; it’s eco- and budget- friendly!

 

 

 

 

Accurate Measurement

 

Traditional infrared thermometers are subject to interference from ear wax or other obstructions. Moreover, the probe has to reach deep into the ear canal to get the right temperature. Needless to say, it HURTS. No wonder children squirm!


Temp Pal records body temperature through direct skin contact. Our clinically certified advanced thermal technology integrates hardware and software calibration and takes multiple measurements to obtain precise measurements to within ±0.09℉/ ±0.05℃.

 

 

Bluetooth Connectivity and Local Data Storage

 

Pairing Temp Pal with a smart device is quick and simple. Temp Pal automatically searches for and connects to your device within seconds; auto rescan keeps you connected. Even if temporarily disconnected, Temp Pal continues to store data locally and keeps trying to reconnect. Moreover, data can be easily retrieved from the cloud if the device is lost or changed.
 

 

Easy-to-Use App

 

Temp Pal’s companion app is intuitive and displays real-time temperature reading and historical temperature data. The app alerts you when temperature moves beyond a customizable threshold.
 

Reusable, Rechargeable

  • Typically runs for more than 36 hours on a single charge

  • Fully recharges in just 2 hours

  • Designed for continuous, long-term use.

 

 

Temp Pal does more than just keep track of your kid’s temperature. It’s a versatile health tracking device for the whole family. 
 

Continuous, Remote Fever Watch

 

Let Temp Pal keep the fever watch while you sleep or work. Temp Pal gives you real-time, continuous remote access to your loved one's temperature, and instantly alerts you when the temperature reaches a customizable threshold. You and other caregivers can monitor your loved one--or loved ones--at the same time.

 

Automatic, Accurate BBT and Fertility Charting

 

Sleep tight and rest easy while Temp Pal takes the hassle out of BBT tracking and fertility charting.

  • Temp Pal automatically takes and tracks BBT at a consistent time while you sleep.

  • Fertility charting feature predicts when you're most likely to conceive.

 

Track Temperature to Stay Healthy

 

A fever may be the first sign of infection, inflammation, or another serious condition. At certain times, such as flu season, after surgery, or when the immune response is weakened (e.g., during chemotherapy treatment), temperature tracking can be vital. Temp Pal helps you to pick up on any warning signs of serious conditions by monitoring your temperature. 

 

 

 

 

Unlike competing products, Temp Pal is:

  • Reusable

  • Rechargeable

  • Easily reassignable according to your ever-changing family needs

  • Designed for long-term use

It’s so affordable you can get even more than one!

 

 

Temp Pal is more than just a smart thermometer. It’s a health tracking solution that makes managing real life easier. Alerts, data logs, and monitoring help you stay healthy.

 

 

Never Miss a Dose

The Temp Pal app allows you to keep track of your medication and alerts you when it’s time to take your meds.

Secure Health History

Temp Pal stores historical health data in the cloud, and allows users to securely access their encrypted health history. You can keep a profile for each member of your family: add new temperature data, record symptoms, medications taken, and key health events (e.g. vaccinations, physicals, etc.), and share the data with your healthcare provider. With Temp pal, you can keep an ongoing health history for each member of your family in a secure, but easily accessible place.

Group Monitoring

Ideal for multiple children, or for daycare centers! Temp Pal supports “many-to-many” temperature monitoring, making it possible to view readings from multiple Temp Pals on multiple devices simultaneously. That is, both parents and other caregivers can view the condition of multiple children at the same time.

 

 

 

Setting up Temp Pal is effortless.

Just place Temp Pal in the armpit, and it will automatically measure body temperature continuously, send the readings to smart device via bluetooth, and upload health data to the cloud.

Through our cloud service, you will have remote and real-time access to your family's health data and historical logs. You can also share any of the info with your healthcare providers for professional advice.

 

 

 

*Via Cloud Remote Monitoring, both mom and dad can simultaneously care for all the children.

*TempTraq is single-use and disposable, whereas Temp Pal is rechargeable and reusable.

 

"The cloud option could be convenient if you have more than one Temp Pal; perhaps you're monitoring your own temperature as well as your kid's."  -PCMag

"Nifty tech gives parents peace of mind" -WAREABLE

"It even allows for group monitoring making it ideal for parents with multiple children or daycare centers that want to ensure that the little ones are always in the best of health." -Ubergizmo

"Because of its soft, thermoplastic material, the Temp Pal is flexible, and it’s so small and thin (0.12 inches to be exact), that didn’t cause any discomfort whatsoever." --Digital Trends

"The most impressive thing about Temp Pal, even in the brief time spent with it, is how this unassuming little square seems to work exactly as advertised. It's light and flexible enough to not be uncomfortable when used for extended periods, accurate enough to be used as a home thermometer, and the battery won't die on you in the middle of the night." - iMore

 

 

 

"Temp Pal’s a smart sticking plaster that tells you your kid’s OK" -Live Smart

 

 

 

 

Hi, we are the Temp Pal team.

All our team members are parents or expecting couples, who have experienced the morning hassle of checking BBT chart or sleepless nights worrying about child fever. That’s why we put our engineering and medical field expertise to developing Temp Pal, a device designed to make temperature monitoring easier and more comfortable.

Founded in Taiwan in 2014, iWEECARE is collaborating with electronics manufacturers Flextronic and TSMT to ensure the best product quality and the most timely production schedule.

For a better health care alternative. Please join us, help us, and bring Temp Pal to life.

 

 

 

 

 

  • Weight: 0.09 oz
  • Length: 1.12 inch
  • Width: 0.88 inch
  • Thickness: 0.12 inch
  • Bluetooth Connection: 5 m
  • Accuracy: +/-0.09 F (or +/- 0.05 C) 
  • Battery: Rechargeable, Continuous 36 hour usage
  • Sweat Proof: IP 34
  • EN 12470-4 Clinical Thermometer standard
  • Compatible: Android, iOS  
  • For more details, please refer to FAQ

 

 

點這裡看怎麼贊助| 點這裡看產品介紹(中文)

 

FAQ

 

1. What is the level of Temp Pal's electromagnetic wave? Will it pose risks to children?

Temp Pal is a BLE (bluetooth low energy) product, and it has very low radiation with emitting only 1/160000 electromagnetic wave of usual cell phone radiation. So please do not worry about the impact of radiation on children.

2. Why do you need Temp Pal?

 

Temp Pal ensures a better, more convenient and more accurate temperature care than traditional thermometers.

For child care, Temp Pal brings peace of mind to parents with remote monitoring.

For moms-to-be, Temp Pal frees you from early morning basal body temperature measurements.

3. How is Temp Pal different from traditional thermometer?

 

Traditional thermometer only measures single, instant temperature condition, and can only be operated manually. Temp Pal improves current unfriendly and inconvenient thermometer usage, and brings a much more comfortable solution to temperature care.

4. Where are Temp Pal’s shipping destinations?

We ship globally! If your address is 'earth', we deliver to wherever you are.

5. How much is Temp Pal’s shipping fee?

Free world shipping! The perk price you've pledged has included all necessary fees.

6. Does Temp Pal use rechargeable battery?

Temp Pal uses eco-friendly, rechargeable lithium-ion battery. Full charge only takes 2-hours. The device typically lasts 36 hours on a full charge. To increase longevity of the battery, we suggest you always charge up Temp Pal in its exclusive egg-shaped charger after use.

7. Is Temp Pal water-proof?

Temp Pal is sweat-proof and water-resistant. While we have passed IP 34 water-proof certification, Temp Pal is still a electronic device, so we would suggest users to store Temp Pal in dry places, and avoid splashing liquid on Temp Pal.

8. What is Temp Pal’s specification in detail?

Please refer to the table below:

 

 

 

Privacy Policy

Welcome to iWEECARE website and thank you for choosing our products. Here we declare that your personal privacy is respected in this privacy protection policy and is protected in accordance with related laws and regulations. This policy describes what information we collect and how it is used and protected in order to provide you a comfortable environment when you browse our website or use our products and related services. 

 1. The policy regarding what kinds of information we collect. We collect the content and other information you provide when you use our products and related services including when you participate online activities or online survey and register to become our member. This can include information in or about the content you provide such as your name, identification card number, address, telephone number, email and other related information. We also collect information from or about the computers, phones, or other devices where you install or access our services. These device information includes but is not limited to the information such as the data automatically generated by the server when you surf or search the Internet, browser type, IP address, the duration of your online activities, and the content you view. We will not and are unable to use the information to personally identify you except for your consent. Additionally, based on the permission you have granted, the information is stored in the cloud services that we provide. Unless you give us permission, the information stored in our cloud services will not be used to personally identify you. Please note that it is likely that your personal information is collected via third-party websites which are linked to our website. The third-party websites have their own privacy protection policy regarding the information which you agree to disclose to them. Our website's privacy protection policy cannot be applied to the third-party websites.  

 2. The policy regarding how we use this information. The personal information collected from our official website or from our products and services is used in accordance with the purpose that does not go beyond the purpose of collection. We use this information to provide health management services such as health consultation to you. We also use the information we have for the following purposes, including but not limited to, respond to you when you contact us, send you market communications, and communicate with you about our products and services. We conduct business and market analysis based on the information we have about you to evaluate and improve our products and services. The information collected by us about you will not be used for the purpose that goes beyond the purpose of collection and will not arbitrarily be disclosed to other third-party partners.  

 3. The policy regarding sharing personal information with third parties. Your personal information will not be disclosed to other parties via sale, swap, rent or other approaches expect for the following three circumstances in which your information may be shared with third parties: (1) your prior consent or authorization is granted. (2) the requests of judicial body or other authorities under due process. (3) for the purpose of providing you services or preferential programs which are jointly offered by third-party service providers with whom we share information. We will provide sufficient information and notification on iweecare official website. You can choose whether to accept the services or preferences at will.  

 4. The policy regarding business communications or emails sent by iweecare. The business communications or emails sent by us to you may contain services or activities of third-party companies in order to improve our services. Under such circumstances, we will provide sufficient notifications to you and you can choose whether to join the services or activities of third-party companies at will. If you choose to join, your information we have is assured not to be disclosed to the third-party companies. Business communications or emails will be sent to you only if your permission is given to us beforehand. The name of iweecare is stated in the communications or emails to let you know they are sent by us. The approach, notification, or link will be provided in the communications or emails to enable you to cancel the subscription of business communications or emails sent by us at any moment.  

 5. The measurements of self-protection. Please ensure your personal information, CA authentication, or password is securely kept. Do not disclose your personal information, especially your password, to anyone or any institution. Please remember to log out from our website after you finish using services provided by our products. Please also remember to close the window of the browser if you share the computer with others or use the public computer to prevent others from reading your personal information or emails.

story:
For this project we spent about two million of our private money. We have developed all the technology from scratch and created a series of prototypes. Today we have finished the engineering and technology platform for transferring it to Manufacturers.

This device have been engineered on a proprietary concept protected by National and International Intellectual Property Rights. The patents have been granted in the USA, Canada and the European Union.

None of us are immune to happenstance or having a future need for this device. Thanks to Indiegogo, we have a possibility to offer you discount certificates, and you have an opportunity to get them for your family or yourself.
The StepRover’s unique range of functions greatly increases the user's independence and outperforms the majority of purpose-specific devices. In addition to these operational advantages, the purchase and maintenance costs of StepRover will prove to be significantly lower than a number of assistive devices.

Our team of engineers and inventors put in an incredible amount of effort in order to achieve this functionality. The whole development process of this project was carried out using our own means. We are proud of our accomplishments and do not regret the time nor the millions of dollars spent on this cause. After all, bringing the StepRover to the market will greatly improve the lives of many individuals.

History of Project Development


Incredible Functionality

  • Maneuverability, steering, and driving is the same as in a regular wheelchair
  • Leg support with wheels excludes possibility of falling forward
  • Allows to interact with others eye-to-eye and reach higher surfaces
  • Is able to drive up to any table or counter-top
  • Allows user to reach the floor
  • Safely drives at high speeds and on lateral inclined surfaces
  • Adjustable length of the leg extension for sitting and lying
  • User can transfer from bed to StepRover without any help
  • Allows users to take care of their medical and hygiene needs without aid
  • Can be used as an ambulance stretcher in an emergency
  • Allows easier transfer of a user from and to StepRover
  • Gives the nurse an ability to transfer a user without bending
  • Range of tilting & reclining prevents bedsores and improves blood circulation
  • Able to climb on and descend from a surface level
  • Enters and exits buildings without ramps
  • Able to get into or get out of an unmodified vehicle
  • Able to step over different kinds of obstacles like curbs, logs, etc.
  • Allows you to drive over rough terrain, such as snow mounds and sand

In addition to these amazing functions, StepRover will also be compatible with all accessories and options available on the market


Testimonials

The outstanding features of this machine can provide people with the freedom of movement, thereby insuring the success of mass production. For effective manufacturing, our company took on the licensing & transfer of technology business model. In order to simultaneously bring to market a variety of models, we actively involve additional established factories from all over the world.



Perks

We are grateful to all of our backers. Together, we can launch mass production of StepRover. We prepared perks with Certificates of Appreciation, Acknowledgements of Gratitude and Discount Certificates. All the documents are granted in the name of a backer and are transferable to other names by communicating the company directly.

Certificate of Appreciation from the corporation, signed by the President and the team members.

Acknowledgement of Gratitude will be signed by the first five StepRover users.

There are two discount certificates: Personal and Family.

Personal Discount Certificate. The process of redeeming this certificate goes as follows:

While purchasing this licensed product from any manufacturer or a local retailer, you have to give the original of the Discount Certificate and a copy of an official document that confirms the date when a physical disability started (the percent of the discount depends on it).

If the backer became physically disabled after contributing to this campaign, he or she will receive 40% purchase discount; otherwise, the purchase discount would be 15%.

The period of validity of these Discount Certificates is the same as duration of the Patent. All manufacturers have licenses for production of StepRovers based on our technology, until the expiration of the Patent.

Family Discount Certificate is granted to a backer, however the purchase discount is valid for both the backer and his or her immediate family. The owner of the Certificate has to provide an official document that proves his or her family ties. In every other aspect, this certificate works in the same way as the Personal Discount Certificate.

Every licensed manufacturer is obliged by the Licensing Agreement to accept the Discount Certificates. In case a manufacturer refuses, it would constitute a violation of the Licensing Agreement and will entail legal consequences.

We also welcome other types of investments and partnerships. Please contact us directly.

will also be compatible with all accessories and options available on the market
Testimonials The outstanding features of this machine can provide people with the freedom of movement, thereby insuring the success of mass production. For effective manufacturing, our company took on the licensing & transfer of technology business model. In order to simultaneously bring to market a variety of models, we actively involve additional established factories from all over the world.

Perks


We are grateful to all of our backers. Together, we can launch mass production of StepRover. We prepared perks with Certificates of Appreciation, Acknowledgements of Gratitude and Discount Certificates. All the documents are granted in the name of a backer and are transferable to other names by communicating the company directly.Certificate of Appreciation from the corporation, signed by the President and the team members.Acknowledgement of Gratitude will be signed by the first five StepRover users.There are two discount certificates: Personal and Family. Personal Discount Certificate. The process of redeeming this certificate goes as follows: While purchasing this licensed product from any manufacturer or a local retailer, you have to give the original of the Discount Certificate and a copy of an official document that confirms the date when a physical disability started (the percent of the discount depends on it).If the backer became physically disabled after contributing to this campaign, he or she will receive 40% purchase discount; otherwise, the purchase discount would be 15%.The period of validity of these Discount Certificates is the same as duration of the Patent. All manufacturers have licenses for production of StepRovers based on our technology, until the expiration of the Patent. Family Discount Certificate is granted to a backer, however the purchase discount is valid for both the backer and his or her immediate family. The owner of the Certificate has to provide an official document that proves his or her family ties. In every other aspect, this certificate works in the same way as the Personal Discount Certificate.Every licensed manufacturer is obliged by the Licensing Agreement to 
accept the Discount Certificates. In case a manufacturer refuses, it would constitute a violation of the Licensing Agreement and will entail legal consequences. We also welcome other types of investments and partnerships. Please contact us directly.

story:
The mission of the South Street Strength club is:
To transform ourselves and our community by the renewing of our minds (and bodies) for the Lord through weightlifting and purposeful mentorship. Our vision is to create a space that is clean, safe and up-to-date so that people from both the church and community have a nice place to exercise. We pray this space will create discipleship opportunities to share our faith with neighbors, seekers young-men/women, aspiring body-builders and powerlifters, all while improving our physical health! We hope to have a grand opening of the space early/mid June 2016.

Needs:
Safe strength training equipment
      -Squat Cage with safety features
      -Non-slip lifting platform
      -Weightlifting belts and straps
      -Additional plates and dumbbells
     
Cosmetic upgrades to the weight room space
      -Painting
      -Insulation repair


Location:
The South Street Strength Club will be located at 130 W. South St. Akron, OH 44311 next to the already well established South Street Bike Shop.

http://southstreetministries.org/


Romans 12:2
Do not conform to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God’s will is—his good, pleasing and perfect will.

Hebrews 12: 11-12
Now no discipline seems to be joyful at the time, but grievous. Yet afterward it yields the peaceful fruit of righteousness in those who have been trained by it. Therefore lift up your tired hands, and strengthen your weak knees.

story:
We want everyone to have convenient reusable glass bottles, so we're offering an extra 27% off all glass and accessories for our final hours of this campaign!

Drinking Lots of good water is vital for optimal health. Why is it we often don't feel compelled to drink enough of this precious life source?

 Shocking but true- All other filtered and even bottled spring waters are sterilized with UV light, ozone gas, and a sub micron filter. This is similar to how most juice and dairy products are pasteurized for shelf stability. Unfortunately this sterilization destroys beneficial sources of minerals and probiotics.

Microbes outnumber human cells in the body 10 fold. Their are more nerve endings in our bellies than in our brain. There's a constant battle between good and bad bacteria. The micro biome of our gut produces about 95% of the serotonin and 50% of the dopamine in our  brains. Anxiety, weight gain, fatigue, and countless other ailments are linked to an imbalance of proper gut bacteria.

The probiotics listed here are exclusive to unsterilized water. There could be countless other beneficial microbes scientists just haven't found yet. They are imperative for optimal physical and mental health. Without these probiotics we're not able to fully assimilate all the nutrients in our food. Beneficial bacteria are also ​proven​ to have abilities to transform harmful bacteria. Here is a published medical report proving raw spring water has vast healing abilities.

This inspired me to seek water existing in its natural form. The first time I drank fresh living spring water a surge of energy and peacefulness entered my being.

I could never go back to drinking dead water again.  I realized people living in metropolitan areas needed access to this ancient source of all life. I searched the entire West Coast for nearly a year till I was certain I discovered the ultimate source.

Opal Spring levitates out of a lava tube 108,000 gallons per minute. It originates from super deep where their’s no chance for industrial age contamination. It's so pure the town of Madras Oregon has been drinking it raw for over 50 years. It’s abundant in the primary electrolytes, the liquid crystal mineral silica, and living water exclusive recently discovered probiotics.

 

Even bpa free plastic bottles are cancer forming. Recycling requires super wasteful energy and resources. So we designed our own reusable glass system.

Every single piece of glass we sell is hand made and slightly unique.

The flower of life jugs and dispensers are compact, easy to maneuver, and designed to celebrate the magic of water. Our bamboo stands are a great way to show case jugs and dispensers. 

 Our reusable orb and globe bottles are easy to wash and effortless to carry with their insulated organic cotton bags. 

Our mission is to provide convenient access to fresh living spring water for the whole planet. We are committed to donating 10% of profits to a dropinthebucket.org. which provides wells throughout Sub-Saharan African.

We’ve already established a convenient carbon neutral delivery system.

We need your support so we can purchase more glass and upgrade our infrastructure. This will enable us to to share affordable fresh living spring water far and wide. 

For being an early supporter of this health evolution- We’re offering half price for all first time water deliveries. Just pay the refundable jug deposit and we’ll bring the best water our planet offers straight to your door. 

Our Current Water Delivery Service Range

Not in our expanding delivery zone yet? You can still support our expansion and try living water by ordering our crowd funding campaign exclusive discount filled orb and globe bottles.

Even if you do get our convenient deliveries, I encourage everyone to explore the unique beauty of all springs around the planet. Our empty jugs and dispensers are great tools for making that easy.

Your contribution will go towards upgrading your own health and the health of our planet. Thank you for supporting and sharing this health evolution. 

Share

story:
Product Module

G-100

Device Size

45mm x 45mm (diameter* high)

Device Weight

80g（including battery）

Battery working life

Change or discharge more than 500 times

Battery specification

3.7V, 480mAh

Operation pattern

Continuous operation

Charging Input

DC 5V, 1 A

Application body site

Lungs, heart and other internal organs with the use of selective frequency ranges.

Pick up frequency range

30Hz-1200Hz

Modes

Heart, Lung and Heart&Lung

Software

Windows, Mac, Linux, Android and iOS 

Software functions(Free)

- Record heart and lung audio

Lung sound. It can monitor the health condition of the breathing system by stethoscope.

Heart sound. It can monitor the heartbeat by stethoscope.

Camera for heart rate. It can monitor the heartbeat by app not equipment. Simply putting your finger on the camera.

 Self Diagnosis. It can get diagnosis result and suggestion by Mighty Doctor base on MAYO clinic health database when answer the relevant multiple-choice questions.

 

 

A doctor and nurse dedicated innovative electronic stethoscope, sound details clearly visible, adjustable volume.

HD sound smart stethoscope for clinic and home.

China's first children's home intelligent stethoscope, professional piezoelectric sensor, fidelity sound, effective shielding noise. With the mobile app, intelligent analysis of asthma, pneumonia and other respiratory diseases, to achieve early warning and health monitoring.

Can be used independently to replace the traditional stethoscope, support intelligent auscultation diagnosis with mobile phone also. While supporting independent headphone monitoring and mobile phone intelligent analysis of heart and lung tone, single sample lesions to determine the accuracy rate of 98%.

Optional home headphones and medical ear hanging, support for home and medical use. Rechargeable lithium battery, continuous work for 72 hours.

Listen to the rhythm of life care for family health.

twitter:    https://twitter.com/cloudsteth
