story:
After years of research and development, Comfort Linen and its experienced team of manufacturers and fabric development specialists have created the BEST of the BEST to bring you the ultimate in sleeping comfort.

Our collaboration has resulted in a sleep system that addresses high levels of friction which hinder our efforts to turn or move in bed. "Friction-free" sleeping often results in happy exclamations such as ~ "I can't believe how easy it is to move!" ~ "It makes such a difference!" ~ " I'm sleeping better too!"

Improves:

  • ​Mobility
  • Dignity
  • Independence
  • Comfort and rest

Alleviates:

  • Insomnia
  • Tossing and turning
  • Feeling uncomfortable, stuck and frustrated
  • Skin problems due to unrelieved pressure, friction and shear

Especially helpful to people with mobility challenges:

  • Back pain
  • Recovering from sports or other injuries
  • Recovering from surgeries i.e. joint replacement, cardiac bypass
  • Arthritis
  • Parkinson's disease, stroke, ALS, MS, post-polio, spinal cord injury
  • Elderly
  • Amputations
  • Pregnancy or Cesarean-section 
  • Excessive weight 

You will discover how easy moving can be when you try our product. Friction between your body and bed typically requires strenuous actions such as lifting or tossing in order to change position. Comfort Linen minimizes this friction with its unique design thereby allowing you to move with much less effort. After all, you are in bed to relax, sleep and recover from the day's activity - not work out!

Whether you sleep alone or with another, there is also less disturbance when changing position. This can lead to a more continuous and deeper sleep. Many couples comment on how wonderful it is not to be wakened every time the other person turns over.

Reports of less pain and stiffness on waking attest to the benefits of gentle and spontaneous movement when Comfort Linen is part of your health plan. Tossing to turn is an action that shouldn't be part of going to bed. We toss as a means to quickly overcome gravity and high levels of friction. Such jostling actions - disruptive to sleep and comfort - are eliminated with the Comfort Linen system helping you relax and drift off to sleep. Comfort Linen takes the toss out of turning.

We all know how much better we feel after a great sleep. By simply changing your sleep garment and sheet to the Comfort Linen design, you can benefit too!

A unique combination of fabrics and grain alignment minimizes binding contact between sleep garment and sheet.  The resulting near friction-free contact facilitates movement when changing position and allows garments to remain comfortably aligned on the body... say goodbye to twisted sleepwear!

Why do I feel stuck in my regular sleepwear and traditional bed linens?

Because of stiction! (sticking + static friction = stiction)

The diagram above illustrates how different interacting fabrics either lock together (high friction) or glide together (low friction). By applying laws of friction to the work of moving in bed, friction in bed-related textiles can be managed. Comfort Linen's technology optimizes levels of friction thereby facilitating repositioning actions, comfort and sleep!

We are excited to introduce Comfort Linen's next generation Fitted Sheet featuring our newly created Generation 3 fabric! This specialty satin has been woven more tightly than regular satin and uses finer filaments to improve its longevity. These changes have also resulted in greater friction reduction making it even easier for you to move! 

Our fitted sheets are available in most bed sizes as listed in the chart below. 

Satin Pillowslips add an extra touch of luxury and ease the work of positioning pillows when these are used for added support and comfort. 

Our products are easy-care, fully machine-washable and fast-drying! 

Comfort Linen's Sleep Garments are made with the latest in performance technical fabrics and are also easy-care, machine washable and fast-drying. Incorporating features appearing in the tag below, our garments - in combination with a Comfort Linen sheet - offer more functional benefits than ever-before possible. Once you choose the PERK that is right for you, we will be asking for your choice of garment style and size. Simply get back to us at that time with your selections from the options and chart below. Below please see "Other things to keep in mind."

Our Travel Sheet is a simple overlay for easy placement on the fitted sheet of your hotel or guest room bed. It allows you to enjoy the same rest and comfort while away from home. Note that the bottom edge of the Travel Sheet in this photo is turned back to illustrate its lower edge. The side panels are made with the same soft microfibre that surrounds the centre panel of the Fitted Sheet. These panels are long enough to tuck under the mattress helping to stabilize the sheet on the bed. 

Please note that our product is a system that requires it to be sold initially as a minimum of one sheet and one sleep garment as shown in the selection of our many perks included in this campaign. Once you fall in love with our product and want an additional sheet or garment, simply contact us at info@comfortlinen.com and we will arrange your order. By experiencing Comfort Linen's specific design, you will learn how the ultimate in friction-reducing technology feels. There are simply no better fabric combinations for this purpose than those used in Comfort Linen products. 

We already know from existing customers that our system is highly effective in achieving better mobility and sleep. Please read on to hear some of the heartfelt comments received from our customers.

Although Comfort Linen is simple in principle, we feel that clear and concise information of what the product is - and how it works - needs to be communicated through sound marketing tools and strategies.  Here are some of the initiatives that we plan to undertake after we receive funding:

  • Development of a new website with global e-commerce capabilities $20,000
  • Additional staff, including marketing consultants, administration $65,000
  • Pursue licensing as a therapeutic medical product $10,000
  • Research into additional product offerings suitable for use in all environments, needs and preferences of users with regards to fabrics, thermoregulating features, designs for style and ease of dressing $5,000

I am so happy with my Comfort Linen sheets and nightgowns - they are life-changing! I feel like I am sleeping in butter and smile to myself whenever I think about sleeping on these sheets. The sheets also benefit my able-bodied husband. The head of our bed is raised and in previously using smooth, shiny sheets to help me - but which has had minimal benefit - my husband would slide down the bed. With the weave of the Comfort Linen sheet being scientifically developed to encourage movement in the direction that benefits turning, my husband wakes up happy too. Thank you Nancy McGovern and Comfort Linen!

~Betty, Person with Parkinson's

Since using Comfort Linen, my back pain is practically gone. Getting up from bed in the morning is so much easier. It is a relief not to be uncomfortable rolling around in bed all night - a new mattress wasn't needed after all!

~ Lorraine,  A happy senior

I can't believe what a difference Comfort Linen has made in my quality of life! I have Parkinson's and simple things like getting in bed, turning over and finding comfortable sleep positions were becoming more and more difficult. Now with the slightest pressure I am able to turn over with ease. I am actually getting a full night's sleep thanks to your product! 

~ Dave, An avid fan 

My physical therapist told me about Comfort Linen because of my difficulty moving in bed.  I ordered a set and can report: PROBLEM SOLVED!  I can change positions and turn over with almost no effort - and no more twisted garments! Fantastic!

~ Phil, Sleeping in the clouds

My first night using Comfort Linen made such a difference. It was unbelievable how I could move with ease without placing stress on my arms as I’d been advised since my cardiac bypass surgery. Thank you so much!

~Sue, A grateful customer

We learned of Comfort Linen from a physiotherapist during a home visit. My husband, who has Parkinson's, shared that he found moving in bed very difficult. After receiving our order, we found that the system truly makes a significant difference to my husband's ability to change positions and also to get out of bed. This has resulted in less frustration and movements that are more natural. We both enjoy a better rest. Nancy, the mastermind behind this product, speaks from a position of knowledge. We wholeheartedly endorse this bedding and pyjama combo.

~ Luella Cook, British Columbia, Canada

As a Physiotherapist, I know that good sleep on a regular basis improves overall health and wellbeing.  For many years I have worked with people dealing with pain and mobility challenges. Complaints I hear frequently are around poor sleep quality and the resulting increase in pain - or decrease in the person's ability to cope with pain.

Chronic musculoskeletal pain generally improves with light activity and worsens with long periods of inactivity.  For people who have difficulty turning over in bed, the act of turning can bring them to a fully wakened state, stirring up painful joints and muscles, and interfering with sleep quality.

When using the paired sheet and sleepwear of Comfort Linen - which greatly reduces friction between the fabrics - a person is able to move more often, with less pain, much more easily and thus, with less disruption of sleep.

I have tried Comfort Linen and continue to use this product even without any pain or mobility issues.  Because I know the value of this product from personal experience, I do not hesitate to recommend it to others.

I have recommended Comfort Linen to patients with Parkinson's disease, arthritis, post-polio sequelae, fibromyalgia, cancer and other conditions.  It's always a pleasure to receive thanks for the recommendation and to hear how pleased people are with the quality of the product, the ease with which they can move in bed, and the resulting improvement in sleep.

~ Cathie Levin, BSc., PT Registered Physiotherapist, British Columbia, Canada

 

Hello. I’m Nancy McGovern, Physiotherapist, and more recently inventor and entrepreneur. 

Using my experience in healthcare and my lifelong love of creating things, I developed Comfort Linen. Its function aligns perfectly with my goals as a therapist - enhancing mobility and independence, relieving pain and promoting health. Comfort Linen's benefits encompass these same goals making it a natural extension of my professional interests.

During my career, I was instrumental in developing hospital sheet sets designed to promote caregiver safety. These friction-reducing sheets proved to be very effective in reducing strain injuries. Additionally they allowed hospital patients to move themselves with greater ease and independence - a winning combination! 

In my early retirement I kept thinking about those patients and how a simple redesign of items already in use could help many people. I was also acutely aware of the need for strategies to support our aging population and caregivers struggling to keep up with multiple demands. It was a concept that I knew could be a game-changer in daily life and one that also extended to people of any age or ability. 

Setting up shop in my home sewing room, I fashioned a nightgown and simple bed sheet featuring a non-traditional design. Put to the test, I was ecstatic with the results and proceeded to make some garments for my husband so that he too could experience the luxury of "friction-free" sleeping. We soon knew that such a product had the potential to make life easier and better for almost everyone. It was very exciting - and a case of my "not being able to do nothing" with this new knowledge.

Over the next two years, I sewed another 50 sets for family and friends to further establish proof of this concept. Many of these first users loved the easier movement but were even happier with getting a better sleep! I soon engaged with leading manufacturers and a fabric specialist based in Quebec and British Columbia, Canada. The first finished product was delivered a year later in 2013. Now we are excited to introduce never-before used fabric combinations that deliver the ultimate in technical and functional performance. 

In time, I recruited Corey Sigvaldason, Business Strategist and Coach. My younger brother, Alan Wong, joined next as Business Development Manager and partner. Our team's goal is to make this product widely available and to apply the same technology to aid mobility in other settings - such as getting in and out of a car.

What could be more fulfilling - to you and our team - than helping people worldwide move and sleep better while also helping to reduce suffering and healthcare costs? If even a small percentage of people who can benefit from our innovative sleep system were to use our product, the potential for Comfort Linen is enormous. We seek your support to enable us to promote this life-changing product and make it available to those who need it most. By spreading the word or purchasing a perk, your assistance will be greatly appreciated. Together we can change the world!

Project Timeline

The Comfort Linen products are made by reputable Canadian based manufacturers, healthcare textile developers and suppliers. Our management team has been in discussion with our vendors and feels confident that delivery of the perks can commence by the middle of March, 2017.

Style, colour and sizes of garments

We will be sending a survey to you, immediately following the December 31st conclusion of our campaign, to obtain the style, size and colour choices of your Comfort Linen garments. Please use care when selecting your sizes using the guide above. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at info@comfortlinen.com

Languages

We can address your questions and comments in either English or Spanish. 

Responderemos sus preguntas y opiniones en inglés e español.

Last but not least....

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!

The Comfort Linen Team

We toss as a means to quickly overcome gravity and high levels of friction. By simply changing your sleep garment and sheet to the Comfort Linen design, you can benefit too!A unique combination of fabrics and grain alignment minimizes binding contact between sleep garment and sheet.  The resulting near friction-free contact facilitates movement when changing position and allows garments to remain comfortably aligned on the body... say goodbye to twisted sleepwear!Why do I feel stuck in my regular sleepwear and traditional bed linens? Because of stiction! (sticking + static friction = stiction)The diagram above illustrates how different interacting fabrics either lock together (high friction) or glide together (low friction). By applying laws of friction to the work of moving in bed, friction in bed-related textiles can be managed. Comfort Linen's technology optimizes levels of friction thereby facilitating repositioning actions, comfort and sleep!We are excited to introduce Comfort Linen's next generation Fitted Sheet featuring our newly created Generation 3 fabric! This specialty satin has been woven more tightly than regular satin and uses finer filaments to improve its longevity. These changes have also resulted in greater friction reduction making it even easier for you to move! Our fitted sheets are available in most bed sizes as listed in the chart below. Satin Pillowslips add an extra touch of luxury and ease the work of positioning pillows when these are used for added support and comfort. Our products are easy-care, fully machine-washable and fast-drying! Comfort Linen's Sleep Garments are made with the latest in performance technical fabrics and are also easy-care, machine washable and fast-drying. Incorporating features appearing in the tag below, our garments - in combination with a Comfort Linen sheet - offer more functional benefits than ever-before possible. Once you choose the PERK that is right for you, we will be asking for your choice of garment style and size. Simply get back to us at that time with your selections from the options and chart below. Below please see "Other things to keep in mind."Our Travel Sheet is a simple overlay for easy placement on the fitted sheet of your hotel or guest room bed. It allows you to enjoy the same rest and comfort while away from home. Note that the bottom edge of the Travel Sheet in this photo is turned back to illustrate its lower edge. The side panels are made with the same soft microfibre that surrounds the centre panel of the Fitted Sheet. These panels are long enough to tuck under the mattress helping to stabilize the sheet on the bed. Please note that our product is a system that requires it to be sold initially as a minimum of one sheet and one sleep garment as shown in the selection of our many perks included in this campaign. Once you fall in love with our product and want an additional sheet or garment, simply contact us at info@comfortlinen.com and we will arrange your order. By experiencing Comfort Linen's specific design, you will learn how the ultimate in friction-reducing technology feels. There are simply no better fabric combinations for this purpose than those used in Comfort Linen products. We already know from existing customers that our system is highly effective in achieving better mobility and sleep. Please read on to hear some of the heartfelt comments received from our customers.Although Comfort Linen is simple in principle, we feel that clear and concise information of what the product is - and how it works - needs to be communicated through sound marketing tools and strategies.  Here are some of the initiatives that we plan to undertake after we receive funding:
Development of a new website with global e-commerce capabilities $20,000
Additional staff, including marketing consultants, administration $65,000
Pursue licensing as a therapeutic medical product $10,000
Research into additional product offerings suitable for use in all environments, needs and preferences of users with regards to fabrics, thermoregulating features, designs for style and ease of dressing $5,000
I am so happy with my Comfort Linen sheets and nightgowns - they are life-changing! I feel like I am sleeping in butter and smile to myself whenever I think about sleeping on these sheets. The sheets also benefit my able-bodied husband. The head of our bed is raised and in previously using smooth, shiny sheets to help me - but which has had minimal benefit - my husband would slide down the bed. With the weave of the Comfort Linen sheet being scientifically developed to encourage movement in the direction that benefits turning, my husband wakes up happy too. Thank you Nancy McGovern and Comfort Linen!~Betty, Person with Parkinson'sSince using Comfort Linen, my back pain is practically gone. Getting up from bed in the morning is so much easier. It is a relief not to be uncomfortable rolling around in bed all night - a new mattress wasn't needed after all!~ Lorraine,  A happy seniorI can't believe what a difference Comfort Linen has made in my quality of life! I have Parkinson's and simple things like getting in bed, turning over and finding comfortable sleep positions were becoming more and more difficult. Now with the slightest pressure I am able to turn over with ease. I am actually getting a full night's sleep thanks to your product! ~ Dave, An avid fan My physical therapist told me about Comfort Linen because of my difficulty moving in bed.  I ordered a set and can report: PROBLEM SOLVED!  I can change positions and turn over with almost no effort - and no more twisted garments! Fantastic!~ Phil, Sleeping in the clouds

My first night using Comfort Linen made such a difference. It was unbelievable how I could move with ease without placing stress on my arms as I’d been advised since my cardiac bypass surgery. Thank you so much!
~Sue, A grateful customer
We learned of Comfort Linen from a physiotherapist during a home visit. My husband, who has Parkinson's, shared that he found moving in bed very difficult. After receiving our order, we found that the system truly makes a significant difference to my husband's ability to change positions and also to get out of bed. This has resulted in less frustration and movements that are more natural. We both enjoy a better rest. Nancy, the mastermind behind this product, speaks from a position of knowledge. We wholeheartedly endorse this bedding and pyjama combo.~ Luella Cook, British Columbia, CanadaAs a Physiotherapist, I know that good sleep on a regular basis improves overall health and wellbeing.  For many years I have worked with people dealing with pain and mobility challenges. Complaints I hear frequently are around poor sleep quality and the resulting increase in pain - or decrease in the person's ability to cope with pain.Chronic musculoskeletal pain generally improves with light activity and worsens with long periods of inactivity.  For people who have difficulty turning over in bed, the act of turning can bring them to a fully wakened state, stirring up painful joints and muscles, and interfering with sleep quality.When using the paired sheet and sleepwear of Comfort Linen - which greatly reduces friction between the fabrics - a person is able to move more often, with less pain, much more easily and thus, with less disruption of sleep.I have tried Comfort Linen and continue to use this product even without any pain or mobility issues.  Because I know the value of this product from personal experience, I do not hesitate to recommend it to others.I have recommended Comfort Linen to patients with Parkinson's disease, arthritis, post-polio sequelae, fibromyalgia, cancer and other conditions.  It's always a pleasure to receive thanks for the recommendation and to hear how pleased people are with the quality of the product, the ease with which they can move in bed, and the resulting improvement in sleep.~ Cathie Levin, BSc., PT Registered Physiotherapist, British Columbia, Canada Hello. I’m Nancy McGovern, Physiotherapist, and more recently inventor and entrepreneur. Using my experience in healthcare and my lifelong love of creating things, I developed Comfort Linen. Its function aligns perfectly with my goals as a therapist - enhancing mobility and independence, relieving pain and promoting health. Comfort Linen's benefits encompass these same goals making it a natural extension of my professional interests.During my career, I was instrumental in developing hospital sheet sets designed to promote caregiver safety. These friction-reducing sheets proved to be very effective in reducing strain injuries. Additionally they allowed hospital patients to move themselves with greater ease and independence - a winning combination! In my early retirement I kept thinking about those patients and how a simple redesign of items already in use could help many people. I was also acutely aware of the need for strategies to support our aging population and caregivers struggling to keep up with multiple demands. It was a concept that I knew could be a game-changer in daily life and one that also extended to people of any age or ability. Setting up shop in my home sewing room, I fashioned a nightgown and simple bed sheet featuring a non-traditional design. Put to the test, I was ecstatic with the results and proceeded to make some garments for my husband so that he too could experience the luxury of "friction-free" sleeping. We soon knew that such a product had the potential to make life easier and better for almost everyone. It was very exciting - and a case of my "not being able to do nothing" with this new knowledge.Over the next two years, I sewed another 50 sets for family and friends to further establish proof of this concept. Many of these first users loved the easier movement but were even happier with getting a better sleep! I soon engaged with leading manufacturers and a fabric specialist based in Quebec and British Columbia, Canada. The first finished product was delivered a year later in 2013. Now we are excited to introduce never-before used fabric combinations that deliver the ultimate in technical and functional performance. In time, I recruited Corey Sigvaldason, Business Strategist and Coach. My younger brother, Alan Wong, joined next as Business Development Manager and partner. Our team's goal is to make this product widely available and to apply the same technology to aid mobility in other settings - such as getting in and out of a car.What could be more fulfilling - to you and our team - than helping people worldwide move and sleep better while also helping to reduce suffering and healthcare costs? If even a small percentage of people who can benefit from our innovative sleep system were to use our product, the potential for Comfort Linen is enormous. We seek your support to enable us to promote this life-changing product and make it available to those who need it most. By spreading the word or purchasing a perk, your assistance will be greatly appreciated. Together we can change the world!Project TimelineThe Comfort Linen products are made by reputable Canadian based manufacturers, healthcare textile developers and suppliers. Our management team has been in discussion with our vendors and feels confident that delivery of the perks can commence by the middle of March, 2017.Style, colour and sizes of garmentsWe will be sending a survey to you, immediately following the December 31st conclusion of our campaign, to obtain the style, size and colour choices of your Comfort Linen garments. Please use care when selecting your sizes using the guide above. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at info@comfortlinen.comLanguagesWe can address your questions and comments in either English or Spanish. Responderemos sus preguntas y opiniones en inglés e español.Last but not least....Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!The Comfort Linen Team

story:
Did you know that hundreds of children die every year in cars because their parents forget them there for a few minutes. If we told you that built some technology that will prevent this from happening ever again, would you support us? Watch our video!






Don-Go is a wireless scale device that allows parents to monitor their baby directly from their smartphone. In order to use Don-Go, parents just have to equip the baby seat with our device and to download our free app.
 Don-Go has to be placed under the removable pillow of the baby-seat. Since every baby-seats are equipped with removable pillows, Don-Go can be utilised with any baby-seat’s brand. 








Every year, more than 2000 babies are left in hot cars by their parents and sometimes the consequences of these actions are tragic.




These are just some of the reasons why babies are left and forgotten in cars. And they are just some of the reasons why babies die because they have been left there.

For these reasons and many others, we have decided that the time had come to do something. We now propose an innovative and user-friendly solution that can finally stop these tragedies.

We were impressed when we discovered that no big multinationals have ever proposed some products that could have prevented babies’ deaths due to vehicular heat strokes. Probably, according to them, the accidents were so few, it was not worth it to invest in a solution that would have required time, personnel and costs. But we do not think the same.

Even just one accident per year requires attention as well as a solution. Since this accident represents the life of a baby.





Our company: our project started few months ago, when Claudio heard about the story of Gioia, a 17 months old girl, who died due to a heat stroke, because she has been left alone in a car. This little girl, as many others, died because of a tragic carelessness by her parents. Before dying, she spent several hours alone on her baby car seat, with an external temperature of 40 degrees. Gioia had beautiful parents, but unfortunately something went wrong on that day.

It was in that moment that Claudio started to learn more about the problem of babies forgotten in cars. Accordingly, he started to develop a feasible solution to these tragic deaths. In few months, Benedetta and Luisa joined the team, leveraging their own skills, resources and energies in order to make the difference. 

From that moment the project has become something more than an idea: in the end we have created Don-Go, a device that aims at increasing safety in families’ daily routines.







The unlucky truth is that everyone hear about the tragedies of babies forgotten in hot cars by their parents, but nothing has changed yet.

Don-Go has been designed as a smart and accessible solution that can assist families in their daily routines, decreasing the number of babies’ deaths due to heat strokes.  We are not only focused on selling the product; our main aim is to investigate on the issue of safety and therefore to develop feasible and smart solutions that could increase people’s quality of life. Your support will enable us to complete our production activities and hopefully it will help in decreasing the number of babies’ deaths as well.

Our goal is to raise €17.500 within 28 days. With your contributions we will:

  • Move forward with the printed circuit board (PCB) development and manufacturing.
  • Finalize the mobile app development.
  • Design additional styles for our device.
  • Start to develop a new smart device for handicap people and pets.
  • Promote our Open Source project to develop new technologies.

Each kind of reward reflects somehow the type of support you decided to offer, since we know that any person has different interests, background and financial possibilities as well.  Last but not least, we are aware about the fact that every kind of support counts. Even one dollar can make the difference.
story_txt:
Did you know that hundreds of children die every year in cars because their parents forget them there for a few minutes. If we told you that built some technology that will prevent this from happening ever again, would you support us? Watch our video!













Don-Go is a wireless scale device that allows parents to monitor their baby directly from their smartphone. In order to use Don-Go, parents just have to equip the baby seat with our device and to download our free app.


 Don-Go has to be placed under the removable pillow of the baby-seat. Since every baby-seats are equipped with removable pillows, Don-Go can be utilised with any baby-seat’s brand. 












Every year, more than 2000 babies are left in hot cars by their parents and sometimes the consequences of these actions are tragic.









We know it will never happen to you but we also know that those people to whom these tragedies happen, are not bad parents. Normal people will never be able to explain what it is, but doctors can. They call it “temporary blackout” and apparently it can happen to anyone. As any problem, this sort of amnesia needs a sensible solution. Since it’s not parents' fault. History has thought us something: with harsh critics and avoidance, people will never achieve anything. People need to be understood and listened. They need respect. And this is what we are trying to do.
Have you ever left your baby alone in a car for 5 minutes while you were going to the grocery store? Have you ever forgotten where you parked your car? Did you ever receive an unexpected call while you were bringing your child to school? These can be all causes of fatal death due to heat stroke.






These are just some of the reasons why babies are left and forgotten in cars. And they are just some of the reasons why babies die because they have been left there.
For these reasons and many others, we have decided that the time had come to do something. We now propose an innovative and user-friendly solution that can finally stop these tragedies.
We were impressed when we discovered that no big multinationals have ever proposed some products that could have prevented babies’ deaths due to vehicular heat strokes. Probably, according to them, the accidents were so few, it was not worth it to invest in a solution that would have required time, personnel and costs. But we do not think the same.
Even just one accident per year requires attention as well as a solution. Since this accident represents the life of a baby.

This little girl, as many others, died because of a tragic carelessness by her parents. Before dying, she spent several hours alone on her baby car seat, with an external temperature of 40 degrees. Gioia had beautiful parents, but unfortunately something went wrong on that day.
It was in that moment that Claudio started to learn more about the problem of babies forgotten in cars. Accordingly, he started to develop a feasible solution to these tragic deaths. In few months, Benedetta and Luisa joined the team, leveraging their own skills, resources and energies in order to make the difference. 
From that moment the project has become something more than an idea: in the end we have created Don-Go, a device that aims at increasing safety in families’ daily routines.














The unlucky truth is that everyone hear about the tragedies of babies forgotten in hot cars by their parents, but nothing has changed yet.
Don-Go has been designed as a smart and accessible solution that can assist families in their daily routines, decreasing the number of babies’ deaths due to heat strokes.  We are not only focused on selling the product; our main aim is to investigate on the issue of safety and therefore to develop feasible and smart solutions that could increase people’s quality of life. Your support will enable us to complete our production activities and hopefully it will help in decreasing the number of babies’ deaths as well.
Our goal is to raise €17.500 within 28 days. With your contributions we will:

Move forward with the printed circuit board (PCB) development and manufacturing.
Finalize the mobile app development.
Design additional styles for our device.
Start to develop a new smart device for handicap people and pets.
Promote our Open Source project to develop new technologies.




To thank you for your fundamental support here there are the rewards we are going to offer you. 
Each kind of reward reflects somehow the type of support you decided to offer, since we know that any person has different interests, background and financial possibilities as well.  Last but not least, we are aware about the fact that every kind of support counts. Even one dollar can make the difference. 


www.don-go.org
info@don-go.net

story:
What We Are About

Hello!  I am Amy Wilinski, owner of Golden Light Healing, a company that provides energy healing sessions and workshops on intuition, shamanism, and spirituality. My husband David and I are  excited to be celebrating 12 years of service to our community.  The mission of Golden Light Healing is to help people remember and bring forth the gifts that are within.

We will be expanding our retreat center this summer by adding a 2000 square-foot building onto our current structure.  The expansion will include bathrooms with showers, a large well-lit classroom, a commercial kitchen, and dining room.  Amish-built cabins will be nestled in the fields to allow a place for you to rest your head while the beautiful night sky watches over you. Our new space will offer a wonderful place for you to be held in the arms of nature while receive healing and connecting with the deep well of your spirit. 


How We Got Here--a great love story!

One hundred years ago, David's ancestors heard the call to move to this beautiful land in northeastern Wisconsin. Their dreams and the support of friends and family helped them to build a home and lovely farm on this land that fed and supported them.

As high school sweethearts, David and  I helped his father plant 500 pine seedlings on that same land.  At the time, I told his father we should not plant them as one day I was going to marry his son and build a log home here and didn't want to have to cut them down!  Well, I did marry that young man and many years later we built a log home on that very hill -- which we call Patience Hill.  For many years, this beautiful land held and nurtured our growing family.

Twelve years ago I received Reiki  energy healing, which brought about deep personal healing and put me on a whole new path in my life.  At that time, I had another vision for this land: one of holding and nurturing an extended family -- the community -- by creating a retreat center nestled amid the 200 acres of our family-owned land. 

My service began in a very humble way, with my first clients receiving Reiki sessions lying on blankets on the floor in the loft of our house! Since then, our center has grown to a small, separate building that serves people from all over the USA.  From the four corners of the United States, people have found us here in little old Sobieski. As far away as Alaska, California, Florida, and New York people have come to share and enjoy this little slice of heaven.  

Many of you have shared with us your visions of the expansion of our retreat center. Little by little, the pieces of that vision have come to fruition.  It is now time for the final puzzle piece to be put in place and we need your support, help, and prayers as we complete the tapestry of this dream.  


What We Need & What You Get
Our center expansion and the addition of Amish-built cabins for overnight stays will cost approximately $200,000.  Your generous sponsorship will help towards the building of these structures.  Your gift will literally become part of the bricks and mortar! 

We are so grateful for those of you who have already stepped forward and provided us with donations to help in this endeavor.

We are grateful for your support and want to give back to you as well.  Check out our wonderful perks for your generous sponsorship.

  • Would you like a Reiki session? It's yours with a $111 Bear Level Sponsorship.
  • Be an Eagle Sponsor.  We thank you for your generosity by setting up a private retreat for you and a friend in one of our new cabins.  Your 4 day/3 night retreat is complete with a Shamanic Healing, Reiki session, $100 store gift certificate, and a personal intuitive reading!
  • Enjoy the ultimate perk--a trip to Peru with us!  As an Earth Angel Sponsor, we would like to thank you from the bottom of our hearts and you will be our guest in Peru  as we hike the Andes Mountains with the native shamans.
  • Every little bit counts!  Your $25 Butterfly Sponsorship will leave you smelling like a rose when you receive two bars of Amy's handcrafted soaps made with essential oils.
  • Check out our other levels of sponsorship and the great Perks offered! 

For those who wish to make a contribution directly to us via check, thank you very much. We will honor these perks with those contributions as well.

The Impact

Your contribution will help to establish a welcoming, non-denominational retreat center in the Midwest.  We envision bringing in more international speakers on a variety of topics related to natural health and spirituality.  What a wonderful setting to learn about connecting with the Divine!  Our center will also be available for private rental for your own retreats.  


Other Ways You Can Help

We are so grateful for your well wishes and prayers as we move forward on this dream.  Thank you for your past, present, and future support of our classes and healing sessions.

Please get the word out and help us to make some wonderful noise about our campaign to help bring it to life! Please click on the Indiegogo share tools and post it on your social networks.  Watch for our updates and videos as we progress.


Wishing you all the best!

Amy & David Wilinski

www.GoldenLightHealing.net

GoldenLightHealing@bayland.net

story:
!!!UPPDATERING 9 Oktober!!

Vi har varit otydliga i en viktig del för er. Vad kommer det att kosta att träna på boxen?

Vi lägger upp de tänkta priserna för det olika uppläggen vi kommer att ha, så har ni något att jämföra med. ( anledningen till att det står € istället för kronor är helt enkelt att systemet inte hanterar svensk valuta)

Tanken kring våra medlemskap är att man ska kunna skräddarsy sitt kort, så att det passar er vardag och  ni inte behöver betala för något ni inte kommer att dra nytta av. 

Vår största utgift är personalkostnader (dvs alla pass som leds av instruktör) Så vi har försökt att skala av så mycket det går i de olika alternativen på korten. 

Introduktionskurser

(6 veckor 2 ggr/Veckan)

Introkursen kommer kosta 1400:- om man endast vill den utan något medlemskap.

Skulle man vilja teckna ett månadskort eller autogiro samtidigt så kostar introkursen 800:-

Autogiro

Tecknar man sig på autogiro så kommer man få lägre pris än månadskortet. 80-100:-/lägre pris.

Student/Senior/Junior

Studenter (15-18) /Seniorer (65+) kommer ha ca 20% rabatt på medlemskapen.

Juniorer (10-4) kommer ha upp till 50% rabatt på priserna som gäller. (Juniorer tränar med målsman tills de tagit "träningskörkort")

Bonus

När man tecknar 12 månaders autogiro så kommer man kunna få en bonus om man värvar en kompis. För varje kompis man värvar får man en fri månad. (Dvs. en kompis man värvar en månad gratis, 12 kompisar blir ett år gratis, osv. )

 

 

 

!!!UPPDATERING 5 Oktober!!!

Alla som donerar för medlemskap (Perk-Basic) får även ett årskort på "The Big Bang Gym"

Vi kommer inleda samarbete med "The Big Bang Gym" så alla våra medlemmar får tillgång till hela deras anläggning med. Anläggningen kommer byta namn och CrossFit Oskarshamn kommer finnas som en del av deras verksamhet.  Dvs att det är ett fantastiskt mervärde ni får med nu. 

Dessutom kommer vi att köpa in all utrustning från Eleiko för att kvalitetsäkra boxen. Så passa på nu och hjälp oss samtidigt som du kan göra ett riktigt bra klipp för medlemskap.

 

 

CrossFit Oskarshamn

Vi har varit en förening sedan 2014 och tar nu klivet upp för att utöka vår verksamhet. Vi saknar dock de ekonomiska musklerna för att klara det själva, då vi är eldsjälar som sett till att föreningen varit aktiv.

Målet har alltid varit att ge oskarshamnarna en bra möjlighet att få effekt av sin träning, inte bara köpa ett gymkort som sedan samlar damm och att resultaten uteblir.

Föreningen har alltid haft en kamp för att få de få de bokningstider vi velat ha, och slitaget på utrustningen vi tillhandahållit, har nyttjats av andra föreningar utan att de hjälp oss att driva vår box framåt.  Så nu tar vi steget och flyttar boxen till nya lokaler på 150Kvm. Högt i tak och ny utrustning, dock saknar vi en pusselbit. Golvet.

Golvet är den sista pusselbiten för att vi ska kunna köra igång verksamheten fullt ut.

Tanken är erbjuda medlemmar träning, på de tider de vill ha samt lyfta kunskapen om hur hälsofrämjande fysisk aktivitet faktiskt är. Vi kommer att träna upp.. eller rättare sagt lära upp medlemmarna i träning, så de kan stå på egna ben och känna sig trygga i allt de gör innanför och utanför boxen. 

Vad vill vi ha hjälp med?

Vi behöver ett nytt golv till vår lokal på 150kvm. Priset på golvet är runt 7.000€ (ca 67.000:-Skr )

Vi vill nu ha ditt stöd för att kunna få in den sista pusselbiten. 

Och vad får du ut av detta? 

  • Den bästa träningsupplevelsen med den bästa utrustningen, bästa instruktörerna och givetvis ett skönt golv,  i Oskarshamn.
  • Om du inte bor i Oskarshamn men ändå vill stötta oss. Så kommer du  ha ett ställe att träna på när du har vägarna förbi.
  • Skulle det vara så att vi inte når vårt mål denna gång så kommer vi köra igång iallafall och efterhand så installerar vi ett nytt golv. 
  • Om vi når över målet så kommer överskottet användas till att investera i ytterligare utrustning, som ni får vara med att välja.  

 

Andra sätt du kan hjälpa oss.

  • Känner du att du inte har möjlighet att hjälpa oss men vill det, så kan du hjälpa oss genom att sprida informationen till andra som kanske kan stötta oss ekonomiskt.  Det lilla, leder till det stora :)
  • Du kan alltid dela länken om vårt projekt.
story_txt:
!!!UPPDATERING 9 Oktober!!
Vi har varit otydliga i en viktig del för er. Vad kommer det att kosta att träna på boxen?
Vi lägger upp de tänkta priserna för det olika uppläggen vi kommer att ha, så har ni något att jämföra med. ( anledningen till att det står € istället för kronor är helt enkelt att systemet inte hanterar svensk valuta)
Tanken kring våra medlemskap är att man ska kunna skräddarsy sitt kort, så att det passar er vardag och  ni inte behöver betala för något ni inte kommer att dra nytta av. 
Vår största utgift är personalkostnader (dvs alla pass som leds av instruktör) Så vi har försökt att skala av så mycket det går i de olika alternativen på korten. 
Introduktionskurser
(6 veckor 2 ggr/Veckan)
Introkursen kommer kosta 1400:- om man endast vill den utan något medlemskap.
Skulle man vilja teckna ett månadskort eller autogiro samtidigt så kostar introkursen 800:-
Autogiro
Tecknar man sig på autogiro så kommer man få lägre pris än månadskortet. 80-100:-/lägre pris.
Student/Senior/Junior
Studenter (15-18) /Seniorer (65+) kommer ha ca 20% rabatt på medlemskapen.
Juniorer (10-4) kommer ha upp till 50% rabatt på priserna som gäller. (Juniorer tränar med målsman tills de tagit "träningskörkort")
Bonus
När man tecknar 12 månaders autogiro så kommer man kunna få en bonus om man värvar en kompis. För varje kompis man värvar får man en fri månad. (Dvs. en kompis man värvar en månad gratis, 12 kompisar blir ett år gratis, osv. )
 
 
 
!!!UPPDATERING 5 Oktober!!!
Alla som donerar för medlemskap (Perk-Basic) får även ett årskort på "The Big Bang Gym"
Vi kommer inleda samarbete med "The Big Bang Gym" så alla våra medlemmar får tillgång till hela deras anläggning med. Anläggningen kommer byta namn och CrossFit Oskarshamn kommer finnas som en del av deras verksamhet.  Dvs att det är ett fantastiskt mervärde ni får med nu.

story:
The idea for Bulk ‘N Cheap was born out of frustration; ‘cause we know that
supplement companies are using an outdated model.

First, you have brands that still use the brick and mortar model with
distributors, retailers and massive markups. Screw that.

Then you have modern brands that sell online but maintain the same high retail
price and earn massive margins. You can identify these individuals cruising in
their exotic cars talking about their hustle online. We’re calling B.S.



ENOUGH IS ENOUGH.

We're tired AF of supplement companies making outlandish
claims, pretending their ingredients are magic, and charging insane prices. Just
because you have a testosterone laced tagline “Turbo Blast Swole Exploder”
doesn't mean your ten servings of protein powder is worth forty bucks.
Keep that shit.

It’s our goal to offer more all-killer no-filler servings than anyone
else and sell at a fraction of the typical retail price.
Tired of those painful conversations with the GNC clerk? Yeah, us too.
Our products will be sold exclusively online. No middlemen, no inflated pricing
and shipped straight to your front door.
(BNC > GNC am I right?)


Quality or price? Sorry, Confucius - Bulk ‘N Cheap does both.


All part of our #NOBULLSHIT philosophy. Right, Baggie!?



Pre-Workout Formula is our flagship product and, yes, we get it.
Why make another pre-workout?
 

But here is the deal...

We scavenged the internet looking for something to fuel our workouts that didn't have low quality additives like maltodextrin, coloring agents like Yellow #5 & Blue #1, or harmful artificial sweeteners like Aspartame. As we dug deep researching available products on the market we saw countless proprietary blends with ridiculous names.

"Excuse me, Sir, can you please explain your
Synergistic Intelligent Neuro Energy Matrix Blend?
Nah... didn't think so Morpheus".

At Bulk 'N Cheap we feel you have a right to know what you're putting in your body.
We don't hide our ingredients in proprietary blends. The point is we all deserve products made with clean ingredients that are affordable. Oh yeah... we also thought we should make 'em in bulk sized bags with 60  servings to give more bang for your buck.  We know, pretty cool, right?

•

•

Are your products made in America?
Yuh damn right. Our trusted GMP certified manufacturer also sources everything in the good ‘ol U S of A. #merica

Will the Bulk ‘N Cheap line be expanding?
Yes! With time we hope to offer a complete lineup of products. We have a handful of products in mind that we feel are typically way overpriced. We aim to fix that.

What makes your pre-workout formula special?
Simplicity. Our formula is so transparent that you could nearly make it yourself, but then, we’ve already done the hard work for you.

Will Pre-workout Formula give me jitters like other products I’ve tried?
Short answer: No. Our goal was to create a balanced formula that will help boost a wide variety of training modalities. Whether your sport is powerlifting, bodybuilding, olympic lifting, crossfitting… or any other sort of “ing” Pre-workout Formula will kick up your performance without any jitters. BTW, total caffeine amount per serving is 175mg.

How did you decide on the taste?
Raw supplement ingredients can taste REAL bad. Trust us.  Most companies use artificial flavors, colors and a ton of sweeteners to mask the bad taste. However, we only use natural fruit flavors. Our formula has a light and drinkable taste. Typically people guzzle down their pre-workout as fast as they can before hitting the gym. That said, we don't feel the need to make our product taste like a jolly rancher. Down it and get to work!

 

 

 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

THAT'S IT!

Thanks, Baggie! Rest up! It's leg day tomorrow!!

contact

@bulkncheap on all the socials

BULKNCHEAP.NET ('cause .com was too expensive)

bulkncheap@gmail.com
