story:
Who we are

The national Certification Commission for Healthcare Interpreters (CCHI), a U.S.-based non-profit 501(c)6 corporation, was founded in 2009 by interpreters, for interpreters and the public good. CCHI’s mission is to administer and develop a national valid, credible, and vendor-neutral certification program in the U.S. to ensure the competency of healthcare interpreters and to improve access and quality of care for patients with limited English proficiency and their families. CCHI Commissioners are volunteers who represent different stakeholder groups of the healthcare interpreting industry.

The Campaign

If you are a healthcare interpreter, or language services provider, or a trainer of interpreters, this is your opportunity to truly influence the future of our profession.  This is the time for you to become a part of something big and important.

If you are a healthcare provider, this is your opportunity to ensure that your words are interpreted accurately and completely by competent certified professionals who share your values of quality and safe patient care.

If you believe in equal access to health care in the U.S. for all patients, this is your opportunity to stand behind a profession that helps non-English speaking patients communicate with their doctors, nurses, etc.

Job Task Analysis of Healthcare Interpreters (#CCHIJTA16) is a fundraising campaign to help CCHI conduct a national survey of the profession in the U.S. and publish its findings. Our goal is to raise $50,000.

The funds will be used to:

  • disseminate the national JTA survey among healthcare interpreters in the United States,
  • analyze the collected data, and
  • publish a national JTA Report.

We welcome contributions at any level and from any individual or organization. Please see the Perks sections for our awards and recognition of your support.

Please note that a contribution to CCHI cannot be deductible as a charitable gift, but may be deductible as a business expense if properly filed.

The Story

The purpose of Job Task Analysis (JTA) is to identify the current knowledge, skills and abilities needed to competently perform the job of an interpreter in any U.S. healthcare setting and in any interpreting modality. JTA is a cornerstone of developing and maintaining an effective competency-based certification program.

It is a tool to define a healthcare interpreter profession as it exists today, thoroughly, accurately, and without any bias. We must understand and document everything that people are doing under the umbrella of the healthcare interpreter profession. We have to be honest in describing the profession as it actually exists, and not as some may want it to be. And this definition must come from the profession itself - not just an expert panel, or a focus group, or industry leaders – but the entire profession.

CCHI conducted its first national JTA of healthcare interpreters in 2010. That national survey was completed by nearly 2,500 interpreters, trainers and supervisors/managers. The results from this survey (http://www.cchicertification.org/images/webinars/cchi%20jta%20report-public.pdf) led to the creation of our certification exams.

Six years have passed, and our profession has witnessed some changes. It is crucial that we, a national professional certification program, stay abreast of the changes and ensure that our certification exams’ content remains current and relevant.

For the new JTA project, CCHI has contracted with Castle Worldwide, Inc., and their lead psychometrician Dr. James Henderson oversees the project. In February 2016, we held a meeting of 15 volunteer Subject Matter Experts to review the first JTA survey and update as needed the domains of our profession and tasks performed by healthcare interpreters. This panel was composed of actual practitioners who represent a true cross-section of the healthcare interpreting industry. See our Facebook page for more information about the panelists and updates about this project.

Why we do it

Communication between a patient who doesn't speak or understand English well and a doctor is impossible without a competent interpreter.  Interpreting requires mastery of both working languages, comprehensive knowledge of relevant terminology and ethical principles, and unique professional skills, which take years to acquire and continuing education to maintain. CCHI's certification exams are valid tools to assess the healthcare interpreter's competence.  Read why competent interpreters are crucial at http://www.centerforhealthjournalism.org/resources/lessons/lost-translation.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get colleagues and friends to help you fundraise
  • Share the campaign using the Indiegogo share tools
  • Use the hashtag #CCHIJTA16 on Twitter and Instagram

Check out CCHIcertification.org for information on how you can become certified and join the CCHI-certified interpreters’ community.

story:
Drinking Well By Colour

 THE ONLY CUP YOU CANNOT  KNOCK, PUNCH or PUSH Over!


At Work and in meetings, protect your computer and documents.

At Home and at Play Cuppa Cup prevents accidents and spills while you   are busy doing your chores, take time out, relax and have your favourite CUPPA – no spills, only thrills. 

                                               HAVE OUR "CUPPA" 

         


How many times, time after time has this happened to you? 

You accidentally knock a Cup full of Water or Coffee , Drinks, Smoothies and Tea as well as any liquid spills all over the place? 

Even worse someone else knocks it over at Work or at Home all over your documents.  Watch out there goes your laptop computer, ipad or iphone. There goes all your work and effort.

Worse still your children or elderly parent knocks their cup over and you have to clean it all up.  

Well, that is why we went searching for a solution to put a stop to all the careless accidents, mess and clean ups. 


                           NON SPILL CUP THAT WILL NOT FALL OVER

                                


CUPPA grips to all flat smooth surfaces. Your home or office desk, your kitchen top, your dinner table.

No more accidents with wet documents or items, or bad spills and stains on your clothing or surfaces.                  

Our creative coaster vacuum bottom of the cup creates the Cup to lock onto any flat smooth clean surface you put it on.

It then prevents accidents and it being knocked over but the coaster suction vacuum is released easily when you lift it straight up to take a drink.

Our unique CUPPA Cup works when air is trapped beneath it when placed down creating a vacuum and is remarkably strong.

Push it again and again and it will not fall over, but release it and releases easily with no effort and lifts up naturally.


No more need for coasters.

Now you can get rid of your old cup and replace it and  have our CUPPA Cup!  

Our in built coaster is an extra bonus with our CUPPA Cup. No more need for and say goodbye to those coasters. 

For extra protection our sealed top lid. Put it on and it keeps your drinks colder for longer and hotter for longer. 


WE HAVE PERFECT PERKS FOR YOU TO CHOOSE FROM

Whether you're getting CUPPA Cup for yourself, gifting it to friends and family, buying it for your staff, or thanking your wedding guests with this, or even as a company promotion with your unique logo: -

Choose your preferred colours or colour mixes from our various colour choice from our perks.

                           

  

                       All our Products are PBA Free for Better Healthy Living.                             

   

Should you choose not to purchase from our Cuppa Perks now, we would appreciate and thank you if you make any $ donation.

Your $ donation will help us in the manufacture, distribution and development of our unique Non Spill CUPPA Cup, Glass, Thermal Bottle and Nutricare and Bio TrackR APP so we can take them out into to the world to those who are hungry and waiting for these products.

As a THANK YOU for your Donation, we will give you our Bio TrackR APP as a BONUS.

Click "BACK IT" next to our video to donation and we will develop our Bio TrackR APP and deliver to you estimated to be October/November.

                                    Suction GLASS that won't fall over

                                           GREAT FOR YOUR SOCIAL EVENTS

GREAT FOR YOUR CORPORATE PROMOTIONS

                                    

     GREAT FOR YOUR DRINKING HABITS

Measure your Acid/Alkaline intake and re-boot your body to healthy pH levels with our Drinks & Smoothies Recipes. 


Social Drink: Do we consciously choose the drink we would like for our bodies?

How do we know what effect we are putting in our body by drinking coffee, alcohol, tea or those sweetener drink?

That is why we created the "CUPPA", a consciously aware drinking in the modern day life on the go.

From planning, preparation and to tracing the pH level of your drinks, together with our Bio TrackR App, CUPPA makes the whole process easier and more adaptable to your health needs.

CUPPA consists of a beautifully designed dual colour, clever grip-pad design and works on most flat and non-porous surfaces, with a twin wall insulated to keeps beverage hot for longer.

Recipe for Success

  We now bring to you our colourful solution for this common problem with    our CUPPA Cup - The only cup that will not be knocked over.

 CUPPA lifts up easily when you want to take a drink from our CUPPA Cup.

 HIT it, KNOCK it, PUNCH it, PUSH it – CUPPA will not fall over. 

 

Our App makes it simple to plan and prepare your Bio Rhythm Regeneration healing for the week ahead. We have partnered with professional researchers to create a range of recipes, tailored to fit a broad range of health goals and healing needs to create balance in your body, mind and emotional well being.

All the recipes are designed to balance your Alkaline and Acid pH Level tailored for making your drinks healthier, more efficient and less time consuming, which fill the stainless steal CUPPA cup perfectly.
Our App also takes care of shopping lists so you'll know exactly what to buy when you get to the store.


Monitored Health

No more guessing which drink is Alkaline or Acid- the App does it for you without any extra effort, and when you follow our recipes to fill your CUPPA (and yourself) you'll have instant access to accurate pH Level information.
The data is stored within the App and gives you meaningful feedback about your diet. The App allows you to view all health and healing information in one place.

Prep Drink Made Easy

The App also contains prep. friendly health drink plans, making it efficient for you to batch mix for multiple days at a time, so you can prepare a week's worth of drink in under an hour.
These plans have been developed by experienced 'holistic nutritionist' with variation in mind, so you'll have exciting and unique different drinks everyday.
We've done the hard work, so you don't have to.

Share your Creation

For us, it is all about bringing people together who are passionate about conscious health and sharing ideas to create better beverages.
When you join the community you get your own profile page, where you can save any recipes you might like to try and create your own drink plans. You can even connect with like-minded community members to share tips and tricks.

Prevention Vs Cure

Taking a homemade drink not only helps you feel great, you know what you drink, but it is also good for your wallet too.
          
                                   APP Development

We are hugely excited about bringing the Cuppa family and Bio Track Regenerative App to life. More than a health drink recipe App, we really believe that it can help our backers take back control of their well being, Hit their new health goals and stick to their new health style.
We have designed the App with a clean easy to navigate User interface and cross device functionality, so you can plan your drinks on your Ipad and get your shopping lists on your Iphone.
Bio TrackR App Bio TrackR is  a upcoming healing system, that is designed to cater for your busy lifestyle, combine with the Cuppa Cup, Suction Glass, Thermal bottle and the Nutricare bottle to meet your needs.
When we progressively meet our stretch goals, those that have backed up the campaign or purchased the perks that included the Bio TrackR app, will automatically get the following feature belows.

Please help get our Campaign off the ground and make it happen for CUPPA Cup and for our team! It’s great when people can pledge, but if you cannot pledge at this stage it does not mean you cannot help, share our story by word of mouth email or social media.

Help spread the word.

After you complete your Transaction, Indiegogo will give you the option to send a message to your friends and followers on Facebook and Twitter.

This message will inform your friends that you just backed “CUPPA” and will include a link to our campaign page. Please send these messages. It only takes a second and be a huge help.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT.

Share CUPPA Cup, CUPPA Glass, and CUPPA Thermal Bottle & NutriCare with your friends!

FACEBOOK , TWITTER  IT - LET THE WORLD KNOW WHAT THEY HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR- A CUP, A GLASS AND THERMAL BOTTLE  THAT DOES NOT FALL OVER- PREVENTS SPILLS- IN BUILT COASTER.

While this is our first campaign and want to make this to be a great success, and with your support will help make this campaign a success. We have many important lessons to learn in the process and will make sure the campaign runs smoothly for supporters.

International Shipping: 
For our first campaign, our Resolution: For all our International supporters we will have their rewards shipped via an expedited manner.

Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region.

We are a Team of health conscious group of people, from many walks of life, Who are passionate about making a difference, to your natural healing and well being and for feeling healthy and whole within. 

We also bring to you a solution to a problem - Whether you have the responsibility of looking after Children, Teenagers and the Elderly as our Team Member Sue knows so well with care of an Elderly parent and went searching for a solution to a problem and the challenges associated with continual spillage of liquids, not to mention the cleaning associated with it, our Team worked very hard to now bring to you our:-  

                                                                             

               Our Team wish to Thank you for supporting our CUPPA Campaign.

story:
We're funded in Indiegogo.  Thank you to our backers here. Everything had been delivered!

 

NEWS FROM NEUROPLANNER!

To cap the year, we are currently at 66% funding goal with over 225 active neuroplanners.  We've closed the year on a high being featured in BetaList (home of startups on beta) and an exhibition at the MAAD Event or Market of Artists and Designers hosted by the Red Dot Museum Singapore towards the NYE countdown.  January is sustaining our highs as we got featured as the top 10 startups in Beta Last last December, we're planning to camp at the iLight Marina Bay, we're exhibiting at National Gallery Singapore's Light to Night Festival around Padang, we're having a booth at Katong Square's Lifestyle and Vintage Market by RetroFactory, and will be out on retail for the first time at We The People Singapore (the official home of funded Kickstarter projects).  While we absolutely don't have time for marketing (being a one-woman team), we are in the midst of launching 1 project this January and is currently prototyping a second one for a launch within Q1 2018.  If you contribute now at Indiegogo, you get to enjoy the same non-retail (yet) rates as well as shipping every week. 

 

New year, new you.

It's the first week of the year and you've ticked most of your goals.  You've eaten right, learned how to code, and been going to the gym.  Then, you went missing.  Three weeks later, your friends find you deep into the season finale of a 7-part series that you only started 3 days ago with pizzas and nachos spread on your couch.

 

Sounds like you? 

Every year you make a promise to yourself that you'll finally get that promotion or at least make time for your crocheting. But down the road in 2 weeks or 6 months, you stray.  You then start some existential crisis questions over a bottle of red either with friends or in front of a mirror, upside-down naked.  You rack your brain for motivation, clarity, and focus but you felt bled out from boredom, tiredness, and stress.

 

Fret not.  You are not alone. 

There are many of us who seems not to be as energized as our marathon finisher colleagues or who-seem-to-have-achieve-it-all friends.  I can say for sure that you are not mental and that you've come to the right place.   You only need to know how to hack your brain to finally make it work alongside you - together in achieving goals, and not how you usually think it does: against it. 

 

Time for a brain workout.   

Imagine knowing the secrets of the world and using it to your advantage.  That is what NEUROPLANNER is about: discovering how your brain ticks.  By knowing how your mind works, the better you plan your actions towards the realization of your goals.

 

Exploring your brain's capacity takes time as that is how our minds work: they thrive in the slow.  That is why when you take drastic changes (does new year resolutions ring a bell?), it usually does not work out in the long term.  Taking time to learn and practice is key to changing your habits.  So we've designed a year-long planner that gets you through these vital life themes:

Each week, you'll learn basic neuroscience concepts and evidence-based techniques that will put your life back in order.  You'll finally stop beating yourself up for things you thought are your fault but, in fact, you can do better.  Most importantly, you'll make an amazing discovery on how to make yourself happy from within without a need for booze, a pill, or bad company.

You deserve these mindblowing features.

You've made it this far because you need a brilliant tool to catch up with your aspirations and dreams. You'll need power features that are lightweight to be carried at all times while still matching your style.  This planner is packed with the smarts in both content and design:

Get your head around these clever pages.

 

 

We ship worldwide starting 29th Jan 2018

  • Worldwide 10-20 business days via Direct Link - Standard Shipping
  • Local Singapore 2-5 business days via Roadbull - Expedited Shipping
  • Express shipping available worldwide but need to top-up USD$41 (new!)

 

Future thinking.

Our crowdfunding campaign will secure inventory for retail and fund the development stage of our next project: On A Happy Note.

But down the road in 2 weeks or 6 months, you stray.  You then start some existential crisis questions over a bottle of red either with friends or in front of a mirror, upside-down naked.  You rack your brain for motivation, clarity, and focus but you felt bled out from boredom, tiredness, and stress.
 
Fret not.  You are not alone. 
There are many of us who seems not to be as energized as our marathon finisher colleagues or who-seem-to-have-achieve-it-all friends.  I can say for sure that you are not mental and that you've come to the right place.   You only need to know how to hack your brain to finally make it work alongside you - together in achieving goals, and not how you usually think it does: against it.  Time for a brain workout.   

Imagine knowing the secrets of the world and using it to your advantage.  That is what NEUROPLANNER is about: discovering how your brain ticks.  By knowing how your mind works, the better you plan your actions towards the realization of your goals.

 
Exploring your brain's capacity takes time as that is how our minds work: they thrive in the slow.  That is why when you take drastic changes (does new year resolutions ring a bell?), it usually does not work out in the long term.  Taking time to learn and practice is key to changing your habits.  So we've designed a year-long planner that gets you through these vital life themes:

Each week, you'll learn basic neuroscience concepts and evidence-based techniques that will put your life back in order.  You'll finally stop beating yourself up for things you thought are your fault but, in fact, you can do better.  Most importantly, you'll make an amazing discovery on how to make yourself happy from within without a need for booze, a pill, or bad company.

You deserve these mindblowing features.
You've made it this far because you need a brilliant tool to catch up with your aspirations and dreams. You'll need power features that are lightweight to be carried at all times while still matching your style.  This planner is packed with the smarts in both content and design:
Get your head around these clever pages.  We ship worldwide starting 29th Jan 2018
Worldwide 10-20 business days via Direct Link - Standard Shipping
Local Singapore 2-5 business days via Roadbull - Expedited Shipping
Express shipping available worldwide but need to top-up USD$41 (new!)
 Future thinking.Our crowdfunding campaign will secure inventory for retail and fund the development stage of our next project: On A Happy Note.

story:
Start of Development

We realized an issue that our eyes are exposed to danger in the many sterilization products when UV sterilization is working.

Homecera’s First Goal!

To make the Safest Product without any UV hazards, we have been researching, studying and testing new methods over the old sterilization methods for the past 3 years.

 

 

Keep your shoes looking (and smelling) their
best condition with the HomeCera 3-in-1
Cordless Shoe Deodorizer.

Not only does this device deodorize your shoes, but it also sterilizes and dries them with ease.
Does it really work? Yes? It works.

 

 

HomeCera, this portable device that’s quick and easy to use. Firstly, it dries. 
It deodorizes and It sterilizes. Easy to use, easy to store, easy to carry around. 
HomeCera, the compact and cordless shoe dryer and deodorizer is your ultimate accessory!

 

 

 

1. World's First Ceramic Method (Patented)

HomeCera is the World's First Invention by using Ceramic. Get rid of all Germs and Odor in your shoes with HomeCera, the Ceramic silicon carbide (SiC) shoe dryer to?care your athlete's foot.

HomeCera consists of a Lithium-ion battery, Fan, and SiC (Silicon Carbide) Honeycomb Heater. 
Most similar products work through hot air, such as UV light or hair dryer, but HomeCera works by breaking down airborne bacteria, bad smells, and moisture. HomeCera operates through a Patented method of drying by circulating air with ceramic hydrocarbon (SiC) honeycomb heater. That is, HomeCera operates by inhaling air, not by drying it with hot heat, and by decomposing and discharging airborne germs, bad smells and moisture. 

 

The odor passes through silicon carbide honeycomb, sterilizing and purifying, and emits far infrared rays into the air.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Sterilization, drying and air purification inside the shoe are available at once.

 

Smoke in the box (Left) / Smoke disappeared in the box in 1 min (Right)
 
 
 

2. Rapid Drying Power?
HomeCera has Rapid drying power: 

HomeCera dries most of wet shoes within 1-2 hr. To prevent the spread of germs in the shoes, the first thing you should do is to dry your shoes perfectly.

 

 

Perfectly dry fully wet shoes in a 60 minutes wireless mode even without being dehydrated in advance! 

 

3.Sterilization Power

 

Homecera suppresses the growth of mold hyphae with a ceramics far infrared ray and can completely decompose and remove airborne mold spores by passing through the SiC honeycomb using air convection.

 

HomeCera eliminates athlete's foot, which is bacteria and fungi such as E. coli, and removes shoe odor. For your information, Athlete's foot has a structure that is not easy to exterminate by common methods and is obliterated only through hot air and inhalation decomposition.

  • Press the power button for 2 seconds.

  • The operating mode lasts 30 minutes at first power-on.

  • Another press of the power button will last 60 minutes in the operating mode.

  • Pressing the power button again will last 120 minutes in the operating mode.

  • Press the switch for 2 seconds when turning off the power.

 

"Homecera shoes dryer available for all shoes in the world”

If you ask "Leather shoes?", we can confidently say," You can see the effects of the far-infrared radiation on the leather." It can be used for any shoes regardless of shape, material, or function.

 

 

 

 

  • The temperature of the honeycomb heater in SiC is real-time temperature sensor maintained at around 60 degrees
  • If the lithium-ion battery exceeds a certain voltage, it's designed to stop charging so it is safe from overheating or explosions
  • For safety of use, it is designed to stop using a charger other than a dedicated charger (It's required to use a dedicated chargers that comes with HomeCera).

 

 

 

 

　　　

 

 

You can select one of 2 colors : Silver and White. HomeCera provides all with Free 2 x battery chargers for each pair. If you select 2 pair of HomeCera, You'll get 4 x battery chargers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

I am CEO at HomeCera and a product developer, Yang Jung Hee. 
I always had a lot of sweat on my hands and feet, so my socks were always wet. I was looking for a good shoe dryer, but there were only products on the market that used dangerous UV lamps or metallic hot-wires.  After experiencing many products, I decided to produce a good product by myself. At that time, I have been always curious about ceramics, and while collecting data such as how the smoke reduction system burned at high temperature, SiC (Silicon Carbide), a type of ceramic, was used as a heater for purifying air and releasing far-infrared rays, and was very useful for various sterilization, Drying as well as deodorization, so I made a prototype and registered a patent for Korea, Japan, China, Taiwan and the United States, and Vietnam.

HomeCera is not simply heat-drying, like hair dryers, but are a new way of absorbing air to break down germs, odors and moisture in the air.  The product was designed using airflow to make shoes sterilized, dried, and deodorized. The portable cordless design is supposed to generate high temperature heat and is designed for both cored and cordless use so people can use it anytime when it is charged and not charged as well. HomeCera uses ceramics to make a variety of sterilizing & drying machines to make products that can protect our home without harmful substances.

We're running again today.

 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Korean Broadcasting SBS TV 
 
 
Japan Broadcasting  NHK

story:
• Work stress is the most common mental illness shared by clients
  • Only 1 in 4 people sought professional help
  • We didn't care much about mental illness until it happened to our own ex-colleague sitting next to us in our old office. 
  • Then we realized, what if this happened to us? What are our options?

Current Therapy Options

Online Therapy Apps

  • Currently provide online therapy only e.g online chat, online video, phone call
  • Not always real-time, it takes 24-48 hours to be matched with therapist

Offline Therapy

  • There are currently 4 x options in Singapore which have been used personally by our team. 
  • Still a lack of fast, discreet, affordable therapy options in Singapore. 

Why Safe Space™ Is The Solution

We aim to solve 2 key problems through 1 secured app

  • Connecting therapists and users immediately
  • Increase client pool for therapists

For Users

  • Real-time matching
  • Online Counselling
  • Offline (Face-to-face) Counselling
  • Community Support & Education

For Therapists

  • Client Sourcing - we'll take care of this for you
  • Manage all clients on 1 x secured unified platform
    • Upload case logs on 1 platform
    • Manage payments - all payments are done upfront before therapy session
    • Send invoices and billing through STRIPE
    • Clinical Supervisors - access our pool of clinical supervisors to move up in your career path

Cyber Security Measures

  • We treat personal data and cyber security very seriously at Safe Space.
  • We have deployed 6 x cyber security measures to prevent data leakage

The Impact

You'll be helping 2 groups of people:

  1. Countless number of people to get access to fast, discreet and affordable therapy services. 
  2. The amazing therapists out there to find more clients so that they can continue making a difference in someone's life. 

Risks & Challenges

Mental health tech is new, especially in Asia. As this is a therapy app that offers BOTH online and face-to-face therapy services, we are creating an app that's first-to-market and will require a lot of research to fine tune this product. 

Your support helps us to conduct more research to continuously improve this

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB destination. This means that you pay all freight and duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo.

If you would like to estimate your duties, you can use this online tool (remember to convert the U.S. dollars to your local currency):

https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/

SHIPPING POLICY

It is critical that you enter your correct, valid address when placing your order. If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address or moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.

story:
Why I decided to grow/donate my hair?

About 2 and a half years ago I was working as a pediatric dental assistant.  A family came in, 2 young boys ages 5 and 2.  Both of the boys and their dad had hair that was past their shoulders so, being my nosey self, I asked if there was a reason.  The mom explained that her oldest son was really sick and was in the hospital when he was about 4 years old.  While in the hospital he saw a little girl that was bald.  He asked his mom why and his mom explained that she had cancer and her medicine (chemo) made her bald.  He got very emotional (keep in mind he was 4) and he asked what he could do to help, so his mom suggested growing his hair to donate it.  Since then it has been a goal of mine to donate my hair. I'm raising money to donate to the American Cancer Society to help fund making wigs and cancer research!

A Little About Me!

I'm Tanner Hanks, I'm 24, I'm a student and I'm married to an incredible woman!  I'm a video gamer and I have a small channel on twitch.tv/turmoil_801. For the past year and a half I have been growing my hair for the purpose of donating it to help people with diseases that cause hair loss.  I've researched and found that Pantene Beautiful Lengths is one of the best charities for donating your hair. So ALL day Friday October 16th I am going to stream some video games, during that time all donations I receive via twitch will also go to this cause! and at about 10 pm mtn time I'm going to cut my hair on stream! So please come check it out :)

Why Pantene Beautiful Lengths?

  • The money raised through this campaign will got directly to the American Cancer Society, I am donating my hair to Pantene Beautiful Lengths
  • They work closely with HairUWear® and the American Cancer Society®  
  • HairUWear, the leading global producer of real-hair wigs and extensions, helps transform campaign hair donations into the highest-quality, real-hair wigs.  It takes roughly eight to fifteen ponytails to create each Pantene Beautiful Lengths wig, which is why your support is so important. 
  • The finished wigs are distributed, at no cost to female cancer patients, through the American Cancer Society’s extensive national network of wig banks. 
  • The reason I picked $2000 as the goal amount is because that is about what it costs to make a single wig, crazy right?

Perks?

  • You get to help a woman suffering with cancer receive a wig! Even if you donate a dollar, you still helped and should be proud!

Risks & Challenges

  •  I obviously can't guarantee they will be able to use my hair, but I sure hope they do!  I've taken great care of it so why wouldn't they right?

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate money that's okay! here's some other ways you can help:

  • Share this on social media (facebook, twitter, etc.) use #BeautifulLengths
  • You can always donate your hair! even if it isn't long enough yet, grow it out until it is long enough! If/when you donate it, please let me know!
  • Tune in to my twitch stream, twitch.tv/turmoil_801, and follow or just say hi!

story:
Hi, I'm Tara Emory, a transgendered woman who is  model and adult actress, self made artist, pin up girl and burlesque performer.  I know it is almost cliche to say that my body is my canvas, but for me it is really is true. If you don't know me, do a little search for my name and you'll see a sampling of my talents in costume design and photography.  
  • I am seeking the help of interested parties helping me to perfect my physical image, so that my body can match up with the heights of my imagination.
  • This is not about me "passing", it is about surpassing, and synching my body image to the boundless ambitions of my imagination, to which I have expressed in my costume design, modelling, and personality.  I've come so far with some of my other surgeries (breast augmentation), but in so doing I missed what was probably the area in most need of attention, my brow and forehead.

I'm seeking help from my fans and peers as i would like to get some more surgery done to my face mostly in the hairline/brow region.
  • I have been doing research on this for nearly a decade and have had consultations with surgeons in the United States, however, their prices ($18-30 thousand) have always been out of my budget, even why my website was doing better.  I've found a doctor in Mexico who is world reknown for his work on trans women, and have spoken to and seen some of his clients.  His prices are far more reasonable, but I still need help.


What I Need & What You Get

But wait you say, you're Tara Emory, you're PERFECT in your photos! oh my god don't change!!  NoOOOooOOOOO!!!

  • Well, yes, why thank you for believing everything you see in my very selective photos.  And though i use photoshop to a minimum (and try to not misrepresent myself), please don't judge the real me by own photos.
  • There's two very distinct ways you can look at the argument for more surgery.
    First off, we can take the frivilous approach.
  • To all you you fans who have been following my career, you probably have noticed that i have taken a shift towards the plastic, embracing my own talents to be a living cartoon doll.  Getting some light facial surgery done around my eyes and forehead will only enhance that image, and push my career and my own fetishes further, and to you the consumer, that's a good thing, isn't it.  Yes,  you want to see me go further down this rabbit hole! 

    Also, please be assured that i have a very very clear idea of what exactly I want done, and how they won't actually take the personality out of my face or change the way I look that much.  I am very targeted with my goals of only smoothing out the sharp edges and taking what I have, and making it look even better.

    But the flip side to this is very simple.  I still have a hairline of a boy, and hormones only did so much to fix that, limiting my natural hairstyles.  Though for my professional persona I wear lots of different wigs, my natural look could use some help, and the solution is facial feminization surgery.

The Impact

The impact of this will help my career, my destiny and actually my self esteem as I will be able to do a lot more with my natural hair than I have previously done.   I've actually never been to a hair salon, though pixie hairstyle cuts work well on me.  Add to that my improved image for my modelling career and my current direction, then it's a win/win.

  • Since my visage and my art are popular with the public, it seems only fitting to ask the public for help, since it is the public who will be the ones who will enjoy the end results as seen in my photographic and modelling art.
  • Also, I know there are fans out there who have seen me and wondered how they could best further my career so I can take it further and further to new heights.  This is the best thing you can do for me and quite literally one of the very few things I want in life!

Other Ways You Can Help

Perhaps you LOVE what I do, but you just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help!

  • Spread the word on twitter and the transsexual forums.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools to let people know!

To all you you fans who have been following my career, you probably have noticed that i have taken a shift towards the plastic, embracing my own talents to be a living cartoon doll.  Getting some light facial surgery done around my eyes and forehead will only enhance that image, and push my career and my own fetishes further, and to you the consumer, that's a good thing, isn't it.  Yes,  you want to see me go further down this rabbit hole!  Also, please be assured that i have a very very clear idea of what exactly I want done, and how they won't actually take the personality out of my face or change the way I look that much.  I am very targeted with my goals of only smoothing out the sharp edges and taking what I have, and making it look even better.But the flip side to this is very simple.  I still have a hairline of a boy, and hormones only did so much to fix that, limiting my natural hairstyles.  Though for my professional persona I wear lots of different wigs, my natural look could use some help, and the solution is facial feminization surgery.


The Impact
The impact of this will help my career, my destiny and actually my self esteem as I will be able to do a lot more with my natural hair than I have previously done.   I've actually never been to a hair salon, though pixie hairstyle cuts work well on me.  Add to that my improved image for my modelling career and my current direction, then it's a win/win.
Since my visage and my art are popular with the public, it seems 
only fitting to ask the public for help, since it is the public who will
 be the ones who will enjoy the end results as seen in my photographic 
and modelling art.
Also, I know there are fans out there who have seen me and wondered how they could best further my career so I can take it further and further to new heights.  This is the best thing you can do for me and quite literally one of the very few things I want in life!


Other Ways You Can Help
Perhaps you LOVE what I do, but you just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help!

Spread the word on twitter and the transsexual forums.
Please use the Indiegogo share tools to let people know!

story:
Short Summary

Our business idea is this simple – know the price of medical care before you buy it.  Look up your medical test cost by zip code on Pratter.us. Can’t find it? Call, email or live chat us and we’ll get it for you - and add that to our database too. We’ll even answer your billing questions. 

  • My name is Bill Hennessey, M.D. I am not only a physician but I own a medical billing company and for nearly two years, I have been the Founder and CEO of Pratter. I have watched health care insurance costs soar 400% yet salaries remain nearly flat at only as 15% increase over the same 20 years.  I see and feel the pain of those working so hard yet they cannot afford their medical care.
  • Pratter means "medical price matters" - it pratters. Pratter's goal is to provide affordable access to medical care for all Americans.  I have made this my mission and purpose in life to create value by helping others.
  • Forget about taxes and a mortgage - health care costs are now the #1 cost in most households. It shouldn't and doesn't have to be this way.
  • You contribution help put end end to the secret pricing scandal and helps create affordable access to medical care.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Our funds will be utilized to hire medical billers to staff our medical cost concierge service that will answer your cost and billing questions in this intentionally confusing purchase of health care that. Medical billers will also upload costs to Pratter.us. We need to hire an IT person or two for further developing our Pratter.us platform and also automating the process of formatting and uploading medical cost data.
  • In return, Pratter will bring to market first-to-market true medical cost transparency consumer-at-large products. We have good blood work cash and insurance pricing through the US but we want to enhance it. You will have access to it via computer, tablet or smartphone and can create a Pratter shortcut easily on your portable devices. No company can ever have all medical pricing online given that hospitals don't share it with you, so we have a medical biller concierge service to help you cut through all of the bureaucracy to get and understand the cost of your medical care - before you receive it.

The Impact

  • Unaffordable health care is America's #1 social and financial problem and it's not being talked about - except by us. Hospitals, insurance companies and politicians won't do anything about it. The secret pricing scandal lives on.
  • Our solution is to upload as much medical cost and claims data we can get on our hands and give it to you - the American people - so that you can know the cost of your medical care before you buy it. Put in your zip code and click away for costs nearby.
  • Known pricing creates smart shopping. Known pricing also creates competition - and with competition, the consumer wins every time with lower prices.

Risks & Challenges

  • Like other businesses, our main challenge is time and people. And that means we need money.
  • Hospitals, surgery centers and health insurance companies all hid their charges and reimbursements for care. This is a challenge put forth to us - to get everything from them that they are hiding. As an entrepreneur and owner of a medical billing company, where there is a will, there is a way. In fact, we have several proprietary ways in which we gather medical cost data so that you can search it easily but just placing in your zip code and clicking "search."

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help us by spreading this link to as many people as you can. Use the Indiegogo share tools too.
  • Help us by telling your employer that you want to receive Pratter as an employee benefit. Tell him or her that you can't afford your healht care and to join Team Pratter today.
  • Help us by telling your health insurance broker who sells you your expensive health insurance policy to join Team Pratter today. e have a link for them at the bottom of our home page on Pratter.us.
  • Help us by sending us your medical bills and insurance explanation of benefits (EOB) by email at info@pratter.us or by snail mail to Pratter 120 Village Drive, Greensburg, PA 15601. Please remember to black out your personal information first. We only use non-personal medical cost data fields on Pratter.us and we never, ever keep any personal information. We are all about medical costs. Your cost of care is their for everyone to see and vice versa. Together we can do what the hospitals and insurance companies don't want - pitch in on our shared platform to expose all medical costs.
  • Thank you! Thank you! Thank you in advance!

story:
Short Summary

Hi. I'm Diana. 

I'm passionate about getting families moving together. I believe it's critical to  teach the fundamentals of efficient and effective movement so that people can move their bodies in safe, effective ways for their whole life. And I am passionate about having a place where people feel welcome, cared for, and inspired on their wellness journey. 

Trava is all of those things. Trava is part neighborhood fitness studio, part wellness collective. And all about the health and wellness of our community. 

I have have been a health coach and nutritionist since 2007.  Over the course of my career I have seen huge gaps in local movement classes and education. And I've worked out of other studios, had a small space of my own, and now I'm opening a large location to reach more of the community. And that's where I need your help.

As you'll see in the video, one main focus is to get families moving together. Instead of always separating parents and kids when it comes to "getting a workout in", we at Trava will offer special classes for people of all ages to move in the same space. 

  • There will be family-focused classes where adults and children move together in the same space, through the same material. The class will be specifically designed for the wide variety of ages, and will provide opportunities to both modify and intensify movements to incorporate all skill levels. 
  • There will be 'kids encouraged' classes where the adults are being led through the class while the kids are in a separate area of the studio working on the same concepts at a modified pace with a designated instructor just for them.
  • There will be adult-only and kid-only classes, so that the family can experience the different ways that people can come together and learn. 
  • Regular class attendance is free for kids at Trava.
We'll have yoga, pilates, barre, dance and aerobic fitness, kickboxing, self-defense and martial arts, and functional movement classes to teach you correct form, help prevent injury, and how to take what you learn at Trava out into your environment and keep it strong for the rest of your life. We also offer free Nutrition 101 classes, as well as more intensive seminars and class series' to help the community get the education and tools to learn about healthier food choices. From identifying strategies for the overall nutrition picture to sharing healthy recipes we offer a vibrant source for solution-seekers who are tired of getting stuck and ready to make some good changes. 

Another key area is offering genuine community. A sense of belonging and a focus on individualized care in a group fitness setting. 

Imagine a place where you go to move your body, get nutritional direction, and improve your overall physical health...and you get an emotional return as well. You belong in this special place that stands rooted in the foundations of wellness. You meet people who are on the same path, with the same goals, and you support each other. And the teachers you're learning from are experts in their fields, and truly dedicated to helping you get better. 

What We Need & What You Get

Your support is critical. It will help me (and my family) get Trava off the ground. I know that you will love Trava when you experience it. Please consider making a membership contribution, or if you don't live close, getting some of our fitness videos. You get the benefit of belonging at Trava, and we get the funds a little earlier to get the space put together perfectly for you. 

This community is all about us. It's about working together to build a healthier future for ourselves and our families in an environment that we love and trust. Your investment means that you're becoming  an integral part of Trava. You matter to us. And we want to matter to you. 

Great teachers cost money. I have put together an incredible team of talented and passionate wellness professionals. They are masters of their craft, and they're dedicated to collaborating with each other to create a comprehensive coaching team for all of our members and their families. They'll get to know you, and help connect you with the movement styles and growth opportunities that are right for you to increase your success. Your dollars will help to compensate these superb individuals in their good work. 

Check out the perk section of this message for more details on investment options.

The Impact

When you contribute to this campaign, you'll be helping to support the key concepts of Trava: community, connection, contribution, and collaboration. You'll help build a place to unite neighbors and support families. Whether you're attending one of our adult-only classes or a family-focused one, we want you to feel supported, motivated, and inspired within the Trava family.

And you'll help create a space that is unique in its broad class offerings. The classes range from restorative to invigorating, body soothing to butt kicking. And our mission is to bring a wide range of movement styles to open the mind to new movement opportunities.

It's going to be amazing, y'all. It will be fun and beautiful and inspiring and it will change some lives for the better. We've got a lot in store for the community through Trava. A lot of amazing things. Your contribution will help those things get done faster and more smoothly. You'll make this a success. 

Risks & Challenges

We're opening at a critical time of the year for the fitness industry...January. We'll be up against everyone from big gyms to independent trainers. Cheap class passes and no-risk trials. Meanwhile, we'll be working hard to build our core group of Trava-lovers who want something different and special. To even get the word out we have to spend an insane amount of wo/man-hours and dollars on print and social media marketing. Fortunately we have a talented team at the ready, and a whole lot of passion behind our brand. But we need your help to ensure that passion reaches its audience.

Also, Austin has its fair share of wellness options. We are going to bust our buns to ensure that we set ourselves apart from our other fitness friends (not competition...we're all on the same team) and find our people. But there are lots of big box gyms with many more marketing dollars than we have, and we'd love a shot to prove our worth.

Other Ways You Can Help

Sometimes you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. If you can't get involved today...come back tomorrow! Just kidding. You can do a couple of things: 

Talk about us. Tell your friends that you heard about this great place that's opening up and what we do. Memorize this entire spiel. Tell people at parties and on the bus. You'll make a huge impact, and we'll love you for it. 

Use the Indigogo share tools. This site makes it easy to spit this campaign all over social media. It only takes a click, and it means the world to us. 

Come take a class! We'd love to meet you when we open, and show you why you'll love to be a part of our community, and why we'll love to be a part of yours. 

Participate in the community.  Take the Trava mission to the streets yourself. Volunteer, share your expertise, and inspire each other. 

Thank you so much for your consideration, and for your love, support, and faith in this work. You won't regret supporting us.

story:
A video tutorial program for adults and ​children

UpRightNOW is based on the in-person courses Kathleen Porter has been teaching to adults and children over the past twenty years. The video tutorials will provide the same step-by-step coaching for how to apply natural alignment principles to any task of daily living—how to sit comfortably in almost any situation, how to stand in line to vote, bend to tie a shoe, walk down the street (or along a rugged trail), lift a heavy box, carry a sleeping child up the stairs, reach for a book on a high shelf, run a race, and more—all activities done by way of mechanical movements that are natural to the human design and in almost all cases assures that the body is inhabited in a way that is pain-free. 

Sharing this information with children can only come from adults who already understand this and are putting these principles into practice in their own lives. This is why the foundational program is geared primarily to adults, with many of the basic instructions easily adapted for children. An outline of steps for sharing this with children will be included for anyone signing up for UPRightNOW during this campaign, after which it will be available as an add-on component.

 

 

Why this approach is unique and so effective

The current approach to exercise and fitness emphasizes muscles—we either work to strengthen them or we stretch them—all the while ignoring the inseparable role of a naturally aligned skeleton in providing the underlying framework of support for the body to which our muscles are attached. Our skeleton is governed by the same basic rules of physics that require that wall studs and posts on a house align along the vertical axis of gravity or "plumb line" so that weight from above and forces of gravity can be distributed through them.

Humans are not houses, of course; we are alive and dynamic.  We move by way of a mechanical system of pulleys (muscles) that move levers (our bones). When we obey unnegotiable physical laws that define how our bones must relate with each other, our muscles (which attach to these bones via tendons) are elastic (neither too "tight/stiff" nor too weak). Instead of muscles having to overwork to "hold" us together, they now function as one part of a balanced musculoskeletal system. 

The images below demonstrate the ease and flow of movement when bones are naturally aligned vs. the muscular "effort" and spinal distortion that results when the structural foundation of the skeleton is compromised.

 

 

Watch this snippet from a lesson about feet:

 

 
 
 

Structural Alignment and Children's Wellbeing

Due to an over-reliance on carriers, strollers, car seats and too-many hours spent in front of electronic screens, many children are losing their natural alignment at younger and younger ages. If nothing is done about this, the impacts on their overall health—sometimes for a lifetime—can be far-reaching. 

Sports injuries among children have increased considerably over the past twenty-five years. Currently, more than 3.5 million children under the age of fourteen receive medical treatment for sports injuries each year.

 

Which of these children are more likely

to be injured while playing sports?

 

Is it these children, who have elongated spines, unrestricted joints, the support of aligned bones, and who move with ease and vigor?

 

 

Or is these children, who have compressed spines, restricted joint function, and who lack the support of solidly aligned legs? 

  

Sadly, a visit to a local playground or a Saturday morning children's soccer gathering is likely to reveal far too many children who routinely struggle with misaligned bodies. 

 

 

In return for your support . . .

We've gathered a boatload of nifty perks for every level of support!  (These may also come in "bundles" and various combinations and may not all be available at the same time during the month-long campaign).

 Learn more about these books and posture aid products by clicking here.

and  

Read product reviews here

 

A Perfect Fit with Mindfulness

Postural habits don't change overnight. It takes repetition, along with a willingness to be mindful. This is good news, because it turns out that, while mindfulness reinforces awareness of alignment, practicing alignment builds mindfulness! In other words, they reinforce and enhance each other. Quite the bonus! Deepening awareness of the body through "aligned presence" builds a capacity to meditate on the body many times during the day, no matter what one is doing at any given time. Thus, focusing on alignment anchors us in mindfulness. 

 

 

No other program provides parents and teachers with the information they need to guide children (and themselves) back to the physical center of their being.

Below is a narrated excerpt from an animated video Kathleen created for young elementary-age children. This is currently being used in a handful of elementary classrooms around the country, where it has been enthusiastically received by the students. Children love learning this!

 
"While I've taught myself how to make these videos," says Kathleen, "the process is somewhat overwhelming in terms of time and my ability to produce them at the level of quality they deserve."

 

Your participation in this project

will help this happen!

 

Video tutorials have the benefit of providing lifetime access, so that lessons can be repeated and reinforced over and over as many times as one needs. The basic instructions are simple enough for most children to understand, and for anyone who wants to know more about what's "under the hood" (i.e., inside our skin), extra modules include expanded details about the how and why of the body's mechanical workings and how this can be applied in a variety of activities. The more you know about how your body works and moves, the more empowered you are to manage how you feel. 

 

Guiding children—and ourselves—

back "home" 

Slouching and skeletal collapse are an epidemic today. This appears to be due to a growing over-reliance on strollers, carriers, car-seats and limited natural developmental movement in early infancy, along with modern-day adaptive patterns in older children and adults that have to do with too much time spent in front of electronic screens that promote more sedentary and structurally collapsed ways of being. It's important to note that exercise and stretching, in and of themselves, rarely address the underlying causes of "poor posture." In many cases where exercise and physical activity is done with underlying misalignment, unnatural patterns become even more entrenched in the musculature.

When we consider the arrangement of internal organs and other essential working parts, including small "tubes" and valves and how their ability to function well might be affected by ongoing distortion, many questions are raised about the effects of chronic slouching on overall health and wellbeing.

As parents and teachers, we can't expect our children to be able to change if we ourselves struggle with our own poor posture. UprightNOW provides the tools for "fixing" our own alignment, so we can share this with our children and serve as healthy role models.

 

Walking Our Talk 

Children can only recover their own natural posture when they are guided by adults who model it for them. This is why the basic course is is aimed first at adults and older children, with added-on components and supplemental materials for sharing this with younger children, either at home or in the classroom. 

Children are curious about what goes on inside their skin. They respond enthusiastically to the idea that a living, breathing skeleton resides within them that is always ready, willing and able to provide the physical support they need—basically forever. When they understand how the skeleton serves as their framework of support, they become motivated to put alignment principles into practice, just like the fourth graders pictured below.

 

 

 

What We Need 

The $25,000 funding goal will allow us to produce and distribute this comprehensive training program by way of a series of high-quality, detailed tutorial videos with animated graphics.

Each segment or module will include:

     1) THE WHY — background information related to the body's mechanical design. The more we understand how these bodies of ours work, the more empowered we are to be in charge of how we feel today and how we age tomorrow.

     2) THE HOW — instructions for how to implement and put the principles into practice in all aspects of daily life; 

     3) THE STEPS — a short-cut summary of the steps involved; and additional supplemental information.

     4)  EXTRAS — Additional tips and supplemental information.

Outline of Modules:

  • Overview of Natural Alignment—The body's biomechanical details broken down.
  • The Pelvis as Foundation for Everything Above
  • Sit Like a Happy Dog
  • Lean Back in a Chair​ (or in a car)
  • Opening and Lengthening the Back
  • Establishing the Core—Tying yourself into place
  • Meet Your Feet: Giving Shape to 26 Bones
  • Engaging Ground Reaction Force
  • The Legs as Pillars of Support
  • Relax Your Shoulders
  • Getting Your Head on Straight
  • Relaxed, Solid Standing
  • Walking with Vitality and Ease
  • Bend Like a Baby
  • Positions for Resting & Sleeping​

Additional Modules will be added that focus on specific activities of daily living, such as:

  • How to Sit Comfortably at a Computer for Long Periods of Time
  • Getting In and Out of a Chair
  • Getting Up and Down off the Floor
  • Adapting to Cushy Couches and Unhelpful Furniture
  • How to Sit for Meditation / Which Props Are Best for You?
  • Walking Meditation to Reshape Your Feet
  • How to Lift a Heavy Box (or other item)
  • How to Carry a Heavy Box (or other item)
  • How to Reach Out in Front
  • How to Reach Overhead
  • Walking Up and Down Stairs
  • Driving While Sitting Well
  • Looking Up at the Sky Overhead
  • How to Avoid (and Minimize) "Dowager's Hump"
  • How to Run a Race
  • How to Squat
  • How to Be Pregnant and Support the Process of Giving Birth
  • How to Protect Babies from Losing Natural Alignment

Any additional funds will be applied (as stretch goals) to expand the children's aspect of the program to include:

  • Animated, story-based videos for the youngest learners; 
  • Printable comic book guides for older elementary and middle/high school students, with illustrated instructions and "exercises" that can be done to reinforce alignment principles; 
  • Curriculum guides for teachers for how to include alignment concepts in health and science units of study in ways that are fun and engaging—with tips for parents in how to incorporate these lessons into the home environment in ways that are readily accepted and received.

 

Just a bit more about

natural alignment of the body . . . 

 

Two kinds of strength — natural and unnatural

The woman pictured below lacks the muscle power of the body builder, yet she easily carries a load on her head that he would struggle to be able to do safely, while protecting his already compressed spine. She doesn't have to "workout" or even carry rocks on her head to maintain her strength, since she simply possesses the innate strength of a naturally aligned human being. Her secret is that the rocks are carried by a precise arrangement of her bones, through which the weight of the load is easily distributed. Not so for this man, whose strength is artificial and contrived, and prevents his skeleton (especially his spine) from being aligned. Were he to stop working out, his "superficial" strength would quickly start to disappear. 

 

Aging on and off the Vertical Axis

Aging amplifies the effects of how we have inhabited our bodies over the years. While many of the consequences of growing old are unavoidable, structural collapse is not an inevitable feature of aging as many of us have believed it to be. 

One characteristic that is shared by almost everyone you see who visibly demonstrates structural collapse in old age is that they ALL have a sad dog pelvis. This isn't a situation that just suddenly developed, but is the inevitable outcome of decades of inhabiting the body without the foundational support of an aligned pelvis.

Should you wish to know even more about natural alignment, this article, What the Heck is "Good Posture," Anyway?  and the books mentioned above, all offer additional information on the subject.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you are able to participate by contributing or not, if our mission inspires you, here's how you can still help out.

  • Please spread the word to your friends and contacts on social media and help us make some noise about our campaign.
  • Indiegogo has tools that make sharing our campaign with others easy to do—Please click on the social media icons at the top of this page to share with your friends and network contacts—and ask them to share this too!

and, finally—

Thank you so very much!
story_txt:
A video tutorial program for adults and ​children
UpRightNOW is based on the in-person courses Kathleen Porter has been teaching to adults and children over the past twenty years. The video tutorials will provide the same step-by-step coaching for how to apply natural alignment principles to any task of daily living—how to sit comfortably in almost any situation, how to stand in line to vote, bend to tie a shoe, walk down the street (or along a rugged trail), lift a heavy box, carry a sleeping child up the stairs, reach for a book on a high shelf, run a race, and more—all activities done by way of mechanical movements that are natural to the human design and in almost all cases assures that the body is inhabited in a way that is pain-free. 
Sharing this information with children can only come from adults who already understand this and are putting these principles into practice in their own lives. This is why the foundational program is geared primarily to adults, with many of the basic instructions easily adapted for children. An outline of steps for sharing this with children will be included for anyone signing up for UPRightNOW during this campaign, after which it will be available as an add-on component.
 

 
Why this approach is unique and so effective
The current approach to exercise and fitness emphasizes muscles—we either work to strengthen them or we stretch them—all the while ignoring the inseparable role of a naturally aligned skeleton in providing the underlying framework of support for the body to which our muscles are attached. Our skeleton is governed by the same basic rules of physics that require that wall studs and posts on a house align along the vertical axis of gravity or "plumb line" so that weight from above and forces of gravity can be distributed through them.

Humans are not houses, of course; we are alive and dynamic.  We move by way of a mechanical system of pulleys (muscles) that move levers (our bones). When we obey unnegotiable physical laws that define how our bones must relate with each other, our muscles (which attach to these bones via tendons) are elastic (neither too "tight/stiff" nor too weak). Instead of muscles having to overwork to "hold" us together, they now function as one part of a balanced musculoskeletal system. 
The images below demonstrate the ease and flow of movement when bones are naturally aligned vs. the muscular "effort" and spinal distortion that results when the structural foundation of the skeleton is compromised.

 

 
Watch this snippet from a lesson about feet:
 


 
 
 

Structural Alignment and Children's Wellbeing
Due to an over-reliance on carriers, strollers, car seats and too-many hours spent in front of electronic screens, many children are losing their natural alignment at younger and younger ages. If nothing is done about this, the impacts on their overall health—sometimes for a lifetime—can be far-reaching. 
Sports injuries among children have increased considerably over the past twenty-five years. Currently, more than 3.5 million children under the age of fourteen receive medical treatment for sports injuries each year.
 
Which of these children are more likely
to be injured while playing sports?
 
Is it these children, who have elongated spines, unrestricted joints, the support of aligned bones, and who move with ease and vigor?
 

 
Or is these children, who have compressed spines, restricted joint function, and who lack the support of solidly aligned legs? 
  

Sadly, a visit to a local playground or a Saturday morning children's soccer gathering is likely to reveal far too many children who routinely struggle with misaligned bodies. 
 

 
In return for your support . . .

We've gathered a boatload of nifty perks for every level of support!  (These may also come in "bundles" and various combinations and may not all be available at the same time during the month-long campaign).

 Learn more about these books and posture aid products by clicking here.
and  
Read product reviews here
 
A Perfect Fit with Mindfulness
Postural habits don't change overnight. It takes repetition, along with a willingness to be mindful. This is good news, because it turns out that, while mindfulness reinforces awareness of alignment, practicing alignment builds mindfulness! In other words, they reinforce and enhance each other. Quite the bonus! Deepening awareness of the body through "aligned presence" builds a capacity to meditate on the body many times during the day, no matter what one is doing at any given time. Thus, focusing on alignment anchors us in mindfulness. 
 

 
No other program provides parents and teachers with the information they need to guide children (and themselves) back to the physical center of their being.
Below is a narrated excerpt from an animated video Kathleen created for young elementary-age children. This is currently being used in a handful of elementary classrooms around the country, where it has been enthusiastically received by the students. Children love learning this!

 
"While I've taught myself how to make these videos," says Kathleen, "the process is somewhat overwhelming in terms of time and my ability to produce them at the level of quality they deserve."
 
Your participation in this project 
will help this happen!
 
Video tutorials have the benefit of providing lifetime access, so that lessons can be repeated and reinforced over and over as many times as one needs. The basic instructions are simple enough for most children to understand, and for anyone who wants to know more about what's "under the hood" (i.e., inside our skin), extra modules include expanded details about the how and why of the body's mechanical workings and how this can be applied in a variety of activities. The more you know about how your body works and moves, the more empowered you are to manage how you feel. 
 
Guiding children—and ourselves—
back "home" 
Slouching and skeletal collapse are an epidemic today. This appears to be due to a growing over-reliance on strollers, carriers, car-seats and limited natural developmental movement in early infancy, along with modern-day adaptive patterns in older children and adults that have to do with too much time spent in front of electronic screens that promote more sedentary and structurally collapsed ways of being. It's important to note that exercise and stretching, in and of themselves, rarely address the underlying causes of "poor posture." In many cases where exercise and physical activity is done with underlying misalignment, unnatural patterns become even more entrenched in the musculature.
When we consider the arrangement of internal organs and other essential working parts, including small "tubes" and valves and how their ability to function well might be affected by ongoing distortion, many questions are raised about the effects of chronic slouching on overall health and wellbeing.

As parents and teachers, we can't expect our children to be able to change if we ourselves struggle with our own poor posture. UprightNOW provides the tools for "fixing" our own alignment, so we can share this with our children and serve as healthy role models.
 
Walking Our Talk 

Children can only recover their own natural posture when they are guided by adults who model it for them. This is why the basic course is is aimed first at adults and older children, with added-on components and supplemental materials for sharing this with younger children, either at home or in the classroom. 
Children are curious about what goes on inside their skin. They respond enthusiastically to the idea that a living, breathing skeleton resides within them that is always ready, willing and able to provide the physical support they need—basically forever. When they understand how the skeleton serves as their framework of support, they become motivated to put alignment principles into practice, just like the fourth graders pictured below.
 

 

 
What We Need 
The $25,000 funding goal will allow us to produce and distribute this comprehensive training program by way of a series of high-quality, detailed tutorial videos with animated graphics.
Each segment or module will include:
     1) THE WHY — background information related to the body's mechanical design. The more we understand how these bodies of ours work, the more empowered we are to be in charge of how we feel today and how we age tomorrow.
     2) THE HOW — instructions for how to implement and put the principles into practice in all aspects of daily life; 
     3) THE STEPS — a short-cut summary of the steps involved; and additional supplemental information.
     4)  EXTRAS — Additional tips and supplemental information.
Outline of Modules:


Overview of Natural Alignment—The body's biomechanical details broken down.
The Pelvis as Foundation for Everything Above
Sit Like a Happy Dog

Lean Back in a Chair​ (or in a car)
Opening and Lengthening the Back

Establishing the Core—Tying yourself into place

Meet Your Feet: Giving Shape to 26 Bones
Engaging Ground Reaction Force
The Legs as Pillars of Support
Relax Your Shoulders
Getting Your Head on Straight
Relaxed, Solid Standing
Walking with Vitality and Ease
Bend Like a Baby
Positions for Resting & Sleeping​

Additional Modules will be added that focus on specific activities of daily living, such as:

How to Sit Comfortably at a Computer for Long Periods of Time
Getting In and Out of a Chair
Getting Up and Down off the Floor
Adapting to Cushy Couches and Unhelpful Furniture
How to Sit for Meditation / Which Props Are Best for You?
Walking Meditation to Reshape Your Feet
How to Lift a Heavy Box (or other item)
How to Carry a Heavy Box (or other item)
How to Reach Out in Front
How to Reach Overhead
Walking Up and Down Stairs
Driving While Sitting Well
Looking Up at the Sky Overhead
How to Avoid (and Minimize) "Dowager's Hump"
How to Run a Race
How to Squat
How to Be Pregnant and Support the Process of Giving Birth
How to Protect Babies from Losing Natural Alignment


Any additional funds will be applied (as stretch goals) to expand the children's aspect of the program to include:


Animated, story-based videos for the youngest learners; 

Printable comic book guides for older elementary and middle/high school students, with illustrated instructions and "exercises" that can be done to reinforce alignment principles; 

Curriculum guides for teachers for how to include alignment concepts in health and science units of study in ways that are fun and engaging—with tips for parents in how to incorporate these lessons into the home environment in ways that are readily accepted and received.

 
Just a bit more about
natural alignment of the body . . .
