The woman pictured below lacks the muscle power of the body builder, yet she easily carries a load on her head that he would struggle to be able to do safely, while protecting his already compressed spine. She doesn't have to "workout" or even carry rocks on her head to maintain her strength, since she simply possesses the innate strength of a naturally aligned human being. Her secret is that the rocks are carried by a precise arrangement of her bones, through which the weight of the load is easily distributed. Not so for this man, whose strength is artificial and contrived, and prevents his skeleton (especially his spine) from being aligned. Were he to stop working out, his "superficial" strength would quickly start to disappear. 

 
Aging on and off the Vertical Axis
Aging amplifies the effects of how we have inhabited our bodies over the years. While many of the consequences of growing old are unavoidable, structural collapse is not an inevitable feature of aging as many of us have believed it to be. 

One characteristic that is shared by almost everyone you see who visibly demonstrates structural collapse in old age is that they ALL have a sad dog pelvis. This isn't a situation that just suddenly developed, but is the inevitable outcome of decades of inhabiting the body without the foundational support of an aligned pelvis.
Should you wish to know even more about natural alignment, this article, What the Heck is "Good Posture," Anyway?  and the books mentioned above, all offer additional information on the subject.

Other Ways You Can Help
Whether you are able to participate by contributing or not, if our mission inspires you, here's how you can still help out.


Please spread the word to your friends and contacts on social media and help us make some noise about our campaign.

Indiegogo has tools that make sharing our campaign with others easy to do—Please click on the social media icons at the top of this page to share with your friends and network contacts—and ask them to share this too!

and, finally—Thank you so very much!

story:
Anova is dedicated to fixing the CORE of what is broken in clinical trials.  We have designed a transformative approach to help patients participate in research wherever they receive care.  Your contribution will help Anova build a software application to help patients, caregivers and their doctors match to open studies that can improve or cure their condition, register interest for upcoming clinical trials, and request Compassionate Use of new treatments with the help of a physician and the manufacturer of the treatment.

The clinical trials system is broken

It has been for years.  Clinical trials cost too much, physicians don’t have easy access to trials they need to help their patients and, as a result, only 3% of patients participate in research! There are too many barriers for patients to access treatments that are likely to help, or even cure their disease.  Anova wants to fix this, and allow patients to participate in research wherever they receive care.  

Anova’s software application will help patients match to open and accruing clinical trials…

…so patients can get access to promising new treatments and get them participating in research.

…so doctors (investigators) can help their patients find the best studies at the right time and speed the conduct of clinical trials, possibly making effective treatments available sooner.

Our app will be the first patient driven software application available that will allow patients to match to a clinical trial based upon their personal diagnosis, genomic features and treatment history.  And unlike www.clinicaltrials.gov or www.centerwatch.org, the results will be in REAL TIME.  Meaning, depending on your personal information, the trials will be OPEN and ACCEPTING NEW PATIENTS!  Finally, you will be able to reach out to the study team directly to let them know you want to participate in a specific study!    The solution will help even if there is not an open and accruing clinical trial available.  Working with genomics testing partners, the software will match to promising new treatments based upon our current understanding of disease.  Patients will be able to directly ask manufacturers for Compassionate Use access to these promising new therapies (under Expanded Access or Right-to-Try) and those manufacturers will have new and exciting reasons to say “yes”!

The treatment of complex diseases like cancer is confusing.  The diagnosis can be scary.  There are many decisions to be made about when and how to treat the disease.  Knowing when and how to access investigational drugs is incredibly difficult today.  Anova plans to empower patients and their doctors by taking some of the guess work out of the question “What should I do now?”   

Who we are

Anova has big ideas on fixing the clinical trials system.  We have partnered with leading  foundations, engaged treatment sites and researchers, and brainstormed with the FDA.  Anova plans on using these relationships to expand the software into a platform that changes the way biopharmaceutical companies investigate their products, from one where protocols are written and then activated at specific research sites who hope to identify/enroll patients, to one where patients gain access to innovative treatments and participate in clinical trials at their own doctor’s office!  To reach these goals we need the support of people like you.

We can help you help others

Whatever your motivation to contribute, we welcome your support.  If you want help finding the right clinical trial opportunity for you or a loved one, if you want help making a request to access investigational product for compassionate use, if you want to learn more about the problem and what we can all do to help solve it, or if you simply want to honour a loved one, your support and involvement will help fix our broken clinical research system.

Transforming the way clinical research is carried out today will not be easy.  If it were, this work would have already have been done.  The good news is we are not alone.  The FDA, biopharmaceutical companies, former Vice Presidents and advocates leading the Right-to-Try movement have been calling for this for some time.  We have assembled a team with decades of clinical research experience including the regulatory, clinical operations, technology and financial skills necessary to get this done, and help patients get access to investigational therapies whatever their circumstance.  The time has come to take meaningful steps and make this vision a reality. 

We appreciate any support you can afford, no matter how big or small that contribution.  We understand not everyone is in a position to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't still help.  If you are not in a position to contribute financially, share our story with others that may be in that position, tell others about this campaign and the need to improve access to these therapies for patients in need. 

Click on ‘share’ tool below to spread the word.  The more contributors, the louder that voice, the more patients we can support.

 

The contents of this campaign and other material contained on the website ("Content"), presented in webinars, or provided in response to donations are for informational purposes only and do not constitute medical advice; the Content is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment but will help the talented people involved in clinical research bring promising new treatments to patients faster and cheaper.  Always seek the advice of a physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on this website or receive following contribution to this campaign.

story:
About PhycoHealth

PhycoHealth makes it easy to include the beneficial properties of seaweed in your life.

From the pure oceans of South East Australia, the PhycoHealth is committed to improving global gut health from sustainable and safe seaweed production.

As featured in Science journals and Industry reports to ABC Landline, ABC Catalyst, BBC World Changing Ideas and Coast Australia, PhycoHealth is focusing on the promising opportunity of seaweed dietary fibres in shifting western gut disorders that are leading to many chronic diseases such as psoriasis, arthritis, inflammatory gut conditions and even mental health:

PhycoDigest: Supplements for gut health

"The most surprising part of the biobelly wellness study was the clearing up of my Palmoplantar keratoderma (psoriasis of the hands) and it’s relationship to gut health. As soon as I start taking seaweed, I notice an immediate difference.” – Tania

More about the gut: The gut is the largest organ in the body, hosting all sorts of nutritional and immune processes over an area of 30m2. It is also the frontline of your immune system and thousands of signals and processes are continually approaching, connecting, being deflected and crossing into your blood stream and metabolism all the time. But it isn’t just an organ – it is an ecosystem, and you need to support it with the right nutrition. Seaweed hosts a plethora of molecules, including dietary fibres, that the World Health Organisation has identified are typically deficient in the Western Diet in terms of amount we ingest everyday as well as the diversity of types.

Your opportunity in this campaign: So many people from all over the world wanted to be a part of our clinical studies exploring gut health and skin disorders such as psoriasis. That was logistically impossible to do - but now you can learn more about your gut yourself, make some changes in your life including a daily intake of seaweed dietary fibres, and then test your gut again. In our partnership with uBiome - this is an exciting opportunity for your to take charge and learn more about this most important organ and ecosystem in your body, driving your wellness.

What are the Seaweed capsules and how do they differ from other seaweed supplements?

PhycoHealth has been doing research for the last decade on which seaweeds are of interest to gut health, and that can be eaten in adequate amounts without overdosing iodine. Our unique seaweed and extraction process means that you get capsules with concentrated seaweed dietary fibre, plus we have blended in marine Omega-3 as well so that you get both of the western dietary deficiencies covered at once. Both are important for reducing inflammation and both are commonly deficient in the western diet.

How does the gut test kit work?

Our partners at uBiome have made it easy for you to now test your own gut health and learn how it works with you and your health. In some perks in this campaign, and because we are making links between gut health and skin, you will have access to a multi-site swab test kit where you simply swab a skin site and/or toilet paper and send the sample to uBiome. In 6-weeks you will get results online that give you an overall fingerprint of your gut fingerprint and an index of wellness compared to known healthy guts.

These are not diagnostic tests but they provide insights into how your own gut is working, and how your gut changes when you change things, like eating seaweed capsules or using skin products. So in this campaign perk you get a second kit to test yourself again after you have eaten capsules or used skin product for a couple of months.

 

"I'm hanging out awaiting arrival of Seaweed Capsules to get me back on track.
I had a fantastic reaction to Seaweed Fibre during the trial. I believe this treatment will improve my life into the future" – Charlie

PhycoDerm Skincare: Natural restoration and nourishment of skin from the ocean

FIRST OFFER EXCLUSIVE TO THE CAMPAIGN

Human skin cells recognise and attach to molecular signatures on our PhycoDerm extracts. Some people with psoriasis or eczema found our skin cream prototypes to be helpful, and so we have developed a new range of gentle cleansing to nourishing skin care products. In addition to nourishing skin, we have been researching the secret of seaweed molecules and their effect on wound healing. We found the highest form of human skin cell affinity with our specific species of seaweed extracts, and we are developing medical grade wound healing materials and bio-inks with Professor Gordon Wallace at the University of Wollongong in Australia. 

PhycoDerm® extracts mimic the defensive and protective properties of human connective tissue and are key ingredients in our skincare range. 

Why Seaweed?

Health Benefits

 

Environmental Benefits

• Converts the nutrient loads pouring out from over developed coastal zones
• Catches CO2 rapidly
• Buffers the effects of ocean acidification

We all understand that accessing adequate nutrition from food is difficult from the supermarket shelf, but PhycoHealth is about changing that.

The ask: $400,000

This will be used to:

  • secure a matched government grant to commission our new seaweed refinery
  • introduce new technology for a smart seaweed production system
  • scale up our manufacturing
  • meet product manufacture costs like packaging
  • take on more staff

What you get:

​By pre-ordering products from our rewards packages you become a first-in, first-serve PhycoHealth customer and you join us on a journey to better health. Be confident that your choice is good for you and good for the planet. We are founded in science and growing with your health.

The Impact

By purchasing PhycoHealth products as part of this campaign, you will become part of a collective movement to challenge the current food paradigm and take a stand for better health. 

Risks & Challenges

We will reward your faith in us. Our products have already won awards and are backed by solid science. We know this campaign is risky, but we have achieved so much with so little so far, that we know we can meet the challenge of scaling up.

We will start to roll out the crowd funding orders from July through to December this year, and we will show you your scheduled delivery time every step of the way. We will fulfill orders on a first in, first serve basis.

We will introduce you to the new staff we bring on and tell you about the new scaled production processes we are able to achieve with your support.

Be assured that campaign customers are our priority and we will only turn our online shop back on when all your campaign backer orders are delivered.

Other ways you can help

If you are unable to contribute, that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Spread the word out and make some noise about our campaign
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools.

That's all there is to it!

Testimonials

“I have been taking the seaweed extract capsules for over 6 weeks now, and am extremely pleased to report back stunning results. Most importantly, for me, I have been able to wear a skirt and shorts for the first time in over 10 years! My legs and arms are so clear, that I no longer receive side glances at my nasty inflamed sores. As a woman, being able to wear fashion with confidence is paramount and extremely satisfying!  I thank you for the opportunity to test the seaweed product, and wish you all the very best for its future.” – Karla
story_txt:
About PhycoHealth
PhycoHealth makes it easy to include the beneficial properties of seaweed in your life. 
From the pure oceans of South East Australia, the PhycoHealth is committed to improving global gut health from sustainable and safe seaweed production.
As featured in Science journals and Industry reports to ABC Landline, ABC Catalyst, BBC World Changing Ideas and Coast Australia, PhycoHealth is focusing on the promising opportunity of seaweed dietary fibres in shifting western gut disorders that are leading to many chronic diseases such as psoriasis, arthritis, inflammatory gut conditions and even mental health:

PhycoDigest: Supplements for gut health


"The most surprising part of the biobelly wellness study was the clearing up of my Palmoplantar keratoderma (psoriasis of the hands) and it’s relationship to gut health. As soon as I start taking seaweed, I notice an immediate difference.” – Tania

More about the gut: The gut is the largest organ in the body, hosting all sorts of nutritional and immune processes over an area of 30m2. It is also the frontline of your immune system and thousands of signals and processes are continually approaching, connecting, being deflected and crossing into your blood stream and metabolism all the time. But it isn’t just an organ – it is an ecosystem, and you need to support it with the right nutrition. Seaweed hosts a plethora of molecules, including dietary fibres, that the World Health Organisation has identified are typically deficient in the Western Diet in terms of amount we ingest everyday as well as the diversity of types.
Your opportunity in this campaign: So many people from all over the world wanted to be a part of our clinical studies exploring gut health and skin disorders such as psoriasis. That was logistically impossible to do - but now you can learn more about your gut yourself, make some changes in your life including a daily intake of seaweed dietary fibres, and then test your gut again. In our partnership with uBiome - this is an exciting opportunity for your to take charge and learn more about this most important organ and ecosystem in your body, driving your wellness.
What are the Seaweed capsules and how do they differ from other seaweed supplements?
PhycoHealth has been doing research for the last decade on which seaweeds are of interest to gut health, and that can be eaten in adequate amounts without overdosing iodine. Our unique seaweed and extraction process means that you get capsules with concentrated seaweed dietary fibre, plus we have blended in marine Omega-3 as well so that you get both of the western dietary deficiencies covered at once. Both are important for reducing inflammation and both are commonly deficient in the western diet.
How does the gut test kit work?
Our partners at uBiome have made it easy for you to now test your own gut health and learn how it works with you and your health. In some perks in this campaign, and because we are making links between gut health and skin, you will have access to a multi-site swab test kit where you simply swab a skin site and/or toilet paper and send the sample to uBiome. In 6-weeks you will get results online that give you an overall fingerprint of your gut fingerprint and an index of wellness compared to known healthy guts.
These are not diagnostic tests but they provide insights into how your own gut is working, and how your gut changes when you change things, like eating seaweed capsules or using skin products. So in this campaign perk you get a second kit to test yourself again after you have eaten capsules or used skin product for a couple of months.
 

"I'm hanging out awaiting arrival of Seaweed Capsules to get me back on track.I had a fantastic reaction to Seaweed Fibre during the trial. I believe this treatment will improve my life into the future" – Charlie
PhycoDerm Skincare: Natural restoration and nourishment of skin from the ocean
FIRST OFFER EXCLUSIVE TO THE CAMPAIGN

Human skin cells recognise and attach to molecular signatures on our PhycoDerm extracts. Some people with psoriasis or eczema found our skin cream prototypes to be helpful, and so we have developed a new range of gentle cleansing to nourishing skin care products. In addition to nourishing skin, we have been researching the secret of seaweed molecules and their effect on wound healing. We found the highest form of human skin cell affinity with our specific species of seaweed extracts, and we are developing medical grade wound healing materials and bio-inks with Professor Gordon Wallace at the University of Wollongong in Australia. 
PhycoDerm® extracts mimic the defensive and protective properties of human connective tissue and are key ingredients in our skincare range. 







Why Seaweed?
Health Benefits

 
Environmental Benefits
• Converts the nutrient loads pouring out from over developed coastal zones• Catches CO2 rapidly• Buffers the effects of ocean acidification


We all understand that accessing adequate nutrition from food is difficult from the supermarket shelf, but PhycoHealth is about changing that.


The ask: $400,000
This will be used to:

secure a matched government grant to commission our new seaweed refinery
introduce new technology for a smart seaweed production system
scale up our manufacturing
meet product manufacture costs like packaging
take on more staff


What you get:
​By pre-ordering products from our rewards packages you become a first-in, first-serve PhycoHealth customer and you join us on a journey to better health. Be confident that your choice is good for you and good for the planet. We are founded in science and growing with your health.

The Impact


By purchasing PhycoHealth products as part of this campaign, you will become part of a collective movement to challenge the current food paradigm and take a stand for better health. 



Risks & Challenges
We will reward your faith in us. Our products have already won awards and are backed by solid science. We know this campaign is risky, but we have achieved so much with so little so far, that we know we can meet the challenge of scaling up.
We will start to roll out the crowd funding orders from July through to December this year, and we will show you your scheduled delivery time every step of the way. We will fulfill orders on a first in, first serve basis.
We will introduce you to the new staff we bring on and tell you about the new scaled production processes we are able to achieve with your support.
Be assured that campaign customers are our priority and we will only turn our online shop back on when all your campaign backer orders are delivered.

Other ways you can help
If you are unable to contribute, that doesn't mean they can't help:

Spread the word out and make some noise about our campaign
Use the Indiegogo share tools.

That's all there is to it!Testimonials“I have been taking the seaweed extract capsules for over 6 weeks now, and am extremely pleased to report back stunning results. Most importantly, for me, I have been able to wear a skirt and shorts for the first time in over 10 years! My legs and arms are so clear, that I no longer receive side glances at my nasty inflamed sores. As a woman, being able to wear fashion with confidence is paramount and extremely satisfying!  I thank you for the opportunity to test the seaweed product, and wish you all the very best for its future.” – Karla

story:
Introducing to you the world's first home smart water filter.   

 

The Smart Faucet was created with our customers' health, wellness and convenience in-mind. Here are the features: 

 

 

Water has many digestive, health and weight-loss benefits. However, without properly filtered water, you are allowing natural toxins into your and your loved one's body. The Smart Faucet eliminates 99% of all contaminants.

 

Connects to the Tern Service app, with real-time water analysis for water consumption and  filter quality that is personalized for you and your family.  

 

 

With the flip-of-a-switch (literally) you can go between three different options: filtered, unfiltered regular and unfiltered spray water. Cleaning your dishes and grabbing a safe glass of water will never need a separate system again!


The simple design allows the faucet to attach effortlessly, to any sink, for easy access to safe and sustainable drinking water. 

 

The Tern App connects directly to your filter, and will send an automatic alert to us when a new filter is needed. In the next few days, you will receive a new filter; no calls, no in-store pickups, no hassle!

 


5% of our proceeds will go to at risk communities for safe water. Our first project will be to work with Flint, Michigan. 

 

 

 

A simple four step process

 

 
 

The app will monitor filter status, real time water usage and record water quality. By syncing the filter to the app, Tern will be alerted, automatically, when your smart faucet needs a new filter.  

The app has the following functionality: 

 


 

 

Know Your Water is an on-demand tap water test. Here at Tern, we test for pH, total dissolved solids, lead, chromium-6, chlorine, fluoride, and total hardness, for every Know Your Water kit.

 


A quick comparison to other alternatives used in the market. 

 

 

Water bottles are an easy source of water, BUT at what cost? Plastic bottles have detrimental effects on the environment and your wallet.  

CLEAN THE OCEANS By 2050, it is estimated that the amount of plastic in the oceans will be greater in weight, than fish. Smart Faucet benefit: eliminate your plastic use by 624 bottles Annually; help save the animals and the oceans, from plastic waste.

 

REDUCE OIL DEPENDENCE Eliminating the use of 2496 fl oz. of oil used, every year. This equates to about 2/3 a barrel of oil, being used every year. Oil is widely known for its harmful effects on global climate change. Smart Faucet benefit: you are reducing fossil fuel emission, harmful waste created by oil, and global climate effects.

 

REDUCE CO2 EMISSION Therefore, for a family of 4, there are 1872 oz. of CO2 emitted every year. Smart Faucet benefits: by eliminating plastic bottle use, you and your family are doing your part to reduce global warming. 

 

SAVE MONEY Smart Faucet benefits: the smart faucet is a one time cost, that you and your family will enjoy from then on. Water should not cost you and your family more than $1,600 a year! By using the smart faucet, your family will save more than $16,000 over the next 10 years.

 

SAVE WATER That means, that 29,952 fl oz. of water utilized every year (about 7.41 barrels), just to make the water bottles for a family of 4. This does not include the 9,984 fl oz. of water consumed, by a family of 4 every year. All together a plastic bottle requires the use of 39,936 fl oz. of water, each year. Smart Faucet benefits: easy access to safe and sustainable water, thus reducing water usage by the barrel. 

1 plastic bottle = 16 fl oz.
1 barrel = 4032 fl oz.
1 plastic bottle costs about $2.63.

 

Our Mission and Vision

So, where did Tern all begin? After years of studying, traveling and working around the world, the founder and CEO of Tern, Mo Zerban, noticed a universal problem: Not everyone has easy access to safe and sustainable water.

Thus, Tern was born, with one mission; empower people to obtain the best water possible, by providing them with the information and tools needed to ensure they have sustainable and safe water, wherever and whenever they would like. 

Our Vision was to develop an impactful product that would innovate the water experience, with an integrated technology component. The Tern Smart Faucet is the first product that delivers on our mission to ensure safe, sustainable water for all. Creating products and services with the user at the center of the experience is our top criteria for product development.  Based on continuous user research and demos, we have created the Smart Faucet through a series of prototypes.


Here at Tern our glass is always half full. Our team is full of different personalities, ideas and skills, with one unifying goal: create safe and sustainable water for all. 

 


What are people saying about water?

 

What are people saying about us?

The simplicity of our design proves to be an easy way to retrieve in-depth water analysis, that makes the invisibility of water contamination visible, as well as function as a safe and sustainable water filtration system. Our mission has not gone unnoticed, recently garnering praise:

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Stefan Antonov and I am a business journalist non professional rugby player from Bulgaria.

  • With this campaign I am trying to complete the process of patenting my invention. It is a training machine that helps rugby and American football players to practice tackles in safe and realistic environment. 
  • So far all tackling drills put the players before a dilemma whether to seek realism or safety. My machine will elevate the combination of safety and realism in practicing tackles to unseen before levels. 
  • It will allow players to strive for their highest speed and strength in performing the tackle but they will exercise on a moving dummy instead on a real person.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • I need the funding to protect my intellectual property rights on the markets I am targeting - EU, USA, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Argentina and Canada. 
  • During this campaign I will offer perks related to my invention and sophisticated items which are made of quality materials.
  • If the targeted funding is not completely achieved I will have to prioritize the countries/markets on which I will seek a patent.  

The Impact

 

  • Missed tackles are a global phenomenon that occurs more and more often in modern rugby. Statisticians have proven that teams who miss less tackles have higher chances to win their games. And this exactly is what my machine will help the players and their teams. 
  • The very Idea for this machine came to my mind when I missed three tackles in one game. 
  • It took me years to clarify the idea, to launch the process of protecting my intellectual property and to build a conceptual prototype.

Risks & Challenges

Bulgaria is not a traditional rugby country and here is a little understanding among suppliers when I am purchasing materials. Access to proper technologies is also a challenge but it can be overcame. 

  • I am keen for talks with potential investors who wish to take a part in the development of the product. They will have the chance to facilitate the proper environment for the development and serial production of the tackle machine while at the same time have a share of the potential profits. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Have you ever felt the frustration of missing  tackle? Have you ever been disappointed by a favorite player missing a tackle? If the answer is yes, then you know how crucial is the availability of proper training equipment. 

Therefore, you can help not only by contributing to my campaign but also by letting the world know that a great solution is on the horizon.  

This way, you too will be proud to say that you have contributed to the development of this fantastic machine once it becomes a hit.

story:
Summary

The main goal of the North American Fitness and Health team is to prevent obesity and keep participants active. 

Have you ever tried to meet fitness goals and it was just not fun? We can help keep workouts fun with the Fit Zoo Crew Game. Fit Zoo Crew characters show participants how to perform each exercise. The team is designing functional workouts that are sports specific. Our workouts can teach participants skills, improve performance and keep them active. We're trying to get games into as many educational programs, youth sports leagues and as many families as possible.

NAFH is a nonprofit organization. Many participants lack access to knowledge of healthy lifestyles. We can help them learn to live healthier lifestyles with the Fit Zoo Crew.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $100,000 to get as many decks of playing cards as possible to programs and families. 

Many families who could benefit lack funding to obtain well balanced workouts. We're a nonprofit. You donation can reach a large number of participants and help them avoid weight related health issues.

The Fit Zoo Crew playing cards will be 100% plastic and sports specific decks will be included. The 9 new decks of playing cards will be: football, baseball, basketball, soccer, cheer, volleyball, functional exercises for seniors, military fitness, and water exercises. We'll also create the original Fit Zoo Crew workout deck emphasizing body weight exercises.

For every $50 you contribute, we'll send you a deck of cards. For example, contribute $150 and select 3 decks of cards. Contribute $400 and select a complete set of 10 decks or mix and match 10 decks as you like.  

You'll also have the first chance to test NAFH mobile apps if you make a donation of at least $20.

The Impact

You'll feel great about impacting the lives of people who may not lead healthy lifestyles. Many of the children who have participated in the Fit Zoo Crew game are able to get parents and siblings involved in fun workouts. You'll help to prevent Type 2 diabetes, and its associated diseases, in participants.

The North American and Fitness team includes, personal trainers, strength coaches and educators. We're trying to reach as many people, including those lower income participants, who may benefit by using our game. 

The Risks and Challenges

If we do not reach our goal of $100.000, we will produce as many decks of cards as possible with the contributions. Since fewer decks of cards would be ordered, the price will increase for each deck. NAFH would have to decrease the number of decks produced or decrease the types of decks produced. If we do not reach our goal, fewer people would receive the benefits provided by exercise including: improved performance, help with weight management, improved self esteem and overall mental health, decrease in blood pressure, improved cardiovascular health, learning to cooperate with others in a fun environment and learning to live a healthier lifestyle.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't make a donation, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out, on social media and in person, and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for your time and contribution!

story:
With RUFUS these problems are history. It drives in front of you at your optimal pace. This pace is adjusted dynamically in response to your heart rate. For example, if your heart rate increases because you are running up a steep slope, RUFUS will reduce its speed until your heart rate settles back into your target range.  Conversely, when your heart rate drops below your target rate, RUFUS will increase its speed accordingly. The best training effect can be achieved with a custom-made training plan, in which strain and relief alternate in a balanced way and training stimuli are set without overstraining the body permanently.

 

 

 

Heart rate monitors, running computers and training apps have a serious disadvantage in training control and support of the natural running rhythm. These devices only give indirect feedback. They may warn you with different signals when you are running too fast or your heart rate is too high, but they are unable to help you set a healthy pace. Warnings alone are insufficient in preventing errors while training. This was found in a study by the Sports University of Cologne, where only 32% of all runners reported an improvement in their performance. RUFUS sets its pace in response to your target heart rate and makes training not only more efficient and safer, but also more enjoyable!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Read the German article "Fitness-Tracker waren gestern. Heute ist RUFUS!"

https://www.running-magazin.com/training/lauftraining-mit-rufus/

 

RUFUS works similar to a treadmill with a heart rate monitor, but it allows you the freedom of running outside. It works by driving ahead of you, setting your pace, and showing you your optimal speed.
While you are running it continuously measures your heart rate and transmits the measured value to its on-board computer. There the measurement is analyzed and translated into an immediate feedback by adjusting your pace accordingly.

The ideal value (target value) is determined by a physiotherapist or a professional trainer and is encoded in your training plan. If your own heart rate deviates from the target value, RUFUS increases or decreases its speed. This achieves an optimal training effect and avoids overstraining.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Watch the German video "Diese Fitness-Trends für 2018 sollten Sie nicht verpassen​"

https://www.welt.de/sport/video173070225/ISPO-2018-Diese-Fitness-Trends-fuer-2018-sollten-Sie-nicht-verpassen.html​

 

RUFUS can be easily controlled with a mobile app. There you will find two control options: In the manual control mode you can manually enter set points for speed or heart rate. In the program control mode you can execute a complete workout which is part of a pre-programmed training plan. A control panel will pop up when you touch the screen and allows you to start or stop RUFUS and increase or decrease the set points. During your running workout the app plots your measured heart rate and speed.

 

RUFUS does not need to be constantly controlled. Thanks to its rigid axle, it drives straight in front of you. Hands and arms remain free for the natural movement in the running rhythm. You only have to intervene when you wish to change direction or stop.

How to steer
RUFUS' heading can be set by a remote control. With this controller you are able to adjust RUFUS' speed and direction.

How to stop
There are three ways to stop RUFUS:

  1. Firmly grasp the handlebars: The contact sensors in the hand grip will deactivate the motors and RUFUS comes to a complete stop. You can then push or pull the device like a shopping cart.
  2. Pull the safety tether: The safety tether is connected to an emergency stop mechanism. When triggered this brings RUFUS to an immediate stop.
  3. Press the stop button on the remote control: This will also trigger RUFUS to a full and complete stop.

 

 

 

RUFUS is a self-controlled electric vehicle for professional outdoor running workouts. It consists of a vehicle frame and a steering column, which can be adjusted easily and folded after using the quick release fastener.  When folded RUFUS fits into the trunk of almost any car. The device has a rigid front wheel (also removable using a quick release fastener) and two rear wheels which are independently driven by two electric motors (24V, 120 W). Due to its rigid axle, RUFUS will move straight until an obstacle blocks its path or forces off course. RUFUS is steered by operating the two drive motors at different speeds. If the right wheel turns faster than the left one, RUFUS turns to the left, if the left wheel turns faster, RUFUS turns to the right.

 

  • Running gear: three wheel kinematics with 2 differentially driven rear wheels
  • Maximum velocity (with 12“ wheels): 18 km/h
  • Weight: 18 kg
  • Drive: 2 x 24 V, 120 W brushed DC motors
  • Power supply: 24 V lithium-ion battery (10.4 Ah, 13 Ah or 17.5 Ah) + charging device
  • Runtime in flat terrain: 6 – 8 hours
  • User interface: control via built-in touch panel (tablet)
  • Bio sensors: heart rate monitor (Bluetooth; ANT+)
  • Safety: safety tether between runner and device (leads to an emergency stop if unplugged)
  • Navigation sensors: GPS, wheel encoder, inertial measurement unit
  • Handling:
    - Foldable steering column
    - Wheels easily changeable
    - Removable battery

 

 

Read the German article "Bruckner testet Rufus – Lauf Roboter, lauf!​"

https://wiener-online.at/2018/05/17/bruckner-testet-rufus-lauf-roboter-lauf/​

 

RUFUS has two operating modes: manual and program control. The mode suggested for an effective training is "program control". The speed or heart rate set points come from a program that controls your entire running workout, such as interval training or a pyramid run. You merely have to make sure that RUFUS remains on track and does not collide with an obstacle, RUFUS does the rest. A running workout is usually part of a training plan, which consists of a whole series of workouts. 

 

 

 

 

The device will be available in two versions at market launch: RUFUS Basic and RUFUS Pro. The Basic version contains all functions needed for professional running workouts. The Pro version targets professional running coaches and physiotherapists who will use RUFUS as a coach assistant.

 

The conception of a robotic running coach began over 10 years ago. Erwin Prassler, roboticist and hobby triathlete, regularly took his daughters out for a run in their baby jogger. They had their fun, as he struggled up the hills and hardly kept pace with the stroller when running back down. He was one of many who pushed themselves too hard and ran too fast. Although he knew better, and was repeatedly warned by his triathlon coach, he continued running as fast as he could, pushing himself harder and harder, with disregard for self imposed limits.
“When jogging you have plenty of time to contemplate, in particular if you stare at the rear axle of a stroller” he says. “I was tired of the incessant beeping of my heart rate monitor telling me that my heart rate was way too high.” It could not be that difficult to equip a stroller with a few electric motors and propel it just as fast as to prevent his heart rate from going through the roof. He continued running too fast without benefiting from his exercises for a few more years – later without the kids and the stroller, but with all kinds of fitness trackers instead – until eventually he had enough.
He fetched the dusty stroller from the basement and took action with some colleagues. They converted the stroller into what would become the world's first prototype of a robot running coach. Six generations of prototypes later and RUFUS finally reached series-production readiness. And as fate would have it, one of the very daughters that inspired RUFUS has become an avid runner herself.  She frequently trains with RUFUS ensuring her a healthier and more effective workout.

 

We plan to deliver the first devices in time for the marathon season in fall 2019. All orders will be delivered, regardless of the achieved target percentage.

 

The revenues from the campaign will be used for financing the following activities:

  • Purchase of material for the first two batches
  • Developing tools for manufacturing
  • Production of the first two batches
  • Certification related activities e.g. EMC test
  • Marketing campaign

 

 

 

 

 

Interview with co-founder and inventor Dr. Erwin Prassler

 

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ (scroll to top or bottom) or contact us directly via support@runfun.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Bei einem Lauftraining mit RUFUS kann das nicht passieren. RUFUS fährt mit einer Geschwindigkeit vor Dir her, die Deiner optimalen Trainingsbelastung entspricht. Steigt Dein Puls an einem Berg über den eingestellten Sollwert, dann verringert RUFUS seine Geschwindigkeit bis sich Dein Puls wieder im Sollbereich eingependelt hat. Sinkt umgekehrt die Belastung und der Puls bei einem Lauf bergab, dann erhöht RUFUS seine Geschwindigkeit dementsprechend. Den besten Trainingseffekt erreicht man mit einem maßgeschneiderten Trainingsplan, in dem sich Belastung und Entlastung ausgewogen abwechseln und gezielt Trainingsreize gesetzt werden, ohne den Körper dauerhaft zu überlasten. 

 

 

 

Pulsuhren, Laufcomputer und Trainings- Apps haben einen gravierenden Nachteil bei der Trainingssteuerung und Unterstützung des natürlichen Laufrhythmus: Sie geben nur ein indirektes Feedback. Sie warnen Dich zwar durch verschiedene Signale bei zu hoher Geschwindigkeit oder zu hohem Puls aber sie zeigen Dir nicht die richtige Geschwindigkeit. Die reine Alarmfunktion reicht zur Vermeidung von fortlaufenden Trainingsfehlern nicht aus. Das zeigt eine Studie der Sporthochschule Köln, in der nur 32% aller Läufer eine Verbesserung ihrer Leistung feststellten.
RUFUS gibt Dir ein Lauftempo vor, welches Deinem optimalen Puls entspricht und macht das Training so nicht nur effektiver und gesünder, er erhöht auch den Spaß am Laufen.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Hier findest du den Artikel "Fitness-Tracker waren gestern. Heute ist RUFUS!"​

https://www.running-magazin.com/training/lauftraining-mit-rufus/

 

RUFUS funktioniert ähnlich wie ein Laufband mit Pulssteuerung für Draußen. Nur steht er nicht fest an einem Platz, sondern fährt als Tempomacher vor Dir her und gibt Dir dadurch die optimale Geschwindigkeit direkt vor.
Maßgeblich für die optimale Laufgeschwindigkeit ist Deine Herzfrequenz. Sie wird während des Laufens fortwährend über einen Pulsmesser ermittelt und per Funk an den Bordcomputer von RUFUS übertragen. Dort wird der Istwert mit dem Sollwert verglichen und die Geschwindigkeit je nach Differenz angepasst.

Der ideale Wert (Sollwert) wird von einem Physiotherapeuten oder einem professionellen Trainer bestimmt und im Trainingsplan festgelegt. Weicht der eigene Puls vom Sollpuls ab, erhöht oder verringert RUFUS seine Geschwindigkeit. Dadurch wird ein optimaler Trainingseffekt erzielt und eine Überanstrengung vermieden.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Hier findest Du das Video "Diese Fitness-Trends für 2018 sollten Sie nicht verpassen​"

https://www.welt.de/sport/video173070225/ISPO-2018-Diese-Fitness-Trends-fuer-2018-sollten-Sie-nicht-verpassen.html

 

Bedient wird RUFUS einfach über eine App. Es gibt zwei Optionen:
Die manuelle Steuerung mit Sollwerten, die per Hand eingegeben werden, oder die Programmsteuerung mit vorprogrammierten Trainingsplänen und Trainingseinheiten. Über das Control Panel, das erscheint, wenn Du den Bildschirm berührst, kannst Du RUFUS starten, anhalten oder Deine Sollwerte erhöhen oder verringern. Während des Laufens kannst Du Dir den Verlauf Deiner Herzfrequenz und Geschwindigkeit oder Deine bereits gelaufene Route anzeigen lassen.

 

RUFUS muss nicht dauerhaft gelenkt werden. Er fährt dank seiner starren Achse geradeaus vor Dir her. Hände und Arme bleiben frei für die natürliche Bewegung im Laufrhythmus. Nur für Richtungsänderungen und Stopps muss Du eingreifen.

So wird gelenkt
Die Fahrtrichtung von RUFUS wird mithilfe einer Fernbedienung kontrolliert. Du kannst nach links oder rechts lenken und die Geschwindigkeit erhöhen oder reduzieren.

So hält RUFUS an
Es gibt drei Möglichkeiten:

  1. Die Handgriffe sind mit Kontaktsensoren ausgestattet. Ein fester Griff genügt, um das Gerät anzuhalten.
  2. Durch Ziehen der Sicherheitsleine bleibt Dein Lauftrainer sofort auf der Stelle stehen.
  3. Ein Druck auf den Stopp-Knopf der Fernbedienung bringt RUFUS ebenfalls schnellstmöglich zum Stehen.

 

 

 

 

RUFUS ist ein elektrisch angetriebenes und gesteuertes Fahrzeug für ein professionelles Lauftraining im Freien. Er besteht aus einem Fahrzeugrahmen und einer Lenksäule, die man über einen Schnellspannverschluss fixieren und einklappen kann. Zusammengeklappt passt RUFUS in fast jeden Kofferraum. Das Gerät hat ein starres Vorderrad, das ebenfalls mit einem Schnellspannverschluss befestigt ist, und zwei Hinterräder, die unabhängig voneinander von zwei Elektromotoren (24V, 120 W) angetrieben werden. Aufgrund seiner starren Achse fährt RUFUS normalerweise solange gerade aus, bis ein Hindernis seinen Weg versperrt oder ihn vom Weg abbringt. Gelenkt wird der Lauftrainer indem man die beiden Antriebsmotoren mit einer unterschiedlichen Drehgeschwindigkeit betreibt. Dreht sich während der Fahrt das rechte Rad schneller als das linke, dann fährt RUFUS eine Kurve nach links, dreht das linke Rad schneller, dann fährt er nach rechts.

 

  • Fahrgestell: Dreirad mit 2 differentiell angetriebenen Hinterrädern
  • Maximale Geschwindigkeit (bei 12“ Rädern): 18 km/h
  • Gewicht: 18 kg
  • Antrieb: 2 x 24 V Gleichstrommotoren mit je 120 W
  • Batterie: 24 V Lithium-Ionen Akku (10.4 Ah, 13 Ah, 16 Ah oder 17.5 Ah) + Ladegerät
  • Laufzeit in ebenem Gelände: 6 - 8 Stunden
  • Benutzerinterface: Steuerung per eingebautem Touchpanel (Tablet)
  • Biosensoren: Pulsmesser (Bluetooth; ANT+)
  • Sicherheit: Sicherungsleine zwischen Läufer und Gerät (führt zu Notstopp falls unterbrochen)
  • Navigationssensoren: GPS, Rad-Encoder, Inertialsensor
  • Handhabung:​
    - klappbare Lenksäule
    - Räder sind leicht zu wechseln
    - ​Batterie kann herausgelöst und separat aufgeladen werden

 

 

Hier findest Du den Artikel "Bruckner testet Rufus – Lauf Roboter, lauf!​"

https://wiener-online.at/2018/05/17/bruckner-testet-rufus-lauf-roboter-lauf/

 

RUFUS hat zwei Betriebsarten: manuell und programmgesteuert. Die für das Training effektivere Betriebsart ist die „Programmsteuerung“. Dabei kommen die Geschwindigkeits- oder Pulsvorgaben von einem Programm, das eine ganze Trainingseinheit steuert, beispielsweise ein Intervalltraining oder einen Pyramidenlauf. Als Läufer musst Du lediglich darauf achten, dass ihr beide auf dem Laufweg bleibt und nicht mit einem Hindernis kollidiert. Den Rest erledigt RUFUS. Eine Trainingseinheit gehört in der Regel zu einem Trainingsplan, der aus einem ganzen Paket von Trainingseinheiten besteht.

 

 

 

 

RUFUS wird in zwei Versionen auf den Markt kommen: RUFUS Basic und RUFUS Pro. Die Basic-Variante ist eine vollwertige Grundversion für jeden Typ von Läufer. Die Pro-Variante richtet sich an professionelle Lauftrainer und Physiotherapeuten. 

 

Die Idee eines Roboterlauftrainers entstand schon vor über 10 Jahren beim Joggen. Erwin Prassler, Roboterentwickler und Hobbytriathlet, nahm seine damals noch kleinen Töchter im Babyjogger regelmäßig mit zum Joggen. Die hatten ihren Spaß, wenn er sich ächzend die Hügel hochkämpfte und fanden es lustig, wenn er bergab dem Kinderwagen kaum hinterher kam. Er gehörte zu den vielen, die sich beim Laufen sehr schnell überanstrengen. Obwohl er es besser wusste und es von seinem Lauftrainer im Triathlon-Verein oft genug gesagt bekam, lief er einfach weiter was die Laufschuhe hergaben – viel zu schnell.
„Beim Joggen hat man ja viel Zeit zum nachdenken, vor allem wenn man auf die Hinterachse eines Kinderwagens starrt“ sagt er heute. „Irgendwann war ich das dauernde Piepen meiner Pulsuhr leid, die mir nur mitteilte, dass ich wieder mal zu schnell und mit zu hohem Puls unterwegs war“. Es konnte doch nicht so schwer sein, diesen Kinderwagen mit ein paar Elektromotoren genau so schnell zu bewegen, dass sein Puls nicht permanent durch die Decke ging. Er lief noch ein paar Jahre länger viel zu schnell, als dass es ihm wirklich genützt hätte. Später auch ohne Töchter und Kinderwagen, dafür aber mit allen möglichen Fitnesstrackern – bis er endgültig genug hatte vom falschen Trainieren mit zu hoher Geschwindigkeit.
Er holte den verstaubten Kinderwagen aus dem Keller und schritt mit ein paar Kollegen und Mitarbeitern zur Tat: aus dem umgebauten Kinderwagen entstand der weltweit erste Prototyp eines Roboter-Lauftrainer. Fünf weitere Generationen von Prototypen waren notwendig, bis RUFUS schließlich seine Serienreife erreichte. Die ältere Tochter ist mittlerweile selbst begeisterte Läuferin und trainiert natürlich mit RUFUS.

 

Wir wollen die ersten Geräte rechtzeitig zur Marathon Saison im Herbst 2019 ausliefern. Alle Bestellungen werden ausgeliefert, unabhängig von den erreichten Ziel-Prozenten.

 

Die Einnahmen aus der Kampagne sollen zur Finanzierung folgender Aktivitäten verwendet werden:

  • Materialeinkauf für die ersten beiden Lose
  • Entwicklung und Herstellung der Werkzeuge für die Fertigung
  • Fertigung der ersten beiden Lose
  • Zertifizierungsmaßnahmen z.B. EMV Test
  • Marketingkampagne

 

 

 

 

 

Interview mit dem Gründer und Erfinder Dr. Erwin Prassler​

 

Videobeitrag ISPO 2018 von "SPORTBLOG.cc"​

 

Du suchst noch mehr Informationen oder hast eine Frage? Gehe zu den FAQs oder kontaktiere uns direkt über support@runfun.com
story_txt:
With RUFUS these problems are history. It drives in front of you at your optimal pace. This pace is adjusted dynamically in response to your heart rate. For example, if your heart rate increases because you are running up a steep slope, RUFUS will reduce its speed until your heart rate settles back into your target range.  Conversely, when your heart rate drops below your target rate, RUFUS will increase its speed accordingly. The best training effect can be achieved with a custom-made training plan, in which strain and relief alternate in a balanced way and training stimuli are set without overstraining the body permanently.   Heart rate monitors, running computers and training apps have a serious disadvantage in training control and support of the natural running rhythm. These devices only give indirect feedback. They may warn you with different signals when you are running too fast or your heart rate is too high, but they are unable to help you set a healthy pace. Warnings alone are insufficient in preventing errors while training. This was found in a study by the Sports University of Cologne, where only 32% of all runners reported an improvement in their performance. RUFUS sets its pace in response to your target heart rate and makes training not only more efficient and safer, but also more enjoyable!      Read the German article "Fitness-Tracker waren gestern. Heute ist RUFUS!"https://www.running-magazin.com/training/lauftraining-mit-rufus/ RUFUS works similar to a treadmill with a heart rate monitor, but it allows you the freedom of running outside. It works by driving ahead of you, setting your pace, and showing you your optimal speed.While you are running it continuously measures your heart rate and transmits the measured value to its on-board computer. There the measurement is analyzed and translated into an immediate feedback by adjusting your pace accordingly.The ideal value (target value) is determined by a physiotherapist or a professional trainer and is encoded in your training plan. If your own heart rate deviates from the target value, RUFUS increases or decreases its speed. This achieves an optimal training effect and avoids overstraining.      Watch the German video "Diese Fitness-Trends für 2018 sollten Sie nicht verpassen​"https://www.welt.de/sport/video173070225/ISPO-2018-Diese-Fitness-Trends-fuer-2018-sollten-Sie-nicht-verpassen.html​ RUFUS can be easily controlled with a mobile app. There you will find two control options: In the manual control mode you can manually enter set points for speed or heart rate. In the program control mode you can execute a complete workout which is part of a pre-programmed training plan. A control panel will pop up when you touch the screen and allows you to start or stop RUFUS and increase or decrease the set points. During your running workout the app plots your measured heart rate and speed. RUFUS does not need to be constantly controlled. Thanks to its rigid axle, it drives straight in front of you. Hands and arms remain free for the natural movement in the running rhythm. You only have to intervene when you wish to change direction or stop.How to steerRUFUS' heading can be set by a remote control. With this controller you are able to adjust RUFUS' speed and direction.How to stopThere are three ways to stop RUFUS:
Firmly grasp the handlebars: The contact sensors in the hand grip will deactivate the motors and RUFUS comes to a complete stop. You can then push or pull the device like a shopping cart.
Pull the safety tether: The safety tether is connected to an emergency stop mechanism. When triggered this brings RUFUS to an immediate stop.
Press the stop button on the remote control: This will also trigger RUFUS to a full and complete stop.
   RUFUS is a self-controlled electric vehicle for professional outdoor running workouts. It consists of a vehicle frame and a steering column, which can be adjusted easily and folded after using the quick release fastener.  When folded RUFUS fits into the trunk of almost any car. The device has a rigid front wheel (also removable using a quick release fastener) and two rear wheels which are independently driven by two electric motors (24V, 120 W). Due to its rigid axle, RUFUS will move straight until an obstacle blocks its path or forces off course. RUFUS is steered by operating the two drive motors at different speeds. If the right wheel turns faster than the left one, RUFUS turns to the left, if the left wheel turns faster, RUFUS turns to the right. 

Running gear: three wheel kinematics with 2 differentially driven rear wheels

Maximum velocity (with 12“ wheels): 18 km/h

Weight: 18 kg

Drive: 2 x 24 V, 120 W brushed DC motors

Power supply: 24 V lithium-ion battery (10.4 Ah, 13 Ah or 17.5 Ah) + charging device

Runtime in flat terrain: 6 – 8 hours

User interface: control via built-in touch panel (tablet)

Bio sensors: heart rate monitor (Bluetooth; ANT+)

Safety: safety tether between runner and device (leads to an emergency stop if unplugged)

Navigation sensors: GPS, wheel encoder, inertial measurement unit

Handling:- Foldable steering column- Wheels easily changeable- Removable battery

  Hier findest Du den Artikel "Bruckner testet Rufus – Lauf Roboter, lauf!​"https://wiener-online.at/2018/05/17/bruckner-testet-rufus-lauf-roboter-lauf/ RUFUS hat zwei Betriebsarten: manuell und programmgesteuert. Die für das Training effektivere Betriebsart ist die „Programmsteuerung“. Dabei kommen die Geschwindigkeits- oder Pulsvorgaben von einem Programm, das eine ganze Trainingseinheit steuert, beispielsweise ein Intervalltraining oder einen Pyramidenlauf. Als Läufer musst Du lediglich darauf achten, dass ihr beide auf dem Laufweg bleibt und nicht mit einem Hindernis kollidiert. Den Rest erledigt RUFUS. Eine Trainingseinheit gehört in der Regel zu einem Trainingsplan, der aus einem ganzen Paket von Trainingseinheiten besteht.    RUFUS wird in zwei Versionen auf den Markt kommen: RUFUS Basic und RUFUS Pro. Die Basic-Variante ist eine vollwertige Grundversion für jeden Typ von Läufer. Die Pro-Variante richtet sich an professionelle Lauftrainer und Physiotherapeuten.  Die Idee eines Roboterlauftrainers entstand schon vor über 10 Jahren beim Joggen. Erwin Prassler, Roboterentwickler und Hobbytriathlet, nahm seine damals noch kleinen Töchter im Babyjogger regelmäßig mit zum Joggen. Die hatten ihren Spaß, wenn er sich ächzend die Hügel hochkämpfte und fanden es lustig, wenn er bergab dem Kinderwagen kaum hinterher kam. Er gehörte zu den vielen, die sich beim Laufen sehr schnell überanstrengen. Obwohl er es besser wusste und es von seinem Lauftrainer im Triathlon-Verein oft genug gesagt bekam, lief er einfach weiter was die Laufschuhe hergaben – viel zu schnell.„Beim Joggen hat man ja viel Zeit zum nachdenken, vor allem wenn man auf die Hinterachse eines Kinderwagens starrt“ sagt er heute. „Irgendwann war ich das dauernde Piepen meiner Pulsuhr leid, die mir nur mitteilte, dass ich wieder mal zu schnell und mit zu hohem Puls unterwegs war“. Es konnte doch nicht so schwer sein, diesen Kinderwagen mit ein paar Elektromotoren genau so schnell zu bewegen, dass sein Puls nicht permanent durch die Decke ging. Er lief noch ein paar Jahre länger viel zu schnell, als dass es ihm wirklich genützt hätte. Später auch ohne Töchter und Kinderwagen, dafür aber mit allen möglichen Fitnesstrackern – bis er endgültig genug hatte vom falschen Trainieren mit zu hoher Geschwindigkeit.Er holte den verstaubten Kinderwagen aus dem Keller und schritt mit ein paar Kollegen und Mitarbeitern zur Tat: aus dem umgebauten Kinderwagen entstand der weltweit erste Prototyp eines Roboter-Lauftrainer. Fünf weitere Generationen von Prototypen waren notwendig, bis RUFUS schließlich seine Serienreife erreichte. Die ältere Tochter ist mittlerweile selbst begeisterte Läuferin und trainiert natürlich mit RUFUS. Wir wollen die ersten Geräte rechtzeitig zur Marathon Saison im Herbst 2019 ausliefern. Alle Bestellungen werden ausgeliefert, unabhängig von den erreichten Ziel-Prozenten. Die Einnahmen aus der Kampagne sollen zur Finanzierung folgender Aktivitäten verwendet werden:
Materialeinkauf für die ersten beiden Lose
Entwicklung und Herstellung der Werkzeuge für die Fertigung
Fertigung der ersten beiden Lose
Zertifizierungsmaßnahmen z.B. EMV Test
Marketingkampagne
     Interview mit dem Gründer und Erfinder Dr. Erwin Prassler​

 
Videobeitrag ISPO 2018 von "SPORTBLOG.cc"​


 


Du suchst noch mehr Informationen oder hast eine Frage? Gehe zu den FAQs oder kontaktiere uns direkt über support@runfun.com

story:
The Basics

Hello!

Although there are already an avalanche of mask products in the market, or in development, I am working to manufacture the first actual mass-market TRANSPARENT face mask.  This is not only for Coronavirus.....there are a whole bunch of other industries that will want this product. From airline companies, to fast food restaurants, postal workers, and many others. The demand for bulk orders of these masks will be significant.

I have a patent pending for this particular design. There are a multitude of variants of the mask that can be marketed in further development.

Competitor products are being announced daily at this point, but there are several elements of this design that are unique.  The most important is that the air vents are anti-microbial in BOTH directions, for inhaling AND exhaling.  It's a porous plastic sheet that's treated with a spray-on microbe killer that kills everything down to 2 microns (including Coronavirus).  But a flexible, soft plastic mask that's good for hundreds of uses, can be cleaned, filters replaceable, and CLEAR so you can see smiles and emotions, it's an important step forward in the world we are living in.

Funding and gifts

I am seeking $250,000 in funding to bring the first full manufacture product to the market.  The vast majority of the process is already in place. All the technical issues and component parts have been designed, and a full 3D model ready for manufacture.  We have been through 4 prototype and design rounds, and a final prototype is in fabrication as you read this.  

There are gifts that will go with each different level of funding. Any investments over $10,000 will be given ownership positions in Convertible Debenture Preferred "A" options.  Under $10,000, you will receive masks when they are in production, based on your contribution level.  Please contact me for more details.

Elements

The material is cleanable with simple rubbing alcohol.  There is an anti-fog coating on the inside of the mask that can withstand at least 50 cleanings. There are anti-microbial filters that are good for up to 30 cleanings, and are easily replaceable.  The assembly of various parts is currently US Patent Pending

Risks & Challenges

Challenges in this project are mostly the timeline.  "First to market" advantage is huge, but if the design isn't right, customers won't come back.  I am currently refining the design, but all the components are in place, and supply chain is fixed (ALL manufactured and produced in the USA!!) Another risk is that others will beat us to market with a more directly competitive product.  I am also concerned that we may need more time than planned to get the final product into full production and fulfillment after the mold has been cast.

story:
Join today to shop our ever expanding range of affordable and healthy household products – including our entire line of healthy, organic food. 


Save money every time you shop for household and pantry essentials. We launch new products every month, giving you more opportunities to save on the items you use most. As a member of Public Goods, you'll get everything you need for your home, fridge, pantry, and bathroom at well under retail prices. 


Our mission is simple: make healthy, eco-friendly products affordable to everyone. We  wanted to take the burden off your budget and the Earth so we launched our own brand, without the high prices, tacky packaging, and unhealthy ingredients often found on supermarket shelves.

 

 

Savings aside, what matters most is the quality of our goods. Our brand began with obsessively formulated personal care products, vetted by the most discerning people we know. We visited over 100 skincare labs and consulted with experts and the most reputable chemists. As our product offering expands into healthy food we’re keeping the same meticulous quality standards, working with industry experts, farmers and local producers to bring you the tastiest culinary delights. We consistently offer high-quality, healthy products, cleverly designed and cleanly packaged.
 

In our line of premium natural products you’ll find: 

  • shampoo 
  • hand soap
  • bar soap
  • conditioner
  • moisturizer
  • body wash
  • shaving cream
  • razors
  • deodorant
  • tree-free paper products including: toilet, paper towels, and facial tissue
  • sunscreen
  • menstrual care
  • natural home cleaners
  • essential oils
  • compostable garbage bags
  • coffee & tea
  • oil & vinegar
  • premium Italian essentials, including pastas, pesto and tomato sauce 
  • nuts
  • soups 
  • canned tomatoes
  • tortilla chips & salsa
  • popcorn, applesauce and healthy snacks
  • honey, maple syrup and jams
  • pink rock salt & black pepper
  • ketchup, mustard, mayonnaise
  • vitamins and supplements
  • protein and snack bars…

And much more. We're adding new products every month, and all of them are healthy, cruelty free, and offered at the lowest cost possible. To see our current range of available products, visit publicgoods.com

As a thank you to our early supporters, we're offering an amazing deal. During this campaign, you'll be able to get a lifetime membership, giving you access to shop Public Goods for (you guessed it) life.  After this campaign, you will choose from a monthly or annual fee. Here's an example of savings.

 

 

PUBLIC GOODS is a brand that cares. It cares for its mission, its product, and its people. We’ve grown since our last campaign. Now the Public Goods team is headquartered in New York City. 

Our company was co-founded by Morgan Hirsh and Michael Ferchak. Morgan studied philosophy at Concordia, and worked in luxury fashion manufacturing before founding Public Goods. With an aesthetic eye and nose for quality, he’s an expert product developer who’s grounded in the nitty gritty of manufacturing. He’s also an avid tennis player and an amateur magician.

Michael, our COO, studied engineering and Chinese at Dartmouth. Living abroad for over a decade, he became a specialist in product packaging. From sourcing to manufacturing to product testing, he’s done it all.

With their extensive experience in producing premium goods, both Morgan and Michael grasped the inherent inefficiencies in the traditional supply chain and decided to fix it.

--

Join us today – become a member of Public Goods –  and enjoy the best natural products out there at the best possible cost. We can’t wait to have you on board!

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $250MM through crowdfunding.

___________________________________________

Frequently Asked Questions


Will the lifetime membership really last forever?
Yes, that’s right. You’ll access all our products at the Public Goods member price for life.  Everyone else will pay a monthly or annual membership like Costco.

What is the difference between getting a membership on Indiegogo or doing it through your website?
Everything else after this Indiegogo will be monthly or yearly memberships.

When will I be able to start using my membership to get healthy products from Public Goods?
You will receive an email to activate the membership 48-72 hours after the contribution is placed.

Is Public Goods a subscription box service? Will I get a box with your products every month?
Nope! You can shop on our site publicgoods.com and choose the items you would like, whenever you want.

How does shipping work?
Contiguous US shipping is free for orders over $45. For international orders, the shipping cost will depend on your location and the size of the package.

Exactly which ingredients are in each product?
Check publicgoods.com to check the ingredients of each product.

Where are the products made?
Our bar soap is made in Tennessee. Our toothpaste in Utah. Our liquids and soap in New Jersey. And our bamboo toothbrushes are made in China where bamboo grows. Our tree-free toilet paper also. Check publicgoods.com to check the origin of each product.

How much do your products cost members? Do you have a full price list?
Yes! Check publicgoods.com to see all our products and prices. 

Do you test products on animals?
No, we never do. All of our products are 100% cruelty-free.

story:
Comper ThermArt - A Smart Ear and Forehead Thermometer

We designed this ear and forehead thermometer based on the standard of the world’s loveliest medical instrument. That’s not only for taking body temperature when sick, but also for inspiring people on a healthy lifestyle that we often look at one of our vital signs – the core body temperature.

Really lovely

It doesn’t look like a typical medical instrument that always implies the infirmity, but one of that you loved in your fancy life.

Really fast and accurate

Get reading close to the core body temperature in less than one second, that raised the bar to a new balance between fast and accuracy.

 

Really medical

Top sensor with biocompatible and RoHS-cleared materials from inside and external parts.

 

Really inspired

Get inspired by seeing how pills and your lifestyle impact on your body temperature.

Really creative

Your body temperature data is always allowed to be using by yourself to relieve you from the fuss and mess when you are not well.

 

Get extensive health benefits from body-temperature management

 

 

 

Overview your ThermArt

 How ThermArt comes true 

 

Comper Featured on 

Why it looks so lovely 

Tracking body temperature is becoming a health style that empowers people to have an insight into their health. A lovely design for a medical device could be truly inspirational than a traditional one which is looking always about the sick.

As tracking body temperature has become a healthy lifestyle, people can have an insight into their health. Comparing with the traditional medical device, the lovely design for ThermArt is more acceptable and inspirational.

 

Why it’s so qualified

The body of ThermArt is made of the medical-grade PC with IML(In-mould labeling) texture technique, which is biocompatible without any extra industrial process on the surface.

 

The forehead probe made of transparent silicon rubber meets the medical standard. It brings a real soft and biocompatible touch.  

 

 

 Why it brings so much pleasant measurement？ 

Get pleasant by its design to measure temperature as a  Friendly and lovely gesture.

Get pleasant by the perfect haptic feedback from the button.

Get pleasant by checking your body temperature on a fancy LED display.

 

Why it can be multi-choice?

A friendly forehead touch is for babies for a more comfortable and safe experience, or a more accurate ear probe is for other ages.

Tips: You may get different measurements on the forehead and in the ear, since the forehead is exposed under the external environment and affected by the environment temperature.

 Why it is safe for your baby? 

 

Why it has a fast read and high accuracy? 

ThermArt uses the top-of-the-line sensor from japan which is the fastest and most accurate technology so far in the world.

 

The hollow structure design for the forehead probe keeps the accuracy of the temperature measurement by avoiding the effect of the external environment.

The silicon rubber material can reduce the environmental error on the forehead due to its property of low thermal transmission.

 

The accuracy of measurements is based on the Comper algorithm by reaching close to the core body temperature that is a real vital sign of our health.

 

A truly insightful and useful App

Demonstrate to use ThermArt

 PLAY

Share your most creative ideas with us

Comper devotes to improving the public’s health with intelligent technology. Comper Health App can present you the insight of how your lifestyle does impact on your health. Share your ideas with us for the creative use of the App.

 

Demonstrate to use ThermArt

 

   How ThermArt Comes True 

 Du Han (Founder and CEO)

 

Du is a serial entrepreneur who has a passion for developing the digital healthcare industry. She graduated from the Capital University of Medical Science. With 12 years of experience in the medical industry, Du founded Comper Healthcare. She was previously chief agent of orthopedics consumables and heart stents at LEPU Medical, Co-Founder of Regent Capital and an investor in PING AN HEALTH. Du has been nominated for the Women in Investment Awards 2018 and Business Women’s Awards 2018.

 

Project's Team

Our Awards

 

 Follow us

Why crowdfund

So we decided to go again on indiegogo mainly to share exclusive rewards with indiegogo community, get a deep feedbacks about our product and especially raise funds to support the global expansion for Comper's products.

Risks & Challenges

We believe that any project or idea comes with its own set of risks and challenges. During the first stage, our challenge was to bring this device to life and we did it, We felt that the only risk involved was in shipping time and so, we worked extra hard to make sure that our backers received their devices as fast as possible.

Du has been nominated for the Women in Investment Awards 2018 and Business Women’s Awards 2018.
 
Project's Team

Our Awards

 
 Follow us




Why crowdfund
So we decided to go again on indiegogo mainly to share exclusive rewards with indiegogo community, get a deep feedbacks about our product and especially raise funds to support the global expansion for Comper's products.
Risks & Challenges
We believe that any project or idea comes with its own set of risks and challenges. During the first stage, our challenge was to bring this device to life and we did it, We felt that the only risk involved was in shipping time and so, we worked extra hard to make sure that our backers received their devices as fast as possible.

story:
This can stem from poor posture, a sports injury, commuting, computing and even the bed you sleep on. Our backs are constantly under stress and tension creating compromising positions which lead to back and spine ailments. That’s why I created the BackRac.

  

 

 

 

The BackRac is a multipurpose tool that promotes spine health through soft tissue massage and joint mobilization. It is unique from other myofascial products because it spreads the pressure over a large treatment area which drastically improves comfort.  

 

 

 

 

 

"When I was asked to help develop the BackRac, we wanted a product that was easy for the patient to use to do (these) treatments at home and independently… The BackRac is ideal for all classifications of low back pain, as it does not put the spine in a dangerous position (but) instead, you will maintain a neutral spine… It’s safe, affordable, and most importantly effective." - Dr. Aaron McGuinness

 

 

 The BackRac is a multipurpose tool that promotes spine health through soft tissue massage AND joint mobilization. It is unique from other myofascial products because it spreads the pressure over a large treatment area which drastically improves comfort. The BackRac is ideal for all classifications of low back pain because it does not put the back in a dangerous position but instead you will maintain a neutral spine while product provides an Anterior mobilization to up to 3 spinal segments at once. This makes it more comfortable than a myofascial ball, foam roller, or any other back relief product.
story_txt:
www.thorexback.com
 This can stem from poor posture, a sports injury, commuting, computing and even the bed you sleep on. Our backs are constantly under stress and tension creating compromising positions which lead to back and spine ailments. That’s why I created the BackRac.     The BackRac is a multipurpose tool that promotes spine health through soft tissue massage and joint mobilization. It is unique from other myofascial products because it spreads the pressure over a large treatment area which drastically improves comfort.    Kyle, workout enthusiast Jenica, workout enthusiast Chris, construction worker "When I was asked to help develop the BackRac, we wanted a product that was easy for the patient to use to do (these) treatments at home and independently… The BackRac is ideal for all classifications of low back pain, as it does not put the spine in a dangerous position (but) instead, you will maintain a neutral spine… It’s safe, affordable, and most importantly effective." - Dr. Aaron McGuinness   The BackRac is a multipurpose tool that promotes spine health through soft tissue massage AND joint mobilization. It is unique from other myofascial products because it spreads the pressure over a large treatment area which drastically improves comfort. The BackRac is ideal for all classifications of low back pain because it does not put the back in a dangerous position but instead you will maintain a neutral spine while product provides an Anterior mobilization to up to 3 spinal segments at once. This makes it more comfortable than a myofascial ball, foam roller, or any other back relief product.         Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!  Get Your Project Funded Today!

story:
ADVANCING MOLECULAR MEDICINE & CANCER RESEARCH

Dedicated to supporting education on early detection of metastatic cancers,

neurodegenerative diseases and promoting healthy lifestyles.

The ongoing mission of the Foundation for Molecular Medicine is to engage, inform, and inspire the Northwest Indiana Community to lead healthy lifestyles, take proactive measures to fight cancer, and get involved with the community to support those in need whom have been affected by cancer. Our organization will be the Northwest Indiana community’s resource for cancer-related financial support, academic support, educational seminars, and outreach programs.
OUR INITIATIVES
 At FFMM, one  of our primary objectives is to design and implement an intervention program in the Northwest Indiana Community that target specific groups which cancer research, indicating disparities between the demographic group and cancer incidences, mortalities, and early screenings.
THE VISION
The long term vision of the Foundation For Molecular Medicine is as inspired as it is critical to our region – To Create and Construct a Clinical Cancer and Research Center in Northwest Indiana, which will serve as a localized site for providing cancer resources to the community as well as a site for research collaboration. The goals behind the center include, Reducing expenses for cancer patients (travel, treatment, and care), Increasing collaboration and resources between researchers, universities, and hospitals, Increasing awareness of preventative and early detection measures for cancer, Promoting economic development spurred on by medical research.
